title: 1 Iwe Mlinda Lizga Mbata
markdown:
### 1 Iwe Mlinda Lizga Mbata   
 WATCHMEN, BLOW THE GOSPEL TRUMPET

 **1.**   
   
 Iwe mlinda lizga mbata   
 chenjezga wanthu wose,   
 Uyo wapulika wize,   
 wawenge na umoyo.

 **Chorus:**   
 We mlinda lizga mbata,   
 wose wapulikiske;   
 Pharazga yikuti   
 Fumu wose wasutulike.

 **2.**   
 Pharazga mose m'mapiri,   
 munguyi, na m'vinkhwawu;   
 Pharazgaso mu zinyanja,   
 mazgu gha chiponosko.

 **3.**   
 Pharazganga kose-kose   
 na uko kuli chisi;   
 Wamanye nyengo yamara   
 Fumu yikulindizga.

 **4.**   
 M'pharazge kuwakuvuka,   
 wakunwekera mtende;   
 Yesu wakuchema tose,   
 wakuti zani kwa 'ne.

title: 2 Fumu Yithu Yikwizaso
markdown:
### 2 Fumu Yithu Yikwizaso   
 THE COMING KING

 **1.**   
 Fumu yithu yikwizaso,   
 Lyo yikafwira ise:   
 Kweni watuwa mu mtima,   
 Wazamruta nayo.

 **Chorus:**   
 Inya, mwe, pamryango,   
 Yesu wali nadi pamryango;   
 Wakwizaso (nadi) Wakwizaso (Fumu)   
 Inya wali pa mryango.

 **2.**   
 Vimanyikwiro vyakeso,   
 Vikufiskika nadi 'mwe;   
 Luwiro tamkumuwona,   
 Wakwiza m'mabingu.

 **3.**   
 Mungalawiskanga m'charu,   
 Kupenja penja mutende;   
 Pakwiza kwa Fumu Yesu,   
 Yizam'mazga nyifwa.

 **4.**   
 Pakunjira m'charu chipya,   
 Tamkhala kwa myirayira;   
 Kulje nthenda na nyifwa,   
 Kwa mtatakuya swi.

title: 3 Maso Na Maso Na Khristu
markdown:
### 3 Maso Na Maso Na Khristu   
 FACE TO FACE

 **1.**   
 Maso na maso na Khristu;   
 ndamkwima uli ine?   
 Pakuwonana na Yesu,   
 Uyo wakandifwira.

 **Chorus:**   
 Ndamkuwonana na Yesu,   
 kuseri kwa mitambo;   
 Ndamkuwona mtaski wane,   
 mu uchindami wake

 **2.**   
 Sono nkhumwoneska chara,   
 mkazimuzimu pera Zuwa   
 lira ndakumwona,   
 mu uchindami wake.

 **3.**   
 Pakumara suzgo lose,   
 nthenda na nyifwa wuwo;   
 Pakunozgeka kwa charu;   
 ndamkuhenera nadi.

 **4.**   
 Pa zuwa la vitumbiko,   
 ndamkumuwona Yesu;   
 Muponoski wane uyo,   
 wakanditemwa ine.

title: 4 Wakwiza
markdown:
### 4 Wakwiza   
 HE'S COMING

 **1.**   
 Mazgu ghaweme 'gho tapulika,   
 Apo tikuya kukaya;   
 Mponoski withu wati wizenge   
 'Mwe kwizakawa Fumu.

 **Chorus:**   
 Wakwiza Luwiro 'mwe wakwiza;   
 Kwiza pa charu cha pasi;   
 Tizamruta nayo kwawo kuchanya;   
 Pakwiza Fumu Yesu.

 **2.**   
 Malaro gha watuwa mitima   
 Ghazamujulika nadi,   
 Na wose wakugona m'malaro   
 Wazamkuwa wa moyo.

 **3.**   
 Kuchanya ntha tayampatukana,   
 Wakuwombokwa wamkwimba;   
 Mitundu yose m'charu chapasi   
 Ya mrunmba Fumu yawo.

 **4.**   
 Tayamkwimba haleluya, Amen,   
 Pakukoreska mwa Yesu;   
 Lindizganinge na kuromba 'mwe,   
 Tizamkuwara mphumphu.

title: 5 Nkhutari Uli Kukaya?
markdown:
### 5 Nkhutari Uli Kukaya?   
 HOW FAR FROM HOME?

 **1.**   
 Nkhutari uli kukaya? Nkhafumba mlinda wakati;   
 Usiku wamara nadi, nkhumatanda kucha.   
 Ungaliranga, wendenge mchipulikano cha Yesu;   
 Pakumalizga ulendo wamfika kuchanya.

 **2.**   
 Ndafumba mlinda wa Khristu, pakwimba iye wakati:   
 Ndirwenge nkhondo yimarenge luwiro nadi,   
 Ungaliranga koreska kurwa nkhondo yimarenge;   
 Wose awo wamkutonda wampokera njombe.

 **3.**   
 Ndafunba charu, dazi na nyanja vikuphara kuti   
 Nyengo yaneng'enera 'mwe, Yesu wakwizaso;   
 Ungaliranga vimanyikwiro vyake vyawoneka,   
 Chilengiwa chose chikulinda kwiza kwake.

 **4.**   
 Kwithu nkhufupi 'mwe sono, ndi mazgu ghakusangwiska,   
 Ghakufyura masozi gha awo wakulira,   
 Ungaliranga tamkukumana ntha tamlekanaso;   
 Pakumara suzgo lose m'nyumba ya wadada.

title: 6 Lindizgani Muchenjere
7 Para Wayamkuweraso
markdown:
### 7 Para Wayamkuweraso   
 WHEN HE COMETH

 **1.**   
 Para wayamkuweraso, Kwizakawonganya;   
 Vyuma vyake vyakuzirwa, Vyakutemweka.

 **Chorus:**   
 Vizamzota chomene nga ndi nyenyezi zo!   
 Vizam'garara m'mphumphu ya Fumu Yesu.

 **2.**   
 Wizamkuwunganya vyuma vyake vya ufumu,   
 Vyakutowa, vyakuwara, vyakutemweka.

 **3.**   
 Twana tose tukumtemwa, Tukutemwa Yesu;   
 Ndivyo vyuma vyakuzirwa, vyakutemweka.

title: 8 Pakuchema Fumu Yane
markdown:
### 8 Pakuchema Fumu Yane   
 WHEN THE TRUMPET

 **1.**   
 Pakuchema Fumu yane, pakumara kwa charu,   
 Pakwiza zuwa lira lakuwara.   
 Para watuwa wose wakukumana na Yesu,   
 Ndamkusangwa nayo kwa myirayira.

 **Chorus:**   
 Pakuchema Fumu yane ('mwe Fumu),   
 Pakuchema Fumu yane (mwe Fumu),   
 Pakuchema Fumu yane,   
 Ndamkusangwa nayo kwa myirayira.

 **2.**   
 wakufwira mwa Yesu pakufuma mu malaro,   
 Tamkumana nawo pa nyengo iyi.   
 Pakuwuka kwa watuwa kukumana na Yesu,   
 Ndamsekelera nayo myirayira.

 **3.**   
 Tikoreske kumlimira mlimo mpaka ku nyifwa,   
 Tipharazge m'charu chose cha pasi,   
 Pakumalizga milimo na umoyo wa m'charu,   
 Taya m'mwemwetera pakukumana.

 **Chorus (La umaliro):**    
 Pakuchema Fumu yithu ('mwe Fumu)   
 Pakuchema Fumu yithu ('mwe Fumu)   
 Pakuchema Fumu yithu,   
 Tamkusangwa nayo kwa myirayira.

title: 9 Lizgani Mbata
markdown:
### 9 Lizgani Mbata   
 LIFT UP THE TRUMPET

 **1.**   
 Lizgani mbata wose wamanye   
 Yesu watizengeso,   
 Sekererani mwimbe zisumu,   
 Yesu watizengeso.

 **Chorus:**   
 Wakwizaso, wakwizaso,   
 Yesu watizengeso.

 **2.**   
 Pharazganinge m'phiri na m'dambo,   
 Yesu watizengeso,   
 Wakwiza mu uchindami wake,   
 Yesu watizengeso.

 **3.**   
 Pharazganinge m'zinyanja mose,   
 Yesu watizengeso,   
 Pharazganingiso pose-pose,   
 Yesu watizengeso.

 **4.**   
 Vindindindi vikunena kuti,   
 Yesu watizengeso,   
 Mphepo na mayigha vikunena,   
 Yesu watizengeso.

 **5.**   
 Mitundu yakalipa timanye,   
 Yesu watizengeso,   
 Vinjeru vyandana m'charu chose,   
 Yesu watizengeso.

title: 10 Ka Tamkongana Pa Mronga
markdown:
### 10 Ka Tamkongana Pa Mronga   
 SHALL WE GATHER

 **1.**   
 Ka tamkongana pa mronga, Wangelo wakwendamo?   
 Ukwenda na kujeduka pa chizumbe cha Leza.

 **Chorus:**   
 Inya, tamkongana papo, Pa mronga wakutowa wa Fumu,   
 Tam 'kuwonana na watuwa, pa muronga 'mwe kuchanya.

 **2.**   
 Pa mronga wakung'azima kayilole wa Fumu,   
 Watuwa wa mkwimba wezi, Hyengo za myirayira.

 **3.**   
 Tindafike pa muronga tam'thula wakatundu,   
 Tamkutaskika mu wezi, Na kupokera mphumphu.

 **4.**   
 Luwiro tayam'fikako, Pa kumara kwa lwendo,   
 Mitima yithu yam'kondwa kwimba sumu za mtende.

title: 11 Nditimrondezgani
markdown:
### 11 Nditimrondezgani   
 I WILL FOLLOW THEE

 **1.**   
 Nditimrondezgani Fumu,   
 Kose uko mukuya,   
 Kose uko mukurazga,   
 Nditimurondezgani.

 **Chorus:**   
 Nditimrondezgani Fumu,   
 Imwe mukandifwira,   
 Nanga wose wampateni,   
 Nditimurondezgani.

 **2.**   
 Nanga m'nthowa muwe minga,   
 Ndipo njamswaswayira,   
 Namweso mukenda mumo,   
 Nditimurondezgani.

 **3.**   
 Nanga ine ndisuzgike,   
 Naviyezgo vinandi,   
 Fumu namwe mkayezgeka,   
 Nditimurondezgani.

 **4.**   
 Nanga ndisuzgike viwi,   
 Ntha tindimukaneni,   
 Mkasuzgika kwakuruska   
 Nditimurondezgani.

 **5.**   
 M'vimphupulu na mwakofya   
 Mutindirongozgenge,   
 Mkambuka mmayigha kale,   
 Nditimurondezgani.

title: 12 Chisimi Chabwibwituka
markdown:
### 12 Chisimi Chabwibwituka   
 THERE IS A FOUNTAIN

 **1.**   
 Chisimi chabwibwituka na ndopa za Yesu,   
 Wose wakusamba mumo wataye kwananga.

 **2.**   
 Munkhungu yura pakufwa wakawona ndopa,   
 Na ine wuwo mwa uyu ndingatoweskeka.

 **3.**   
 Ndopa za Yesu Mponoski ziri na nkhongono,   
 Kuwataska wanthu awo wakumutemwani.

 **4.**   
 Pa kulawiska pa ndopa mu mabamba ghake,   
 Ndithuwuskenge chitemwa kwa muyirayira.

 **5.**   
 Nkhumanya mkundinozgera malo gha phangano,   
 Uko ndamkukhala namwe, mu ufumu winu.

 **6.**   
 Na kuchanya ndayamkwimba kutemwa kwa Fumu,   
 Kutaska awo wakumupulikira Yesu.

title: 13 Munditoweske
markdown:
### 13 Munditoweske   
 LORD JESUS, I LONG TO BE PERFECTLY WHOLE

 **1.**   
 Fumu ine nkhukhumba m'nditoweske,   
 Zani mkhale na ine m'nditoweske,   
 Fumyani uheni wose mwa ine,   
 Mundisavye Fumu munditoweske.

 **Chorus:**   
 M'nditoweske 'mwe m nditoweske,   
 Mundisavye Fumu munditoweske.

 **2.**   
 Fumu wonani charu chanangika,   
 Nkhujipereka kwinu, m'ndovwirenge.   
 Ndireke ubendezi wane wose,   
 Mundisavye Fumu munditoweske.

 **3.**   
 Nkhuromba imwe Fumu m'ndipulike,   
 Zani mkhale na ine 'mwe Mponoski,   
 Ndopa zinu zindisuke ku mtima,   
 Mundisavye Fumu munditoweske.

 **4.**   
 Nkhugomezga mwa imwe Fumu yane,   
 Zani m'nozge vyose mu mtima wane.   
 Fumu imwe mkuchema ise tose,   
 Mundisavye Fumu munditoweske."

title: 14 Pulika Ndarama
markdown:
### 14 Pulika Ndarama   
 HEAR THE PENNIES DROPPING

 **1.**   
 Pulika ndarama tikuziponya!   
 Tikuzipereka zose kwa Yesu.

 **Chorus:**   
 Ngwingwi! Ngwingwi!   
 Ngwingwi! Ngwingwi!   
 Tikuziponya! Tikuzipereka   
 Zose kwa Yesu.

 **2.**   
 Tose tipereke ndarama zithu;   
 Kuti wanji wapulike za Yesu.

 **3.**   
 Pa kuzipereka tikusungizga,   
 Chiuta withu wawezgerengepo.

 **4.**   
 Chomene Yesu wakukhumba ise;   
 Kuti tipereke mitima yithu.

title: 15 Yesu Wakunditemwa
markdown:
### 15 Yesu Wakunditemwa   
 JESUS LOVES ME!

 **1.**   
 Yesu wakunditemwa mazgu ghandiphalira,   
 Twana tuchoko nthwake, ndi mulara watose.

 **Chorus:**   
 E! wakutemwa! wakunditemwa,   
 E! wakutemwa mazgu ghakuphara.

 **2.**   
 Yesu wakandifwira, wakajura kuchanya,   
 Wandisuke uheni, nkhanjireko kuchanya.

 **3.**   
 Yesu wakunditemwa na m'maurwani ghane,   
 Na mkusuzgika kwane, Yesu m'ndovwire ine.

 **4.**   
 Yesu wakulongozga, wali pafupi nane,   
 Wizamukunditora kuya nane kuchanya.

title: 16 Imwe Tumalundi
markdown:
### 16 Imwe Tumalundi   
 I WASH MY HANDS

 **1.**   
 Ndasamba m'mawoko ghane, ndatuwiskika,   
 Nkhughapereka ghose ku mlimo wa Yesu.

 **Chorus:**   
 Imwe tumalundi mwende makora,   
 Mngatirongozganga m'nthowa ziheni.

 **2.**   
 Makutu ghapulike, zuwa lose ill,   
 Mawoko ghachitenge milimo yiweme.

 **3.**   
 Maso ghalawiskenge mlimo wawo wose,   
 Ghaleke zakwananga Yesu walongozge.

title: 17 Chitemwa Chikutikondweska
markdown:
### 17 Chitemwa Chikutikondweska   
 TIS LOVE THAT MAKES US HAPPY

 **1.**   
 Tikondwenge m'chitemwa ndilo dango lake,   
 Likutisambizga tose, kutemwa wanyithu.

 **Chorus:**   
 Chiuta wakutemwa tose,   
 tose tii wana wake,   
 Tikondwenge m'chitemwa,   
 ndilo dango Lake,   
 Likutisambizga tose   
 kutemwa wanyithu.

 **2.**   
 Mcharu muli vitima, nyifwa na matenda,   
 Mwakutemwa tiyezgenge kovwira wanyithu.

 **3.**   
 Pakwiza Fumu Yesu, m'uchindami wake,   
 Tamkwimba kura kuchanya, vya chitemwa chake.

title: 18 Jisungilire
markdown:
### 18 Jisungilire   
 MY SOUL, BE ON THY GUARD

 **1.**   
 Jisungilire 'we,   
 Warwani mbanandi   
 Wakwendendeka mu charu,   
 Kukukora iwe.

 **2.**   
 Koreska nkhondo 'yi,   
 Nadi njinonono,   
 Romba kwa Chiuta,   
 Ndiyo yekha wangovwira.

 **3.**   
 Leka kugongowa,   
 Uchite mulimo,   
 Palije kupumula 'mwe,   
 Mpaka Yesu wize.

title: 19 Tiyeni Akhristu
markdown:
### 19 Tiyeni Akhristu   
 ONWARD, CHRISTIAN SOLDIERS!

 **1.**   
 Tiyeni, wakhristu, tipote homwa,   
 Yesu nkhoswe yithu yikurongozga,   
 Fumu yakuchanya yatinenera,   
 Na ndembera zake zikudangira.

 **Chorus:**   
 Wakhristu tiyeni, tipote homwa,   
 Yesu nkhoswe yithu yikurongozga.   
 **2.**   
 Awo mba Satana wakuchimbira,   
 Mpingo wa wakhristu ukuwaruska,   
 Atana wakopa para tikwimba,   
 Koreskani sumu, mwa'bali withu.

title: 20 Mzimu Wane
markdown:
### 20 Mzimu Wane   
 AWAKE, MY SOUL

 **1.**   
 Mzimu wane 'we wukanga,   
 Chimbira luwiro   
 Mphumphu yiriko   
 Iyo yikulindizga iwe.

 **2.**   
 Mazgu gha Fumu, Chiuta,   
 Ghakukuchenya we,   
 Njombe wati wakupenge,   
 Para ukukhumba.

 **3.**   
 wakaboni wakuchanya   
 Wakukulawiska, Luwako   
 Vyose vyakale,   
 Lawiska panthazi.

 **4.**   
 Mponoski mutirongozge   
 Tambe majuwani,   
 Para tatonda,   
 Tamthula Katundu kwa Imwe.

title: 21 Nkhwiza Kvwinu Wa Yesu
markdown:
### 21 Nkhwiza Kvwinu Wa Yesu   
 IAM COMING T THE CROSS

 **1.**   
 Ndili kudza kwa Yesu,   
 Ndasauka ndachimwa;   
 Zonse zanga ndisiya,   
 Kukapeza moyotu.

 **Chorus:**   
 Yesu ndikhulupira,   
 Munafera inedi,   
 Mwa umphawi ndipempha,   
 Mundipulumutsetu.

 **2.**   
 Inde, Inu ndifuna,   
 Ndinachimwa kwambiri;   
 Yesu ati, Ndichotsa   
 Zakuipa zakozo.

 **3.**   
 Yesu zonse ndipatsa,   
 Zili zanu tsopano,   
 Mtima wanga wonsewu,   
 Muli mwini waketu.

 **4.**   
 Ndikukhulupirani,   
 Mwazi wanu ndidziwa,   
 Wayeretsa inenso,   
 Ndapachikwa ndi Khristu.

 **5.**   
 Yesu adzandidzaza   
 Mtima wanga wonsewu,   
 Ine ndili woyera,   
 Yesu wanga nditama.

title: 22 Naneso
markdown:
### 22 Naneso   
 LORD, I HEAR

 **1.**   
 Fumu ndapulika mkuchitira   
 wanji viweme,   
 Wanandi mkuwatumbika   
 naneso m'nditumbike.

 **Chorus:**   
 Naneso, Naneso   
 M'nditumbikeso nane

 **2.**   
 Dada m'ngandizerezganga,   
 Nda muheni nga ndine,   
 Nkhwenerera nyifwa nadi,   
 Mndichitire lusungu.

 **3.**   
 Nkhafwasa m'maubendezi,   
 Imwe nkham pepulani   
 Ndatemweska vya mucharu,   
 Fumu m'ndigowokere.

 **4.**   
 Mzimu mreke kuzerezga,   
 M'ndijure maso ghane,   
 Mkupa mphavu wanthu wanji,   
 nane m'ndipe nkhongono.

title: 23 Mundifukatire Ine
markdown:
### 23 Mundifukatire Ine   
 HOVER O'ER ME HOLY SPIRIT

 **1.**   
 Mundifukatire ine,   
 Imwe Mzimu Mutuwa,   
 Mundisukiske mu mtima,   
 inya mwize mha'uno.

 **Chorus:**   
 Zaninge, zaninge,   
 Imwe Mzimu Mutuwa,   
 Mundisukiske mu mtima   
 ndiie winu ndipera.

 **2.**   
 Ine ndirije mahara   
 zani mkhalenge nane,   
 Nadi nkhusowelwa imwe,   
 zani mzure mwa ine.

 **3.**   
 Ndirije nkhongono,   
 sono nkhujikama kwa imwe;   
 Imwe Mzimu Mtuwa   
 m'ndizuzge na kutemwa kwinu.

 **4.**   
 Munditumbike a Mzimu,   
 sukani mtima wane,   
 Ndimwe msanguluski wane,   
 zaninge mkhale nane.

title: 24 Nkhukhumbiska Imwe
markdown:
### 24 Nkhukhumbiska Imwe   
 I NEED THEE EVERY HOUR

 **1.**   
 Khukhumbiska Imwe   
 Fumu yane Ndimwe mwekha   
 Pera m'kupa mtende.

 **Chorus:**   
 Nkhukhumba Imwe   
 Sono na mazuwa ghose;   
 Mundovwire a Yesu   
 Nkhwiza kwinu.

 **2.**   
 Nkhukhumbiska lImwe,   
 Mkhale nane;   
 Ntha ndingatondeka   
 Imwe m lipo.

 **3.**   
 Nkhukhumbiska imwe   
 Mukukondwa,   
 Na mkuwinya wuwo   
 Ntha nkhufwasa.

 **4.**   
 Nkhukhumbiska lmwe,   
 M'ndisambizge; Mapangano   
 Ghose ghafiskike.
 

 **5.**   
 Nkhukhumbiska Imwe,   
 Mwa watuwa,   
 Mundikumbukenge,   
 Ndiwe winu.

title: 25 Nkhupereka Vyonse Kwa Yesu
markdown:
### 25 Nkhupereka Vyonse Kwa Yesu   
 ALL TO JESUS I SURRENDER

 **1.**   
 Nkhupereka vyose kwa Yesu,   
 vyose mwa wanangwa,   
 Nditi ndimtemwe   
 Fumu Yesu pa mazuwa ghose.

 **Chorus:**   
 Nkhuvipereka vyose kwa Yesu;   
 Nkhupereka kwinu,   
 Yesu munditumbike.

 **2.**   
 Nkhupereka vyose kwa Yesu   
 pa malundi ghake   
 Vya mcharu ndavireka vyose,   
 nditorani Fumu.

 **3.**   
 Nkhupereka vyose kwa Yesu,   
 ndiwe winu Dada,   
 Mzimu winu wandisambizge   
 kuti muli wane.

 **4.**   
 Nkhupereka vyose kwa Yesu,   
 mundipe nkhongono   
 Nkhusangwa nadi m'chiponosko,   
 ndithuwuske imwe.

title: 26 Muno Ndiriri Wawaka
markdown:
### 26 Muno Ndiriri Wawaka   
 JUST AS IAM

 **1.**   
 Mumo ndiriri wawaka,   
 mukandifwira ndipera;   
 Mukati ndize kwa Imwe,   
 nkhwiza mtaski Yesu, nkhwiza.

 **2.**   
 Mumo ndiriri nkhusowa,   
 wakusavya mtima wane   
 Ndopa zinu zindisavye,   
 nkhwiza mtaski wane nkhwiza.

 **3.**   
 Mumo ndiriri mchitenthe,   
 nkhutondeka kujitaska   
 Na chitima na wofiso,   
 nkhwiza mtaski Yesu, nkhwiza.

 **4.**   
 Mumo ndiriri mukavu,   
 wakusokwa na chinthuru;   
 Vyose nkhutaya kwa imwe,   
 nkhwiza Mtaski Yesu, nkhwiza.

 **5.**   
 Mumo ndiriri m'ndichizge,   
 m'ndipokerere m'ndithaske,   
 Nkhuti ndiwe winu pera,   
 nkhwiza mtaski Yesu, nkhwiza.

 **6.**   
 Mumo ndiriri ndawona,   
 umo mwatemwera ine.   
 Sono ndiri winu pera,   
 nkhwiza mtaski Yesu, nkhwiza.

title: 27 Tikum'wongani Fumu
markdown:
### 27 Tikum'wongani Fumu   
 WE PRAISE THEE, O GOD

 **1.**   
 Tikum'wongani, Fumu ya uchizi,   
 M'katuma mponoski kufwira ise.

 **Chorus:**   
 Haleluya timchindike,   
 Haleluya Amen,   
 Haleluya timsopenge,   
 Chiuta withu.

 **2.**   
 Tikuwongaso Chiuta wa mphavu,   
 Chifukwa cha Mzimu winu mutuwa.

 **3.**   
 Tim'chindikenge, mwana wa mberere;   
 Uyo wakafwira kutiwombola.

 **4.**   
 Tikum 'wongani, Fumu ya uchizi,   
 Mwe mukatigula na ndopa zinu.

 **5.**   
 Tipamphuskeni mu chitemwa chinu,   
 Mtibuske na moto wa Mzimu winu.

title: 28 Uwe Na Kanyengo
29 Mkharenge Nane
30 Zuwa Likunjira Mwe
markdown:
### 30 Zuwa Likunjira Mwe   
 DAY IS DYING IN THE WEST

 **1.**   
 Zuwa likunjira 'mwe Fumu yitipumuzge;   
 Lindizgani m'kuromba nyali zikugolera na kuwala.

 **Refrain:**   
 Mtuwa, mtuwa, Fumu ya mipingo;   
 Vya m'chanya na vyapasi vikumutamikani Mwankhongono.

 **2.**   
 Mwene umoyo ndimwe mwazu.a pose pose;   
 Mtiwunganye tawinu m'lukutu lwinu sono lwa mutende.

 **3.**   
 Usange mfwiri wiza mukutifukatira;   
 M'uchizi winu Fumu, mitima yithu yikwere kwa imwe.

 **4.**   
 Para tafwa pacharu, ntha tikuwona kanthu;   
 Fumu mkutemwa kwinu mzakatiwuskeso pa mlenjí wura.

title: 31 Dazi La Mzimu
32 Fumu Ndi Jarawe Lithu
markdown:
### 32 Fumu Ndi Jarawe Lithu   
 THE LORD'S OUR ROCK

 **1.**   
 Fumu ndi jarawe lithu ndiyo   
 Chiphokwero chithu   
 Wakutithaska mu vyose,   
 Ndiyo chiphokwero chithu.

 **Chorus:**   
 Ndi Jarawe Lakukhola ndimfwini   
 M'dazi La kocha;   
 Ndi mrongozgi pa ulendo,   
 Ndiyo chiphokwero chithu

 **2.**   
 Pa nyengo yakwenda m'chisi,   
 Ndiyo chiphokwero chithu;   
 Ise ntha topenge kanthu,   
 Ndiyo chiphokwero chithu.

 **3.**   
 Nanga chiwowota chize,   
 Ndiyo chiphokwero chithu;   
 Mwa Chiuta tikondwenge,   
 Ndiyo chiphokwero chithu.

 **4.**   
 Jarawe na mfwiri withu,   
 Ndimwe chiphokwero chithu   
 Muwenge movwiri withu,   
 Ndimwe chiphokwero chithi

title: 33 Fumu Yikundirongozga
markdown:
### 33 Fumu Yikundirongozga   
 HE LEADENTH ME

 **1.**   
 Fumu yikundirongozga mazgu   
 Ghakukondwereska   
 Icho ndiri na kuchita   
 Ndiyo wakundirongozga.

 **Refrain:**   
 Wakundirongozga ine   
 Na woko Lake Chiuta;   
 Nditi ndimrondezge   
 Fumu wakundirongozga ndiyo.

 **2.**   
 Nyengo zinyake masuzgo,   
 Nyengo zinyake kukondwa;   
 Mu nyanja ya vimasuzgo   
 Imwe mukundirongozga.

 **3.**   
 Fumu ndimkoreni woko,   
 Ndisinginikenge chara;   
 Ndikhutiskike mu vyose,   
 Pakuti wakurongozga.

 **4.**   
 Uvwe mulimo wamala,   
 Uvwe m'uchizi ndatonda;   
 Mnyifwa ntha tindichimbire   
 Fumu yikundirongozga.

title: 34 Mtende Nga Ndi Mronga
markdown:
### 34 Mtende Nga Ndi Mronga   
WHEN PEACE LIKE A RIVER

  **1.**   
  Mtende nga ndi mronga wandizingizga,   
 Nanga vitima viwuke;   
 Kweni nkhukhumba kuti ndisorepo;   
 Mutende, mutende wa m'mtima.

  **Chorus:**   
 Mutende mu mtima,   
 mutende wuzure mu mtima.

  **2.**   
  Nanga Satana wangandipamantha;   
 Tindifwiririrengepo;   
 Pa Yesu uyo wakafwira ine,   
 Wakandiwombola ku nyifwa.

  **3.**   
  Nkhum'wongani Yesu mwandisutula,   
 Uheni wane wamala,   
 Ukamalira para pa mphinjika;   
 Mrumbe Yesu wa mtima wane.

  **4.**   
  Kwa imwe a Yesu, tikulindizga;   
 Thegha ntha lingatiruska;   
 Mbata ya mungelo yiwawatenge!   
 Fumu yikhirenge mudera.

title: 35 Chamkuwa Chimwemwe
markdown:
### 35 Chamkuwa Chimwemwe   
WHAT A FELLOVWSHIP

  **1.**   
  Chamkuwa nadi chimwemwe kura;   
 Pakweghama m'mawoko ghake;   
 Vitumbiko 'mwe vya kwa Chiuta;   
 Pakweghama m'mawoko ghake.

  **Chorus:**   
 Pakweghama, wati   
 Wandifighirire Muvyakofya   
 Pakweghama m'mawoko ghake

B&T   
 Pakweghamira, pakweghamira,   
 Wati wandifighirire,   
 Muvyakofya 'mwe,   
 Muvyakofya 'mwe,   
 Pakweghama m'mawoko ghake.

  **2.**   
  Njakunozga 'mwe nthowa ya Fumu,   
 Pakweghama mmawoko   
 Njakungweruka nthowa ya Yesu,   
 Pakweghama m'mawoko ghake.

  **3.**   
  Palije icho ndingachiwopa   
 Pakweghama m'mawoko ghake,   
 Ndiri na mtende pakwenda nayo,   
 Pakweghama m'mawoko ghake.

title: 36 Nkugomezga Imwe
markdown:
### 36 Nkugomezga Imwe   
MY FAITH LOOKS UP TO THEE

  **1.**   
  Nkhugomezga imwe,   
 Mwana wa Chiuta, muponoski;   
 Mpulike nkhuromba, mufumye uheni   
 Kufuma kulero ndiwe winu.

  **2.**   
  Mundipe uchizi,   
 Undikhomeskenge, m'ndipamphuske;   
 Umo mkandifwira, ndimo kuwirenge   
 Kutemweska kwane nga ndi moto.

  **3.**   
  Pakwenda mu chisi,   
 Vitima mu mtima, mundikore;   
 Chisi chiukepo, vitima vimare;   
 Ntha nditisoweso kuli Imwe.

title: 37 Ndirute Kufupi
markdown:
### 37 Ndirute Kufupi   
NEARER, MY GOD, TO THEE!

  **1.**   
  Ndirute kufupi kwa Chiuta!   
 Nanga ndi mphinjika yindikwezge;   
 Ndingimba sumu'yo, Ndiye Kufupiso,   
 Ndiye kufupiso kwa Chiuta.

  **2.**   
  Nanga, nga ndi mlendo ku mapopa,   
 Ndagona mu mdima, Ndekha pera,   
 Na m'maloto wuwo, Ndiye kufupiso,   
 Ndiye kufupiso, Kwa Chiuta.

  **3.**   
  Mura makwerero ghawoneka;   
 Ghakuya kuchanya, kwa Chiuta.   
 Wangelo wachema; Ndiye kufupiso,   
 Ndiye kufupiso kwa Chiuta.

  **4.**   
  Sono pa kuwuka, wakukondwa,   
 Ndisange Chiuta apo wali,   
 Ndisange Cniuta oNdive kufupiso,   
 Nam'malwayo wuwo; Ndiye kufupiso,   
 Ndiye kufupiso kwa Chiuta.

  **5.**   
  Para yandichema Fumu yane,   
 Vyapasi ndamsida ndirutenge,   
 Ndamkwimba lusumu, Ndiye kufupiso,   
 Ndiye kufupiso kwa Chiuta.

title: 38 Koreskani Mwa Chiuta
markdown:
### 38 Koreskani Mwa Chiuta   
FIRMLY STAND FOR GOD

  **1.**   
  Koreskani mwa Chiuta withu,   
 nanga charu chazuravisuzgo.   
 Khristu ndi jarawe lakukhora,   
 ndipo na la nkhongono.

  **Chorus:**   
 Tikoreske kwima pa jarawe Lira,   
 jalawe ndiyo Khristu;   
 Tizizipizge kuti tikafike,   
 ku chizumbe cha Chiuta.

  **2.**   
  Koreskani na mutima wose,   
 Inya mu chipulikano chinu;   
 Khristu ndi jarawe lakukhora,   
 wakutonda kwananga.

  **3.**   
  Koreskani unenesko wake,   
 umovwiraninge kwakuruska;   
 Khristu jarawe la chipumulo,   
 para suzgo lamara.

title: 39 Gomezgo Pa Jarawe
markdown:
### 39 Gomezgo Pa Jarawe   
MY HOPE IS BUILT

  **1.**   
  Gomezgo lane layima,   
 pa Yesu Khristu mutuwa,   
 Palije zina linyake,   
 kweni la Yesu ndipera.

  **Chorus:**   
 Nkhwima pa Khristu, jarawe,   
 charu chapasi ndi mchenga;   
 Charu chapasi ndi mchenga.

  **2.**   
  Pakuzingiziwa ine,   
 ndiphokwerenge mwa lyo;   
 M vimphupuru na m mayigha,   
 ndichimbilre kwa Yesu.

  **3.**   
  Phangano lake na ndopa,   
 vikuvikilira ine;   
 Para ine nkhutondeka,   
 nditiwenge mwa Yesu swi!

  **4.**   
  Pakulira mbata m'dera,   
 kuwuska w'ake w'akufwa;   
 NKnasangike pamo nawo,   
 wambura mlandu na Yesu.

title: 40 Pulikira
markdown:
### 40 Pulikira   
TRUST AND OBEY

  **1.**   
  Pakwenda na Yesu, mu ungweru wake;   
 Wakutirongozga mu nthowa;   
 Pakulima mlimo, nayo wakuwapo,   
 Na wose wakumpulikira.

  **Chorus:**   
 Pulikira palijeso nthowa,   
 yakukondwa mwa Yesu Kweni pulikira.

  **2.**   
  Kulije mudima, kulije nyathutwe;   
 Kweni watingweruskirenge,   
 Wofi na vitima vimarenge nadi,   
 Tigomezge, tipulikire.

  **3.**   
  Kulije visuzgo nesi na vitima,   
 Kweni wamtipa njombe yake,   
 Kwam'kuavye nyifwa, nesi kulekana,   
 Pakupulikana na Yesu

  **4.**   
  Ntha tingamanyiska, vyakutemwa kwake,   
 Pakureka kujipereka,   
 Chifukwa lusungu na kusangwa kwake,   
 Wakupa wakumpulikira.

  **5.**   
  Muchikoreskano, tayamkuwa nayo,   
 Panji kwendezgana na lyo,   
 Tichitenge vyose, nakumurondezga,   
 Pakumupulikira Yesu.

title: 41 Chiuta Wa Msungilireni
42 Ntha Tamlekanaso
markdown:
### 42 Ntha Tamlekanaso   
WITH FRIENDS ON EARTH

  **1.**   
  Tikuwa na wabwezi withu,   
 m'charu chithu chino,   
 Mwaluwiro tikulekana   
 nawo mwa vitima.

  **Chorus:**   
 Ntha tamlekana kuchanya   
 ntha tamlekanaso;   
 M'charu chira chakutowa,   
 ntha tamlekanaso.

  **2.**   
  Tikuwa na chigomezgo,   
 para wanyithu wafwa,   
 Kuti pakumara charu ichi,   
 tamkuwa nawo.

  **3.**   
  Kulije kulekana,   
 m'charu chira cha kuchanya,   
 Tamkwimba sumu za chimwemwe,   
 kwa muyirayira

title: 43 Awo Wafwira Mwa Yesu
markdown:
### 43 Awo Wafwira Mwa Yesu   
ASLEEP IN JESUSI

  **1.**   
  Awo wafwira mwa Yesu,   
 wam'kuwuka mu chimwemwe   
 Wapumule mu mutende,   
 kwamburaso mtimbanizgi.

  **2.**   
  Awo wafwira mwa Yesu,   
 wambura wofi na nyifwa.   
 MbamwaWi wakugomezga   
 m nkhongono za mtaski wawo.

  **3.**   
  Awo wafwira mwa Yesu,   
 wamkukhala mu mutende,   
 Vitima vyose kulije   
 pakwiza ye wazam'wuka.

  **4.**   
  Awo wafwira mwa Yesu,   
 mbata wamkuyipulika,   
 Wamkuwuka mu malaro,   
 kuruta na Fumu yawo.

title: 44 Para Nchito Yane Yamara
markdown:
### 44 Para Nchito Yane Yamara   
WHEN MY LIFE-WORK IS ENDED

  **1.**   
  Para mlimo wane wamara mucharu ichi,   
 Para ndajambuka sirya la nyanja,   
 Para ndamvwara thupi lambura kuvundaso,   
 Apo ndam' kum 'manya mponoski wane.

  **Chorus:**   
 Ndam 'kum manya ndam kum'manya   
 pakwizakima pa Lwande Iwake.   
 Ndam kummanya ndam'kum manya na   
 mabamba m'mawoko ghake

  **2.**   
  Mutma wane wizamkucha pa kumuwona,   
 Nakuwona chisko chake chituwa.   
 Ndizamkumrumba iye na mtima wane wose,   
 Malo wakundinozgera kuchanya.

  **3.**   
  Enya ndizam'kusangwa kuwonaso wanyane,   
 Awo nkhalekana nawo mucharu   
 Chakwamba ndam'kuwonana nayoYesu wane,   
 Wakutemweka wane kwakuruska.

  **4.**   
  Kuporota pa vipata kunjira mu msumba,   
 Yesu wazamkundirongozga ine,   
 Sumu ku nyengo zose ndamkwimba nakusangwa,   
 Para ndakam 'wona mponoski wane

title: 45 Ndipani Baibo
markdown:
### 45 Ndipani Baibo   
GIVE ME THE BIBLE

  **1.**   
  Ndipani Baibo ndilo nyali yane,   
 Kuti yindirongozgenge m'nthowa,   
 Palije chisi chingandijalira,   
 Yesu yekha ndiyo mtaski wane.

  **Chorus:**   
 Ndipani Baibo ndilo nyali yane;   
 Mazgu ghake gha Fumu Chiuta,   
 Ndilo phangano la chitemwa chake;   
 Nyall m nthowa yakuya kuchanya.

  **2.**   
  Ndipani Baibo pakuzingiziwa,   
 Pakusuzgika mu mtima wane Ndipani   
 mazgu ghaweme gha Yesu;   
 Mazgu ghake ghakusanguruska.

  **3.**   
  Ndipani Baibo ndilo nkhulidoka;   
 Nyali yakuwala m'nthowa yane;   
 Likuvumbura ma uheni ghane   
 Kundendeska m'nthowa ya ulunji.

  **4.**   
  Ndipani Baibo ndilo nyali yane,   
 Yam'kundiwuska mkati m'malaro;   
 Gomezgo la wose wakutengera,   
 Nyali m'nthowa yakuya kuchanya.

title: 46 Mazgu Gha Umoyo
markdown:
### 46 Mazgu Gha Umoyo   
SING THEM OVER AGAIN

  **1.**   
  Mwimbenge mazgu ghaweme,   
 mazgu gha umoyo Ghanozgeso   
 mtima wane, mazgu gha umoyo,   
 Mazgu gha uchizi, ghakundisambizga.

  **Chorus:**   
 Ngakunozga, nga uchizi,   
 mazgu gha umoyo. (kawiri)

  **2.**   
  Khristu wakutipa tose,   
 mazgu gha umoyo;   
 Wa muheni upulike, mazgu gha umoyo,   
 Chose nchawanangwa, tiwe wakusangwa.

  **3.**   
  Likuchema ivangeli,   
 mazgu gha umoyo,   
 Wati wakugowokere, mazgu gha umoyo,   
 Yesu mtaski mwene, watuwiske iwe.

title: 47 Ndamirira Pa Yordano
markdown:
### 47 Ndamirira Pa Yordano   
ON JORDAN'S STORMY BANKS

  **1.**   
  Ndamirira pa Yordano  
 Na kulawisiska,   
 Ku Kenani wakutowa  
 uko ndamkukhala.

  **Chorus:**   
 Tamkupumula m'charu chiweme (chiweme)   
 Para tambukira kusirya,   
 Tamkwimba sumu ya Mozesi,   
 Na kukhala na Yesu m'yirayira.

  **2.**   
  M'madambo ghasani kura,   
 ungweru ngwandanda,   
 Khristu ndiyo wakuwusa,   
 kuchimbizga mdima.

  **3.**   
  Ndamkufikako pa uli,   
 nkhatumbikike swi,   
 Na kuwonaso Wadada,   
 nkhapumule kura?

  **4.**   
  Umoyo wane wamkondwa   
 kufumamo m'charu,   
 Nanga mayigha ghapome   
 ntha ndopenge kanthu.

title: 48 Chamkuwa Chimvwemwe
markdown:
### 48 Chamkuwa Chimvwemwe   
O THERE'LL BE JOY

  **1.**   
  Kusangwa pakumara mlimo,   
 Pakuwunganya kwa vuna,   
 Pakwizaso na vipambi,   
 Mu msumba Yerusalem.

  **Chorus:**   
 Chamkuwa chimwemwe nadi,   
 Chimwemwe cha m'yirayira.   
 Chifukwa nyengo yafīka,   
 yakuwunganya wose.

T&B:    
 Chimwemwe mwaluwiro,   
 Chimwemwe myirayira,   
 Chifukwa'mwe nyengo yafika,   
 Yakuwunganya wose.

  **2.**   
  Tamukwimba sumu ziweme,   
 Tamukwimbaso na nchindi,   
 Tamchindika Khristu,   
 Fumu, mu msumba wuphya wura.

  **3.**   
  Chimwemwe chikulindirira   
 Mu msumba wura kuchanya,   
 Yesu wakunozga malo,   
 Mu msumba wuphya wura.

title: 49 Ghanaghano Liweme
markdown:
### 49 Ghanaghano Liweme   
ONE SWEETLY SOLEMN THOUGHT

  **1.**   
  Ghanaghano l'weme,   
 Likwiza mu mtima,   
 Ndiri kufupi na kwithu,   
 Kwakuruska kale.

  **Chorus:**   
 Ndiri kufupi kukaya   
 Ndiri kufupi na kwithu   
 Kwakuruska kaLe.

  **2.**   
  Kufupi na Dada uko kuli malo,   
 Ku chizumbe chake Yesu,   
 Kusirya la nyanja.

  **3.**   
  Pakuya kuchanya,   
 Ndamthura katundu,   
 Ndamleka mphinjika yane,   
 Na kuwara mphumphu.

  **4.**   
  Mukati m'usiku,   
 Wukwenda muronga,   
 Kuporota m'chisi chose,   
 Kufika k'ungweru.

  **5.**   
  Fumu nditozgani,   
 Ndipani nkhongono,   
 Ndingimiliranga ndekha,   
 Pakufuma m'charu.

title: 50 Kuli Charu Chiweme
markdown:
### 50 Kuli Charu Chiweme   
THERE'S A LAND

  **1.**   
  Kuli Charu chiweme nadi,   
 Uko kuli wadada wane,   
 Warutako mponoski kale,   
 Ndipo ine nkhupukwa nane.

  **Chorus:**   
 Nkhupukwa kuya'ko,   
 Kuti nkhawe na Khristu, Fumu,   
 Nkhupukwa kuya'ko,   
 Kuti nkhawe na Khristu, Fumu.

  **2.**   
  Vitumbiko vilipo pasi,   
 Kweni kura ku Fumu yane,   
 Kukuruska viweme vyose,   
 Ndipo ine nkhupukwa nane.

  **3.**   
  Nadi kuli chimango kura,   
 Nakusangwa pamoza na yo,   
 Mukutemwa kwenecho pera,   
 Ndipo ine nkhupukwa nane.

title: 52 Fumu Zani
markdown:
### 52 Fumu Zani   
COME, THOU FOUNT

  **1.**   
  Fumu zani mtitumbike,   
 mtima wane wimbenge,   
 Mtilawiske na uchizi,   
 kuti timchindikani,   
 Tilondezge imwe pera,   
 na mtima wakusangwa,   
 Ndipo chigomezgo chane,   
 chizure m'mtima wane.

  **2.**   
  Fumu ndimwe m'vwiri wane,   
 mwandifikiska pano,   
 Mwalusungu lwinu pera,   
 nkhafikeko kuchanya.   
 Apo ine nkhatayika,   
 Yesu wakandipenja,   
 Ndopa zake zikathika   
 kundiwombola ine.

  **3.**   
  Fumu m'ndipe wezi winu,   
 ndawakwananga ine,   
 Chitemwa chinu nchikulu,   
 mundiguzile kwinu,   
 Nditolani ndize kwinu,   
 Fumu m'ngandilekanga,   
 Mtima wane muwunozge,   
 uwenge winu lero.

title: 53 Mzimu Ndi Mlongozgi
markdown:
### 53 Mzimu Ndi Mlongozgi   
 HOLY SPIRIT, FAITHFUL GUIDE

  **1.**   
  Mzimu ndiyo mrongozgi,   
 mu nthowa za ukhristu,   
 Mtirongozgenge ndimwe,   
 mu mapopa ghakotya.   
 Mitima yikusangwa   
 pakupulika mazgu,   
 Wakuyowoya Mzimu,   
 "we mayinga werera."

  **2.**   
  M'bwezi withu muweme,   
 muwe nase pafupi,   
 Mngatilekanga tekha,   
 m'charu chakofya ichi,   
 Pakupoma mayigha   
 tikwendamo na wofi,   
 Kweni mazgu ghakuti,   
 'we mayinga werera.

  **3.**   
  Para mlimo wamara,   
 pakulindizga Fumu,   
 Kunwekera kuchanya,   
 mu malurombo ghithu.   
 Kasi mazina ghithu   
 ghali kulembekamo?   
 Nweni mazgu ghakuti,   
 'we mayinga werera.

title: 54 Chinthu Chimo Nkhusowerwa
markdown:
### 54 Chinthu Chimo Nkhusowerwa   
ONE THING I FOR THE LORD

  **1.**   
  Chinthu chimo nkhusowerwa,   
 Ine ndabira m' mathipa,   
 Na maji panji na moto,   
 mundisavye, mundisavye.

  **Chorus:**   
 Mundisavyenge mu mtima,   
 na maji panji na moto,   
 Mundisavyenge mu mtima,   
 fumyani uheni wose.

  **2.**   
  Mundijure maso ghane,   
 ndimchindikani 'mwe Fumu,   
 Nozgani muzimu wane,   
 wurawiske Imwe pera.

  **3.**   
  Kweni mutima wutuwa,   
 uti uruskenge vyose,   
 Chifukwa nkhwa imwe pera,   
 ndingawona vya kuchanya.

  **4.**   
  Nkhutondeka kujitozga,   
 kwananga kwane nkhukuru,   
 Nkhwiza kwinu Fumu yane,   
 ndatondeka mundovwire.

title: 55 Kasi Mwampokerera?
markdown:
### 55 Kasi Mwampokerera?   
HAVE YOU BEEN TO JESUS?

  **1.**   
  Kasi mwampokerera Yesu Fumu?   
 Kasi mwasamba m'ndopa zake?   
 Kasi mwagomezga uchizi wake?   
 Kasi mwasamba m'ndopa zake?   
 Kasi mwasukika mu ndopa za Mwana-mberere?

  **Chorus:**   
 Kasi mutima winu watozgeka?   
 Kasi mwasamba mndopa zake?

  **2.**   
  Kasi mukwenda nayo muponoski?   
 Kasi mwasamba m'ndopa zake?   
 Kasi m'ngiza kwake kuti m'pumule?   
 Kasi mwasamba m'ndopa zake?

  **3.**   
  Kasi mwanozgeka pakwiza Mtaski?   
 Kasi mwasamba m'ndopa zake?   
 Kuti mukanjire m'malo ghaweme,   
 Kasi mwasamba m'ndopa zake?

  **4.**   
  Lekani uheni wamzotofyani,   
 Kasi mwasamba m'ndopa zake?   
 Wati wasukenge kwananga kwinu,   
 Kasi mwasamba m'ndopa zake?

title: 56 Ndayinga yinga
markdown:
### 56 Ndayinga yinga   
 I'VE WANDERED FAR AWAY

  **1.**   
  Ndayinga-yinga mucharu,   
 Fumu nkhuwera,   
 Ndendanga m'nthowa za chisi,   
 Fumu nkhuwera.

  **Chorus:**   
 Nkhuwera, nkhuwera,   
 Enya nkhuwera,   
 Mndipokerere Dada,   
 Fumu nkhuwera.

  **2.**   
  Ndamara vyaka vinandi,   
 Fumu nkhuwera,   
 Ndareka majuvyo ghane,   
 Fumu nkhuwera.

  **3.**   
  Vyalema na zakwananga,   
 Fumu nkhuwera,   
 Ndapulika mazgu ghinu,   
 Fumu nkhuwera.

  **4.**   
  Mtima wane ukunweka,   
 Fumu nkhuwera,   
 Mundisavye m'ndopa zinu,   
 Fumu nkhuwera.

title: 57 Uyo Wakhumba Wize
markdown:
### 57 Uyo Wakhumba Wize   
WHOSOEVER HEARETH

  **1.**   
  Uyo wapulika, mazgu ghake,   
 Waphalire wose m'charu chapasi,   
 Pharazgani mazgu ku wanthu wose,   
 Uyo wakhumba wize

  **Chorus:**   
 Uyo wakhumba, uyo wakhumba,   
 Pnarazga chimwemwe mphiri   
 na m'dambo Wadada wakuchema awo mbawo,   
 Uyo wakhumba wize.

  **2.**   
  Uyo wapulika 'za luwiro,   
 Muryango uli mwazi njiranga 'we,   
 Yesu ndiyo nthowa na unenesko,   
 Uyo wakhumba wize.

  **3.**   
  Uyo wakupenjapenja m'tende,   
 Uyo wakhumbiska wati wakhale,

 pakubabika Yesu,   
 Uchindami kwa Chiuta,   
 mtende pa charu chose.

  **Chorus:**   
 MundiphaLire vya Yesu,   
 viLembeke pa mtima,   
 MphaLe nkhani ya kunozga,   
 na yakuLuska zose.

  **2.**   
  Muphale vya mumapopa   
 wakaziwizga kurya,   
 Wakanjira mkuyezgeka,   
 kweni 'yo wakatonda,   
 Phalani vya mlimo wake,   
 na kusuzgika kwake,   
 Nadi wakatombozgeka   
 mu charu cha uheni.

  **3.**   
  M'ndiphalire vya mphinjika,   
 na vyakuwinya vyake,   
 Muphale vya dindi lake,   
 na vyakuwuka kwake,   
 M'nkhani nkhuwona chinthemwa cha Yesu Fumu yane,   
 Pakupulika nkhulira,   
 wakandithaska ine.

title: 108 Yesu Mliska Muweme
markdown:
### 108 Yesu Mliska Muweme   
 LOVINGLY, TENDERLY CALLING

  **1.**   
  Yesu mliska muweme, wakumuchemani,   
 Munjire mu lukutu, kuti mupumule,   
 Zaninge mwawalala, na wawukirano   
 Njirani mu lukutu, m'nthowa ya umoyo.

  **Chorus:**   
 Wakuchema mu chinthemwa chake,   
 Mwawakuzgewa 'mwe mwize kwane,   
 MLiska muweme wakuLindizga,   
 Yesu muLiska wane.

  **2.**   
  Yesu mliska muweme, wakafwira ine,   
 Na sono wakuchema wakuzgewa wose,   
 Mwe kuwalo nkhwakofya, zani wakuchema,   
 irani mu lukutu, zaninge mpumule.

  **3.**   
  Yesu mliska muwe wakuchema mbwenu,   
 Mungaziwulikanga, mphumphi zikupyunga,   
 IKupenja mberere, zakuzgewa zirye,   
 irani mu lukutu, malo ghachan

title: 109 Apo Fumu Yizampima
markdown:
### 109 Apo Fumu Yizampima   
 WEIGHED AND WANTING

  **1.**   
  Apo Fumu yizampima,

 Kasi ise tizamkwera,   
 panji tizamtondeka?

  **Chorus:**   
 Fumu yakupima iwe,

 Na marango m mazgu ghake,

  **2.**   
  Tampulika mazgu ghake,

 Panji wizam nena kuti,

  **3.**   
  Tampulika mzimu wake,   
 nyengo yichali waka,   
 Panji tichedwenge mbwenu,   
 na mpaka tinangike.

title: 110 Mba Mwawi Awo Wakuchita
markdown:
### 110 Mba Mwawi Awo Wakuchita   
 BLESSED ARE THEY THAT DO

  **1.**   
  Pulika mazgu gha mponoski,

 Mbulakupwerera kumbuka kuti,

  **Chorus:**   
 Mba mwawi wakuchita marango,   
 Mwe mba mwawi 'mwe mba Iwawi   
 Mba mwaWi wakuchita marango,   
 Mwe mba mwawi wakuchita.

  **2.**   
  Nanga tipulike marango,   
 na maphangano gha Fumu,   
 Nupuika kwekha ntha kungathaska,   
 mba mwawi awo wakucha.

  **3.**   
  Wamkunjira mu msumba wura,   
 wambula uheni, nyifwa,   
 Wamtuwiskika kwa muyirayira,

title: 111 Palije Mubwezi Nga Yesu
markdown:
### 111 Palije Mubwezi Nga Yesu   
NO, NOT ONE

  **1.**   
  Palije mubwezi nga ndi Yesu,

 Palije ng'anga yingatichizga,

  **Chorus:**   
 Yesu wakutimanya suzgo,   
 Watirongozgenge kose,   
 Palije mubwezi nga ndi Yesu,   
 Palje, palje.

  **2.**   
  Palije m'bwezi mtu a nga ndiyo,   
 palije, palije,   
 Palije wakuzika nga ndiyo,   
 palije, palije.

  **3.**   
  Palije nyengo wakutisida,   
 palije, palije,   
 Nanga chisi chingatizingizga,   
 palije, palije.

title: 112 Lawiska Kwa Yesu
markdown:
### 112 Lawiska Kwa Yesu    
 LIFE IN A LOOK  **1.**   
  Lawiska kwa Yesu pa mphinjika,    
 Uti usange umoyo,    
 Vyuma vya m'charu n'vyakumala,    
 Vyambula kumala n'vya kwa Yesu.  **Chorus:**   
 PakuLa iska Yesu pakuwona mphinjika,    
 Tkusanga umoyo pakuwona mphinjika   
 ('mwe mphinjika).  **2.**   
  Apo nkhati ndamla iska Yesu,    
 Fumu yikamwemwetera,    
 Para viyezgo vyan'zingizga, nhinika.    
 Nkhongono nkhusanga pa mphinjika.  **3.**   
  N'lawiske mphinjika nyengo zose    
 Na kumugomezga Yesu,    
 Palije wangawa m'viyezgo,    
 Para wakugomezga mwa Yesu.

title: 113 Mwakupepeka Yesu Wakuchema
markdown:
### 113 Mwakupepeka Yesu Wakuchema    
 CALLING

  **1.**   
  Mwakupepeka Yesu wakuchema,   
 Mpulike mazgu ghake,   
 Wakulindizga pa m'ryango wa mtima,   
 Wakulindizga imwe.

  **Refrain:**   
 Zaninge kwinu mwa wakuvuka zaninge,   
 Mwakukondwa Yesu wakumchemani,   
 Iwe wamheni zanga.

  **2.**   
  Tingachedwanga Yesu waku eya,

 Tingakananga lusungu lwa Fumu,

  **3.**   
  Nyengo ya wezi wake yikumala,

 Masuzgo na nyifwa sono vikwiza,

  **4.**   
  Gnanaghana za chitemwa watipa,

 Tiri kunanga watigowokera,

title: 114 Kuli Chipata Chamwazi
markdown:
### 114 Kuli Chipata Chamwazi    
 THE GATE AJAR FOR ME

  **1.**   
  Kuli chipata chamwazi

 Mu mphinga mukuvumbukwa

  **Refrain:**   
 Ndusungu Lwa Fumu Yesu,   
 PakundijuLira ine,   
 Ine, ine pa kundijuLira.

  **2.**   
  Chipata wakujulira wanthu

  **3.**   
  Njiraninge pa chipata

 Pokererani mu mphinga

  **4.**   
  Mphinga tamkuwuthulira

title: 115 Ng'anga Yikuru
markdown:
### 115 Ng'anga Yikuru   
 THE GREAT PHYSICIAN

  **1.**   
  Ng'anga yikuru ndi Yesu,

 Kupembuzga wavitima,

  **Refrain:**   
 Zina Lake ndiweme,   
 Zina Lakutowa 'mwe,   
 Zina La kukondweska,   
 Yesu, inya, Yesu.

  **2.**   
  Nchindi kwa mwanamberere,

 Nkhutemwa mponoski Yesu,

  **3.**   
  Zina lake ndilo pera,

 Nkhutemwa kulipulika,   
 zina la Yesu m'weme.

  **4.**   
  Pakwiza na mphumphu yane,

 Tamkukhala pamo nayo,

title: 116 Mtima Wazotofyeka
markdown:
### 116 Mtima Wazotofyeka   
 NOTHING FOR JESUS

  **1.**   
  Mtima wazotofyeka Yesu walije malo?   
 Vya charu vyakukaka Yesu walije malo?   
 Hena wima pa m'ryango wakukhung'uska

  **2.**   
  Ukutayaso nyengo ntha ukugwira nchito,   
 Nkhongono watayaso ntha ukugwira nchito,   
 Ntha ukurwa na m'rwani undapepeke wanthu,   
 Wanji ntha ukuwezga mlimo wa Yesu 'lije.

  **3.**   
  Wademwera m'vyya charu nyengo ya Yesu "lije,   
 Mlimo ntha ukuchita nyengo ya Yesu e,   
 vatemwa vyuma m'charu ivyo n'vyawakaweka,   
 Ukujitemwa navyo nyengo ya Yesu 'lije

  **4.**   
  we uli mahamba ulije na vipasi,   
 Ntha wamkukondwa kura pakukawona Yesu.   
 Nchinda nazo ulije ulijeso vipasi,   
 namba nazo ulije undatewete mlimo

title: 117 Ndapulika Mazgu Fumu
markdown:
### 117 Ndapulika Mazgu Fumu   
 I AM COMING, LORD

  **1.**   
  Ndapulika mazgu,   
 Fumu mkundichema,

  **Chorus:**   
 E! nkhwiza, Fumu,

  **2.**   
  Ndingawa lusoko

  **3.**   
  Yesu mkundichema

 Chigomezgo na mutende

  **4.**   
  Nkhuwonga mphinjika   
 nkhurumba uchizi,   
 Nkhutamika Khristu,   
 Fumu wakupa urunji.

title: 118 Yesu Wamala Mulandu Wane
markdown:
### 118 Yesu Wamala Mulandu Wane   
 JESUS PAID IT ALL

  **1.**   
  Mponoski wakuti,   
 "Ulije nkhongono,   
 Lindizga mkuromba,

  **Refrain:**   
 Yesu wamaLa

  **2.**   
  Mwa Imwe nkhusanga

  **3.**   
  Ndilije kaweme

 Ndisuke chivwalo

  **4.**   
  Pa chizumbe chake

 Mmalundi gha Fumu

title: 119 Nkhuwona Ndopa Za Yesu
markdown:
### 119 Nkhuwona Ndopa Za Yesu   
 THE CLEANSING WAVE

  **1.**   
  Nkhuwona ndopa za Yesu,

  **Refrain:**

 Nkhuwonga zikundisuka,

  **2.**   
  Ndine chilengiwa chiphya,

  **3.**   
  Nkhwenda m'ungweru wa Fumu,

  **4.**   
  Uchizi wakuzizwiska

title: 120 Wadada Nkhujipereka
markdown:
### 120 Wadada Nkhujipereka   
 I DO BELIEVE

  **1.**   
  Wadada nkhujipereka wovwiri ndilije,

  **Chorus:**

  **2.**   
  Nkhugomezga mwana winu mrongore nkhongono,

  **3.**   
  Mwene chigomezgo ndimwe ndilawiske kwinu,

title: 121 Ndimbenge Vya Yesu
markdown:
### 121 Ndimbenge Vya Yesu

  **1.**   
  Ndimbenge (ndimbenge) vya chitemwa

 Wakasi (wakasi) da kuchanya kwizakandifwira.

  **Refrain:**

 Wakaftwa (wakafwa) kundithaska, Ndimbenge wakun temwa.

  **2.**   
  Ndichali (ndichali) ndi ndam'manye   
 Yesu wa (Yesu wa) kand'linira,   
 Ndichali (ndichali) ndi ndam rombe wakandirombera.

  **3.**   
  Ukunu (ukuru) wa chitemwa

 Uheni (uheni) wane wose ungatuwiskika.

  **4.**   
  Palje (palije) na kaweme

 Iyo wa(iyo wa) kunditemwa nane ndimutemwe.

title: 122 Ndidze Pafupi Namwe Fumu
markdown:
### 122 Ndidze Pafupi Namwe Fumu   
 NEARER, STILL NEARER

  **1.**   
   Ndize pafupi namwe Fumu,   
 Mtaski m'ndiguze ndimwe muweme,   
 M'ndivumbatire mwoko linu,   
 M'ndivikilire mu mtende winu,   
 M'ndivikilire mu mtende winu.

  **2.**   
  Wambula kanthu ndize kwinu,   
 Ndilje chakumupani imwe,   
 Uheni pera m'mtima wane,   
 Mundisukem'ndopa zinu Fumu,   
 Mundisukem'ndopa zinu Fumu.

  **3.**   
  Ndize pafupi ndiwe winu,   
 Uheni wose sono ndaleka,   
 Na vyakukondweska umoyo,   
 Mundipe Yesu wakandifwira,   
 Mundipe Yesu wakandifwira.

  **4.**   
  Ndize pafupi ndawamoyo,   
 Mpaka nkhafike ku uchindami,   
 Ndende m'migonezi yakofya,   
 Pafupi namwe mponoski wane   
 Pafupi namwe mponoski wane

title: 123 Zina Lakuruska M'chanya
markdown:
### 123 Zina Lakuruska M'chanya   
 THE HOLIEST NAME

  **1.**   
  Zina lakuruska m'chanya

 Ndilo Dada wakamuthya

  **Chorus:**   
 Zina Litu via mwe (Litu wa)

 WakaLipharazgaso wangeLo   
 Pa usiku wura ('mwe zina)

 NdiLo La Yesu Kananda.

  **2.**   
    Zina lakupa thumbiko

 Nditiphalire wanyake   
 za chitemwa cha Fumu.

  **3.**   
  Moyo wane uti wimbe   
 za chitemwa cha Fumu,   
 Nditi nditamike zina   
 lakuruska ghanyake.

title: 124 Yesu Pera Wakwezgeke
markdown:
### 124 Yesu Pera Wakwezgeke   
 NOT I, BUT CHRIST

  **1.**   
  Ndikweze Yesu yekha m'zinthu zonse;   
 Amveke, aoneke yekhayo;   
 Mu ntchito, m'maganizo ndipo m'mau,   
 Ambuye aoneke yekhayo.

  **2.**   
  Ndi Yesu atonthoza akulira,   
 Yekhayo angachotse msoziwo;   
 Yekhayo angatule akatundu,   
 Yekhayo angachotse manthawo.

  **3.**   
  Ndileke mau onse ena chabe,   
 Ndileke zakupusa zangazo;   
 Ndikweze Yesu, ndisanyade konse,   
 Ndisadzitame, koma lyeyo.

  **4.**   
  Ndi Khristu amapatsa 'ne zosowa.   
 Ndi yekha amapatsa mphamvunso.   
 Yekhayo m'thupi, m'moyo, ndi mu mzimu   
 Ndi Khristu yekha nthawi zonsezo.

title: 125 Pali Zuwa Pa Lupiri
markdown:
### 125 Pali Zuwa Pa Lupiri    
 SUNLIGHT IN THE HEART

  **1.**   
  Pali zuwa pa lupiri pali zuwa pa nyanja,   
 Ungweru ukuwoneka na pa utheka wuwo.   
 Kweni ungweru ukulu uli mu mtima wane,   
 Fumu mukukhala mumo mbungweru winu pera.

  **Chorus:**   
 Ungweru, ungweru wa zu wa,   
 Ungweru wa mu mtima,   
 Yesu wafumye chitima,   
 MuLi zuwa mu mtima.

  **2.**   
  Ndati ndireke chitima na vyakuvwala vyane,   
 Mndivwalikenge chimwemwe nakundipa 'ne nchindi,   
 Ndipo kwithu kwa kutowa uko mwandinozgera,   
 Nkhukhumbiska kufikako nditimrondezganinge.

  **3.**   
  Fumu yane mwandigula umoyo wane ngwinu,   
 Nyali ya chitemwa chinu yimgolerani imwe,   
 Ndipo kwithu kwa kutowa uko mwandinozgera,   
 Nkhukhumbiska kufikako nditimrondezganinge.

title: 126 Ndina Sumu Nkhuyitemwa
markdown:
### 126 Ndina Sumu Nkhuyitemwa    
 SINCE I HAVE BEEN REDEEMED

  **1.**   
  Ndina sumu nkhuyitemwa   
 Ndati ndawombokwa,   
 Ya mponoski, mtaski. Fumu   
 Ndati ndawombokwa.

  **Refrain:**   
 Ndati ndawombokwa   
 Ndati ndawombokwa,   
 N'chindike zina Lake,   
 Ndati ndawombokwa    
 Ndam'chindika zina La Fumu.

  **2.**   
  Khristu wakundikhutiska   
 Ndati ndawombokwa,   
 Ndichite khumbiro lake   
 Ndati ndawombokwa.

  **3.**   
  W Ndinal kaboni muweme   
 Ndati ndawombokwa,   
 Wakuchimbizga nkhayiko   
 Ndati ndawombokwa.

  **4.**   
  Wandinozg chikaya   
 Ndati ndawombokwa,   
 Uko ndamkhala kwandan   
 Ndati ndawombokwa.

title: 127 Wakunditemwaso
markdown:
### 127 Wakunditemwaso    
 HE LOVES ME TOO

  **1.**   
  Chiuta wakupwerera tuyuni twa m'dera,   
 Usange wakututemwa wakunditemwaso.

  **Chorus:**   
 Wakutemwa, wakutemwa,   
 wakutemwa ine, Wakutemwa tunthu

  **2.**   
  Wakutozga tumaluwa kuti tununkhire,   
 Wakututemweska nadi wakunditemwaso.

  **3.**   
  Chiuta wakalenga tuyuni na vya m'charu,   
 Ntha wawaluwenge ana wakutemwa wose.

title: 128 Pa Nyengo Ya Lurombo
markdown:
### 128 Pa Nyengo Ya Lurombo    
 BLESSED HOUR OF PRAYER

  **1.**   
  Pa nyengo ya lurombo mukusopa kwithu,   
 Pakongana kwa Yesu, mtaski na m'bwezi,   
 Para tiza kwa lyo wativikilire,   
 Wakuvuka pumula nkhuwenme kuromba.

  **Refrain:**   
 Nadi njiweme nyengo ya rombo,   
 Tisange chipumuLo nkhuweme kuromba.

  **2.**   
  Pa nyengo ya lurombo mutaski mphafupi,   
 Na mtima  wakutemwa  wapulikenge,   
 Wakuti timthulire vyakwenjezga vithu,   
 Wakuvuka pumula nkhuweme kuromba.

  **3.**   
  Pa nyengo ya lurombo kwa wakuyezgeka,   
 Wakum'phalira mtaski vitima vyawo,   
 Na mtima wa lusungu wakusezga suzgo,   
 Isange chipumulo nkhuweme kuromba.

  **4.**   
  Pa nyengo ya lurombo timgomezge iyo,   
 Vitumbiko vya Fumu tipokerenge,   
 Na chigomezgo chose titaye masuzgo,   
 chipumulo nkhuweme kuromba.

title: 129 Yesu Mkapangana
markdown:
### 129 Yesu Mkapangana    
 JESUS, COME AND BLESS

  **1.**   
  Yesu mkapangana kuli kose 'mwe,   
 Watatu wongana muti muweko,   
 Tikumgomezgani kumtamikani,   
 Yesu mtitumbike mujirongore.

  **Chorus:**   
 Yesu mtitumbike pakumsopani,   
 Yesu mtitumbike muwe pafupi.   


  **2.**   
  Yesu mwawa nase kunyuma kose,   
 Tikumukhumbani muwenge nase,   
 Mwize imwe mtaski m lusungu winu,   
 Mtipulike ise mutitumbike.

  **3.**   
  Yesu mutovwire timwimbireni,   
 Mukuromba kwithu imwe mpulike,   
 Chigomezgo chithu m'chikuzge ndimwe,   
 Mutipe chitemwa m'ungweru winu.

title: 130 Ndine Winu Fumu
markdown:
### 130 Ndine Winu Fumu    
 I AM THINE, O LORD

  **1.**   
  Ndine winu ndapulika mazgu,   
 Mwe gha chitemwa chinu,   
 Nkhunweka kwima mu chigomezgo,   
 M'ndiguzire kwa imwe.

  **Chorus:**   
 M'ndiguzire (kwinu) kufupi namwe,   
 Na kumphinjika yinu,   
 M'ndiguzire kwinu 'mwe Fumu yane,   
 Ku ndopa zikathika.

  **2.**   
  Mndipatulire ku mimo winu,   
 M'nkhongono za uchizi,   
 Ndimdodoliskeni imwe Fumu,   
 Mumakhumbiro ghinu.

  **3.**   
  Nkhudoka kuwa na nyengo namwe,   
 Pa chizumbe kuchanya,   
 Pakujikamira imwe Fumu,   
 Nga mubwezi na mnyake.

  **4.**   
  Za ukuru wa chitemwa chinu,   
 Ndam manyira kusirya,   
 Nkhutondeka kuphala chimwemwe,   
 Mpaka nkhafike kura.

title: 131 Ndikozgane Na Yesu
markdown:
### 131 Ndikozgane Na Yesu    
 MORE LIKE JESUS

  **1.**   
  Ndikozgane na Yesu Fumu yiwe mwa ine,   
 Yindizuzge na mtende nakundipa kufwasa,   
 Ndikozgane na Yesu nda myeni m'charu ichi,   
 Ndamkavu mu uzimu Yesu mkhale mwa ine.

  **2.**   
  Wakupwerera mpheta na wachaholi wuwo,   
 Wakusunga tuyuni nadi wandipulike,   
 Wan'sambizgenge nkhalo nakundigowokera,   
 Ndiwe wakufikapo Yesu mkhale mwa ine.

  **3.**   
  Ndimukozge mkuromba ndimkozge dazi lose,   
 Ndipumule mwa iyo ku maji ghakudama,   
 Ndababiwa mwa iyo m'chitemwa ndiwe wake,   
 Ndiwe na chigomezgo Yesu mkhale mwa ine.

title: 132 Yesu Mndisungilire Ku Mphinjika
markdown:
### 132 Yesu Mndisungilire Ku Mphinjika    
 NEAR THE CROSS

  **1.**   
  Yesu m'ndisungilire ku mphinjika yinu,   
 Uko kukufumira mronga wakuchizga.

  **Chorus:**   
 Mmphinjika, mmphinjika muwe uchindami,   
 Ndisuke ndifikenge m'charu cha kusirya.

  **2.**   
  Nda munthu wa chitenthe nkhasangamo wezi,   
 Nyenyezi ya mulenji yikandiwalira.

  **3.**   
  Mu mphinjika a Yesu, mwana wa Chiuta,   
 ndovwire ndendengemo mu mufwiri wake.

  **4.**   
  Ndilindilire mumo, kugomezga ruta,   
 Noisuke ndifikemo m'charu cha kusilya.

title: 133 Ndendenge Namwe Chiuta
markdown:
### 133 Ndendenge Namwe Chiuta    
 WALKING WITH GOD

  **1.**   
  Ndendenge namwe Chiuta,   
 nga ndi Enoki wakenda,   
 Mundikore woko lane   
 muyowoyenge na ine,   
 Nanga nkhuwona nthowa   
 cha kweni ndendenge na imwe

  **2.**   
  Ntha nkhukhumba kwenda   
 ndekha mayigha ghakwera mchanya,   
 Vipingo viri mu   
 nthowa warwani wandizingizga,   
 Muyichetamiske nyanja Fumu,   
 ndendenge na imwe.

  **3.**   
  Para mwandikora woko   
 vya charu vyosenvyawaka,   
 Nditi ndende na kudina   
 ndembera ya mtaski m chanya.   
 Mpaka nkhafike kuchanya Fumu,   
 ndendenge na imwe.

title: 134 Chitemwa Cha Fumu Yesu
markdown:
### 134 Chitemwa Cha Fumu Yesu    
 WONDERFULLOVE OF JESUS

  **1.**   
  Na mutima wane wose   
 nkhuchemerezga mukwimba,   
 Ndi njani uyo wangimba   
 za chitemwa cha Fumu Yesu.

  **Refrain:**   
 Mwe chitemwa cha mponoski,   
 Nchakuzizwiska nadi,   
 Mwe chitemwa cha mponoski,   
 nchakuzizwiska nadi.

  **2.**   
  Chikundipa mtende ine   
 m'chisi chikupa ungweru,   
 Mvyakuwinya chikuchizga chitemwa   
 cha mponoski wane.

  **3.**   
  Chikundipa chigomezgo   
 chikundikhozga pa nthowa Mumoyo,   
 m'nyifwa, nchitemwa   
 chakuzizwiska cha mponosk.

title: 135 Nkhumutemwani Mwe Fum
markdown:
### 135 Nkhumutemwani Mwe Fum    
 I LOVE THEE BETTER, LORD

  **1.**   
  Nkhumutemwani 'mwe Fumu   
 Kwakuruska vyose,   
 Chifukwa mwandipa ine   
 Mutende 'wo ngwinu.

  **Chorus:**   
 WandavumbuLe 'mwe vyose (mwe vyose)   
 Vya uchizi wake   
 WandavumbuLe 'mwe vyose ('mwe vyose).   
 Wanditozga ine ('mwe ine).

  **2.**   
  Mukhale pafupi nane Kwakuruska wose, Nkhum'ghanaghanani imwe,   
 Kwakuruska vyose.

  **3.**   
  Mwandikondweska 'mwe Fumu,   
 Nkhusekera nadi,   
 Kwambura uchizi winu,   
 Ntha nditi ndikondwe.

  **4.**   
  A Fumu mponoski wane,   
 Para mkwenda nane,   
 Mazuwa ghose pacharu,   
 Ndisangwenge nadi.

title: 136 Nkhukumbukira Kalvari
markdown:
### 136 Nkhukumbukira Kalvari    
 I REMEMBER CALVARY

  **1.**   
  Uko wandirongozgenge   
 ndirutenge ndamgomezga,   
 Nkhukumbukiraso kuti   
 wakatwa kundiwombola.

  **Chorus:**   
 Yesu wandirongozgenge   
 warongozge Lwendo Lose,   
 Ndi m bwezi wane   
 muweme nkhukumbukira kalvan.

  **2.**   
  Nkhulitemwa dango lake   
 nkhutemwa wandirongozge,   
 Knumbiro lake ndichite   
 ndatuwiskika na ndopa.

  **3.**   
  Nkhuruta kwambula wofi   
 mponoski wali patupl,   
 AUgomezga nda kum 'wona   
 Yesu mbwezi wa mphinjikea.

title: 137 Charu Mtole, mndipe Yesu
markdown:
### 137 Charu Mtole, mndipe Yesu    
 GIVE ME JESUS

  **1.**   
  Charu mtole, mndipe Yesu,   
 vya m'charu 'mwe n'vyawaka,   
 Chitemwa chake nchikuru,   
 nchakukhalirira swi!

  **Chorus:**   
 Lusungu Lwake ndukuru,   
 chitemwa chakuruska,   
 Chiponosko chakuzuLa,   
 umoyo myirayira.

  **2.**   
  Charu mtole, mndipe Yesu,   
 wakundisanguluska,   
 Mtaski wakundipwerera,   
 mmasuzgo nditimbenge.

  **3.**   
  Charu mtole, mndipe Yesu,   
 wakundimwemwetera,   
 M'lwendo lwane lwa uzimu   
 wakungweruska nthowa.

  **4.**   
  Charu mtole, mndipe Yesu,   
 ndigomezge mphinjika,   
 Pa umaliro kuchanya,   
 nkhawone Fumu yane.

title: 138 Nkhujipereka Kwinu
markdown:
### 138 Nkhujipereka Kwinu    
 ENTIRE CONSECRATION

  **1.**   
  Mtole umoyo wane,   
 nkhujipereka kwinu.   
 Mtole mnawoko ghane,   
 ghachite khumbo linu

  **Chorus:**   
 Mundisuke Fumu   
 mu ndopa ('mwe mundopa),   
 M'ndichizge mchiziwa    
cha ndopa (za ku chizga).   
 Nkhujipereka yose kwinu, Fumu,   
 Kwa imwe nyengo zose

  **2.**   
  Mtole malundi ghane,   
 ghachimbilire imwe,   
 Mtole mazgu ndimbenge,   
 ndimwimbireni Fumu.

     
**3.**   
  Mtole milomo yane,   
 yizule na uthenga,   
 Mtoleso chuma chane,   
 nd'reke kusunga kanthu.

  **4.**   
  Mutole nyengo yane,   
 kuti ndimtamikeni,   
 Mtole vinjeru vyane,   
 ndichite mlimo winu.

  **5.**   
  Mtole khumbiro lane,   
 mulizgore la imwe,   
 Mtoleso mtima wane,   
 mukhalenge mwa ine.

  **6.**   
  Mtole chitemwa chane,   
 ndiwe m'malundi ghinu,   
 Mnditole yose ndiwe winu,   
 nyengo zose swi!

title: 139 Ndasanga Mbwezi
markdown:
### 139 Ndasanga Mbwezi    
 IVE FOUND A FRIEND

  **1.**   
  Ndasanga m'bwezi muweme,   
 wakanditemwa kale,   
 Wakandiguza m'chitemwa   
 kundifiska kwa iyo,   
 Mtima wane ngwake nadi,   
 ntha tingalekanaso,   
 Ndine wake iyo ngwane,   
 kwa muyirayira swi!

  **2.**   
  Ndasanga m'bwezi muweme,   
 wakafwa kundithaska,   
 Wakapereka umoyo,   
 na iyo mwene m'mphinga,   
 Palije na kamo nkhane,   
 kweni vyose n'vya Fumu,   
 Mtima, mphavu, 'moyo   
 vyose n'vyake kwamyirayira.

  **3.**   
  Ndasanga m'bwezi muweme,   
 nkhongono zose n'zake,   
 Kundivikilira m'nthowa,   
 kundifiska kuchanya,   
 Uchindami uli m'nthazi,   
 kundikhwimiska ine,   
Sono ndirwe, nditewete   
 kunthazi nkhapumule.

  **4.**   
  Ndasanga m'bwezi muweme   
 wa lusungu, m'neneska.   
 Ndi mrongozgi wa vinjeru   
 m vikilin wa mphavu,   
 Kwa uyo wakunditemwa,   
 ntha nditipatukeko,   
 Pa umoyo panji mnyifwa,   
 ndine wake kwandanda.

title: 140 Mazgu Gha Yesu
markdown:
### 140 Mazgu Gha Yesu    
 THE VOICE OF JESUS

  **1.**   
  Mazgu gha Yesu ghakati,   
 "Iza upumule,   
 Gona, wakuvuka iwe,   
 nyekezga pa ine."   
 Nkhiza kwa iyo umo   
 ndiliri wakuvuka,   
 Mwa iyo nkhasanga   
 mtende wandisanguluska.

  **2.**   
  Mazgu gha Yesu ghakati,   
 'Nkhupereka waka,   
 Mai gna umoyo umwe,   
 pokelera umwe.   
 NKhiza kwa Yesu na   
 kumwa mu mronga wa moyo,   
 Nyota yikamala sono   
 nkhukhala mwa iyo.

  **3.**   
  Mazgu gha Yesu ghakati,   
 "Ndine nyali m'charu,   
 Lawiska kwa ine   
 kuti kukungwerukire.   
 Nkhalawiska Yesu na   
 kusangako ungweru,   
 Ndipo mu ungwe uwo   
 nditi ndendemo swi!

title: 141 Ndiwe Winu Nkhanira
markdown:
### 141 Ndiwe Winu Nkhanira    
 WHOLLY THINE

  **1.**   
  Ndiwe winu nkhanira,   
 Fumu mundisambizgenge,   
 Ndichitenge khumbiro   
 linu mundovwirenge.

  **Chorus:**   
 Nd'we winu (Fumu),   
 nd'ie winu (Fumu),   
 Ndiwe winu nkhuromba,   
 Ndwe winu (Fumu),   
 nd've winu (Fumu).   
 Ndiwe wa Imwe sono.

  **2.**   
  Kasi usambazi nkhavichi   
 kwambura 'mwe Fumu?   
 Nditi ndivilekenge   
 vyose ndize kwa imwe.

  **3.**   
  Apo nkhuvileka vya    
m'charu m'we nane pafupi,   
 Ndisangenge vyose kwa   
 imwe nd'sangulukenge.

title: 142 Kutowa Dazi Lituwa
markdown:
### 142 Kutowa Dazi Lituwa    
 HOW SWEET

  **1.**   
  Kutowa dazi lituwa   
 ndakuruska ghose,   
 Tireke vya charu vyose    
tikhumbe kuchanya.

  **2.**   
  Mwe kutowa kumusopa   
 tigowokereke,   
 Na chigomezgo tinene,   
 "Dada mwa kuchanya".

  **3.**   
  Kunozga kup'lika mazgu   
 uyo gham'fikira,   
 Ghavwire awo wazgoka   
 pakuya kuchanya.

  **4.**   
  Usange tekha kwananga   
 tatondeka K'reka,   
 Ndi Fumu yithu   
 Yesu pera wangatisuka.

title: 143 Fumu Mutendeske Tose
markdown:
### 143 Fumu Mutendeske Tose    
 LORD DISMISS US

  **1.**   
  Fumu mutendeske tose na vitumbiko vinu,   
 Tose muchitemwa chinu tkondwe taponoskeka,   
 Mupamphuske, mtipamphuske pa kwenda m charu ichi.

  **2.**   
  Tikutamika 'mwe Fumu chifukwa cha uthenga,   
 Chawanangwa cha chiponosko chinu chiwe nase,   
 Tigomezge Imwe Fumu tende mu unenesko.

  **3.**   
  Umoyo withu 'mwe Fumu tikumupani Imwe,   
 Mutikhwimiskenge tose tingavukanga chara,   
 Mpaka tizakamwonani mu uchindami winu.

title: 144 Nkhulutirira Munthazi
markdown:
### 144 Nkhulutirira Munthazi    
 HIGHER GROUND

  **1.**   
  Nkhulutirira munthazi,   
 nkhukwera dazi na dazi,   
 Nkhukwera uku nkhuromba   
 mundifikiske pachanya.

  **Chorus:**   
 Mundikwezge ndimiLire   
 m'chigomezgo cha kuchanya,   
 Pa maLo apo ndafika   
 Fumu mndijinthe pachanya.

  **2.**   
  Mutima ntha ukukhumba,   
 uko kuli vyakwenjezga,   
 Nanga wanji wangawako,   
 chirato chane mphachanya.

  **3.**   
  Ndikhalilire pachanya,   
 nanga mrwani wangathaza,   
 Chigomezg ndiri nacho   
 ndamkwimba nawo watuwa.

  **4.**   
  Nkhukhu humbiska nkhafikeko   
 kukawona uchindami,   
 Ndirombenge nkhafikeko,   
 mndirongozgere pachanya.

title: 145 Mngakananga Mlimo
markdown:
### 145 Mngakananga Mlimo    
 ASK NOT TO BE EXCUSED

  **1.**   
  M'ngakananga mlimo, mlimo wa Chiuta,   
 Nozgekeraninge kutumika kose,   
 Wakumuchemani na nchemo yiweme,   
 Mzomereni iyo kumutewetera.

  **Chorus:**   
 Zaninge m 'ngakananga mLimo,   
 Zaninge mumutewetere,   
 M'ngakananga mLimo mLimo wa Chiuta.   
 MuLutenge kose uko wakukhumba.

  **2.**   
  M'ngakananga mlimo, Fumu yikuchema,   
 Wamkana kanandi sono mpulikire,   
 Mbuto m'minda zacha wavuni mbachoko   
 Mukondwe kuchita mulimo wa Fumu.

  **3.**   
  M'ngakananga mlimo, m'ngaziulikanga,   
 Pakukana mlimo, chitemwa palije,   
 Mu lusungu lwake, walongozge nthowa,   
 Yesu nkhoswe yithu, watigowokenge.

title: 146 Mkhale Mkati Mwa Ine
markdown:
### 146 Mkhale Mkati Mwa Ine    
 THY LIFE WITHIN ME

  **1.**   
  Mkhale mkati mwa ine,   
 themba la mathemba,   
 Mundipe imwe zgoro   
 la mafumbo ghane,   
 Mkhale mkati mwa ine,   
 ndiwe winu m'vyose,   
 Ndiwe chilongolero   
 cha ukuru winu.

  **2.**   
  Mnyumba ya mtima wane   
 mwasuka kwananga,   
 Na uchindami winu   
 mndiwalire mkati,   
 Charu chikhale chete,   
 thupi lane liwe,   
 Muzga winu muweme,   
 kuchita vya imwe.

  **3.**   
  Viwaro vyane vyose   
 vimpulikireni, kwinu,   
 Muchite navyo vyose   
 mukukhumba kwinu,   
 Ndingenjerwanga chara   
 panji kutambula,   
 Pake kugongowa   
 panji kukhuwara.

  **4.**   
  Nditi ndipumuzgike   
 ku visuzyo vose   
 Kuti mlangule ndimwe para   
 mndikhumbenge,   
 Mkhale mkati mwa ine,   
 themba la mathemba,   
 Mundipe imwe zgoro   
 la mafumbo ghane.

title: 147 Dada Mndiguzire Kwa Imwe
markdown:
### 147 Dada Mndiguzire Kwa Imwe    
 DRAW ME CLOSER TO THEE

  **1.**   
  Dada mndiguzire kwa imwe,   
 mundikumbatire,   
 Mndivumbatire Fumu yane,   
 kuti ndipumule.

  **Chorus:**   
  **S/A:**   
 Mchitemwa chinu Fumu   
 mndiguzire kwa imwe,   
  **T/B:**   
 Muchitemwa cha imwe Fumu,   
 nadi mndiguzire kwa imwe,   
  **S/A:**   
 Mundi-gu-j-e kwinu kuchanya   
  **T/B:**   
 Mchiterwa chinu Fumu   
 mndiguzire kwa imwe,   
 mndiguzire kuchanya.

  **2.**   
  Yesu mndiguzire kwa imwe,   
 ndingamlekaninge,   
 Ndimanye muli nane nadi,   
 ndileke kuzgewa.

  **3.**   
  Mzimu mndiguzire kwa imwe,   
 ndilingane namwe,   
 Mnditozge, mndisavye ku mtima   
 kuti ndituwe tu!

title: 148 Kuli Kose Na Yesu
markdown:
### 148 Kuli Kose Na Yesu    
 ANYWHERE WITH JESUS

  **1.**   
  Kuli kose na Yesu, ndilutenge,   
 Kuli kose uko wandirongozge,   
 Kwambura iyo kukondwa palije   
 Kuli kose na Yesu ndope chara.

  **Refrain:**   
 Inya kose kose ntha ndiwopenge,   
 Kuli kose na Yesu ndiLutenge

  **2.**   
  Kuli kose nayo ntha ndiwe ndekha,   
 abwezi wanji ntha wangandovwira,   
 Woko lake likovwira m'masuzgo   
 Kuli kose na Yesu ndimtamike.

  **3.**   
  Kuli kose na Yesu ndigonenge,   
 Para vimasuzgo vyandizingizga,   
 Nditi ndiwuke ntha ndiyingeso,   
 Kuli kose na Yesu ndiko kwithu.

title: 149 Enda M'ungweru wa Fumu
markdown:
### 149 Enda M'ungweru wa Fumu    
 WALK IN THE LIGHT

  **1.**   
  Endam'ungweru wa Fumu,   
 Wakukurongozga,   
 Mzimu Mtuwa watumika,   
 Kuchimbizga chisi.

  **Chorus:**   
 Enda m'ungweru,   
 (Enda m ungweru wakutowa wa Fumu),   
 Enda mungweru,   
 (Enda m'ungweru wakutowa wa Fumu),   
 Enda m'ungweru,   
 (Enda mungweru wakutowa wa Fumu),   
 Mu ungweru wa Chiuta.

  **2.**   
  Enda m'ungweru wa mazgu,   
 Gha Chiuta mwene,   
 Mbungweru kwa wose awo,   
 wakumugomezga.

  **3.**   
  Enda mungweru wa Fumu,   
 Nanga kuwe chisi,   
 Chisi chizamkuchimbira,   
 Pakwiza kwa Fumu.

title: 150 Okwe! Kasi Wavuni Walinkhu?
markdown:
### 150 Okwe! Kasi Wavuni Walinkhu?    
 WHERE ARE THE REAPERS?

  **1.**   
  Okwe! kasi wavuni walinkhu?   
 Wavune uweme m'charu ichi,   
 Mu unenesko wateetenge,   
 watoketoke vuna yimale.

  **Chorus:**   
 Ka mwa wavuni n 'njani wize,   
 Tovwirane pakuwezga vyakurya,   
 Wavwire n'njani pa kuronga?   
 Nchinda ziweme m'charu ichi.

  **2.**   
  Rutani m'wapenje mu zinthowa,   
 Trigu walimo mkati mu dulu,   
 Mpenjeso waliyose mi' wagurwe,   
 Muunganyire wose kuchanya.

  **3.**   
  Mu minda yose vyakurya vyacha,   
 Charu chikulindilira vuna,   
 Wavuni mbachoko mlimo ng' kuru,   
 Para tachedwa vinangikenge

  **4.**   
  Zani na vikwanju imwe mose,   
 Muunganye pamoza vyakurya,   
 Mtoketoke mpaka Fumu yize,   
 Kuti mkakondwe nayo kuchanya.

title: 151 Nkhughanaghana Za Charu Chakutowva
markdown:
### 151 Nkhughanaghana Za Charu Chakutowva    
 WILL THERE BE ANY STARS

  **1.**   
  Nkhughanaghana za charu chakutowa,   
 Ndamfikako pa umaliro,   
 M'wezi wake, ndamkwima pamo na Fumu,   
 Kasi mphumphu yane ya m'wala?

  **Chorus:**   
 Ka pam 'kuwa nyenyezi pa mphumphu yane   
 Para vinthu vyose vyamaLa? (vyamaLa)   
 NdamkhaLa na watuwa wose kuchanya,   
 Kasi mphumphu yane ya m'waLa? (ya mwaLa)

  **2.**   
  M'nkhongono za Fumu nditoketokenge,   
 Kuguzira myoyo kwa lyo,   
 Kuti nkhapokere nyenyezi zituwa,   
 Nakupokera vitumbiko.

  **3.**   
  'Mwe chamkuwa chimwemwe pakumuwona,   
 Na kuwa mu malundi ghake,   
 Chimwemwe cham'kula m'msumba wa golide,   
 Para mphumphu yane yam'wala.

title: 152 Myowoye Nane, Yesu
markdown:
### 152 Myowoye Nane, Yesu    
 SPEAK TO MY SOUL

  **1.**   
  M'yowoye nane, Yesu mazgu gha mutende,   
 Mndiphwepwerezge kuti "uli wekha chara,"   
 Jurani mtima wane ndimpulikireni,   
 Mzule mu mtima wane, kuti ndikondwenge.

  **Chorus:**   
 Mndiphwepwerezge, Fumu mu uchizi winu,   
 Uti utonde nadi utisutukenge"   
 M'yowoye nane, Fumu dazi liri lose,   
 Ndim pulikeni m'kuti, "uli wekha chara.

  **2.**   
  Yesu m'yowoye mazgu kwa tawana winu,   
 Kumlindizgani Imwe mutisambizgenge,   
 Kuti timpani Imwe ma umoyo ghithu,   
 Ufumu winu wize tizakam'woneni.

  **3.**   
  Mukalongora kale makhumbiro ghinu,   
 Vdimanye mlimo wane ndichite vya Imwe,   
 Ndim thuwuskeni Imwe ku mitundu yose,   
 Ndichite khur linu kwa madazi ghose.

title: 153 Fumu Ntha Nkhumurombani
markdown:
### 153 Fumu Ntha Nkhumurombani    
 JUST FOR TODAY

  **1.**   
  Fumu ntha nkhumurombani vya machero,   
 Mundithaske ku uheni mhanya uno,   
 Mndovwire m'kutokatoka na kuromba,   
 Ndichite lusungu m'mazgu m'hanya uno.

  **2.**   
  Mwampho m'khumbo lane chara, n'pulikire,   
 M'ndovwire nkhujipereka sono, Dada,   
 Ndireke kuyowoya mazgu ghaheni,   
 Mujale milomo yane dazi lose.

  **3.**   
  Mu nyengo ziheni Fumu, na ziweme,   
 Ndigomezgeke mwa Imwe sono, Dada,   
 Fumu ntha nkhumurombani vya machero,   
 Mndisunge mundirongozge mhanya uno.

title: 154 Mlinda Ndiphalire Za Mlenji
markdown:
### 154 Mlinda Ndiphalire Za Mlenji   
 WATCHMAN, TELL ME

  **1.**   
  Mlinda we undiphalire za mlenji kasi kwacha?   
 Vimanyikwiro vya kwiza kwake vikuoneka?   
 Inya, myeni, lawisiska wona ungweru mchanya,   
 Vwara vivwaro vya nthengwa kukucha sono wuka.

  **2.**   
  Mlinda ungweru ukuwalirawalira mnthowa,   
 Vimanyikwiro vya dazi lake vikuwoneka   
 Apo mbata yizamlira nakuwuska wakufwa,   
 walunji wizamkuwuskika wambura kuvunda.

  **3.**   
  Mlinda ungweru wafika wa uchindami wake,   
 Wose wapharazge kuti ufum'uli pafupi,   
 Myeni, nkhuwona kusirya Kenani wawoneka,   
 Msumba wakutowa nadi ukugadima kura.

  **4.**   
  Mlinda m 'msumba wa golide mu Ziyoni kuchanya,   
 Fumu m'uchindami wake yikuwusa kwandanda,   
 Kulije mhanya m'mapiri, kuwara mbuchindam,   
 Visimi kubwibwituka na maluwa kuzota.

  **5.**   
  Mlinda wona charu chira vipambi na maluwa,   
 Mwe kunozga 'mwe, kutowa nyumba zake kuchanya,   
 ka sumu ziweme zikwimbika mkukondwa,   
 Wona wanthu Vikwi vikwi, tamfika sono sono.

title: 155 Ndirute Uko Mukukhumba
markdown:
### 155 Ndirute Uko Mukukhumba   
 I WILL GO WHERE YOU WANT ME TO GO

  **1.**   
  Panji ntha kungawa ku phiri,   
 panji m'mayigha m'nyanja   
 Panji pakati pa chinkhondo,   
 mukukhumba ndirute,   
 Para wangandituma ine   
 ku charu cha wayeni,   
 Ndizomerenge mnkhongono zake,   
 ndirute ko mkukhumba.

  **Chorus:**   
 Ndirutenge uko mukukhumba,   
 Mphiri, m'dambo na munyanja   
 Ndiyowoyenge ivyo m'kukhumba,   
 Ndirondezgenge Mponoski.

  **2.**   
  Pali mazgu gha Fumu yane   
 ghakuti ndiyowoye,   
 Panji waliko wakwananga   
 wakusowa wovwiri,   
 Fumu para mwandirongozga visuzge viti uli,   
 Ndipharazgenge uthenga winu   
 kufiska khumbo linu.

  **3.**   
  Mwe nkhumanya malo ghaliko   
 mumunda wa wadada,   
 Ndichite mlimo wa kuvuna   
 wa Yesu muponoski,   
 Pakumugomezgani imwe,   
 nkhumanya mkunditemwa,   
 Ndichitenge khumbo linu Fumu,   
 ndiwe icho mkukhumba.

title: 156 Mazgu Ghakukwiya Chara
markdown:
### 156 Mazgu Ghakukwiya Chara   
 ANGRY WORDSI OH, LET THEM NEVER  **1.**   
  Mazgu ghakukwiya chara,   
 mungaghayowoyanga,   
 Mu mutima mujisuske,   
 milomo yiwule nthontho.

  Chitemwa nchituwa nadi,   
 na ubwezi nguweme,

 ghakuvundula mtima,

title: 157 Wakwenda Mukutengera
markdown:
### 157 Wakwenda Mukutengera   
 HARVEST TIME

  **1.**

  **Chorus:**   
 Hena mbuto zikumera,

  **2.**

  **3.**

 Vya m'nthazi ntha ungamanya,

title: 158 Mwe Vuna Ya Charu Yaneng'enera
markdown:
### 158 Mwe Vuna Ya Charu Yaneng'enera   
 HASTEN ON, GLAD DAY

  **1.**

 Mbuto zose zacha mu minda yose,  
 Zaphya kulindizga kwiza kwa Fumu.

  **Chorus:**   
 **Soprano:**   
 Zani Luwiro, muyeghe vuna,  
 Mutiyeghere kukwithu.

**ALto, Tenor, Bass**   
 Zani imwe wangeLo Luwiro,

 Mutiyeghere ise Luiwiro,  
 Kwithu kuchanya.

  **2.**

 Likwiza luwiro, myaka yaluta,

  **3.**   
  Mwe kutowa mlimo wachitemwano

 Nchitemwa chikutirongora mlimo,

title: 159 Nkhumukhumbani 'Mwe Fumu
markdown:
### 159 Nkhumukhumbani 'Mwe Fumu   
 HOW MUCH I NEED THEE

 nkhongono, jiso ndimwe.

  **Chorus:**

  **2.**

  **3.**

  **4.**   
  Kunthazi kungawa uli

 Ndidemeterere imwe,

title: 160 Ndisungikire Yesu
markdown:
### 160 Ndisungikire Yesu   
 KEPT FOR JESUS

  **1.**

  **Chorus:**   
 Ndisungikire Yesu!

 Ine mwe ndiri waka,

  **2.**

 Ndimutewetere,

  **3.**

 Mutuwa mu mtima.

  **4.**   
  Ndisungikire Yesu!   
 Nadi ndiwe wake,

 nyengo yiri yose.

title: 161 Ndina M'bwezi Muweme
markdown:
### 161 Ndina M'bwezi Muweme   
 MY LORD AND I

  **1.**   
  Ndina m'bwezi muweme wakunditemweska,   
 Wakunditemwa nkhanira kwambula kudonda,   
 Nane nkhufwasa mwa lyo wawenge pafupi,   
 Tikukhalira pamo Fumu yane.

  **2.**   
  Nyengo zinji nkhuvuka lyo wakumanya,   
 Nkhuyegamira pa lyo nkhukhumba wovwiri,   
 Wakurongozga m'ungweru pakwenda pa charu,   
 Tikwendera lumoza Fumu yane.

  **3.**   
  Nkhum'phalira masuzgo na para nakondwa,   
 Nkhuphala vya kund'kondweska na vya kun'kwiyiska,   
 Wakundipa chakuchita na kuchita kwake,   
 Tikuyowoyeskana Fumu Yane.

  **4.**   
  Wakumanya nkhukhumba kupindula yunji,   
 Ntheura nkhukayowoya za chitemwa chake,   
 Na kukapharazga mazgu na vya nyitwa yake   
 Tikutewete pamo Fumu yane.

title: 162 Fumu Yikundirongozga
markdown:
### 162 Fumu Yikundirongozga   
 ALL THE WAY

  **1.**   
  Fumu yikundirongozga kasi ndikhumbengechi?   
 Kasi nditikayikenge uyo wakurongozga?   
 Pa mtende na mu masuzgo ndikhalenge mwa lyo,   
 Pa vyose vingandiwira Fumu yindovwirenge,   
 Pa vyose vingandiwira Fumu yindovwirenge.

  **2.**   
  Fumu yikundirongozga na kundisanguruska,   
 Yikupa uchizi wake chakurya cha uzimu,   
 Nanga ndivuke pakwenda nanga ndiwe na nyota,   
 Mjarawe panthazi zane mkubwibwituka maji,   
 Mjarawe panthazi zane mkubwibwituka maji.

  **3.**   
  Fumu yikundirongozga 'mwe njakutemwa nadi,   
 Yamukundipa mutende mu nyumba ya wadada,   
 Mumoyo wa myirayira ndamfwasa nyengo zose,   
 Ndamkwimba sumu kwandanda Yesu mwandirongozga,   
 Ndamkwimba sumu kwandanda Yesu mwandirongozga.

title: 163 Yesu Wakuchemerezga
markdown:
### 163 Yesu Wakuchemerezga   
 HERE AM I, SEND ME

  **1.**   
  Yesu wakuchemerezga "Ndi njani tiwarute,   
 Kuyakanditewetera pa kuvuna vyakurya"?   
 Wakuchema wakuvuna wam kupereka njombe,   
 Ndi njani wazgore kuti, "Ndine pano mnditume"

  **2.**   
  Para ulije kumanya kukafika kutali,   
 Kukapenja wakuwalo ungavwira wamfupi,   
 Nanga ndiwe M'ngelo chara nesi nga Paulosi,   
 Phala za chitemwa chake cha Yesu Fumu yako.

  **3.**   
  Para ndiwe mlinda chara pa chigongwe m'Ziyoni,   
 Ulongore wanthu nthowa yakurata kuchanya,   
 Mukuromba na wanangwa ungakwaniska dango,   
 Teweta ngati Aroni pakovwira Mozesi.

  **4.**   
  Apo myoyo yikuzgewa Fumu yikukuchema,   
 Leka kuyowoya kuti, "Ntha ndingachita kanthu",   
 Tewetanga na kukondwa mlimo Fumu yakupa,   
 Zgora mwaluwiro kuti, "Ndine pano m'nditume."

title: 164 Pa Malundi Ghake Yesu
markdown:
### 164 Pa Malundi Ghake Yesu   
 AT THE FEET OF JESUS

  **1.**   
  Pa malundi ghake Yesu wakunditokotoska,   
 Malo ghakundikondweska ndiwepo nyengo zose,   
 Pa malundi ghake Yesu nkhulawiska kunyuma,   
 Chitemwa chake nchikulu chazgora mtima wane.

  **2.**   
  Pa malundi ghake Yesu ndipo pali thumbiko,   
 Nkhutayapo zakwananga nakusangapo mtende,   
 Pa malundi ghake Yesu nkhulira na kuromba,   
 Nkhupokerapo uchizi na chisangurusko swil!

  **3.**   
  Mponoski munditumbike nkhulindizga kwa imw   
 Mndiwone mkutemwa kwinu ndiwone chisko chinu,   
 Mndipe Fumu mtima winu mndipange kuwa mtuwa,   
 Ndirongore imwe Yesu ndimwe urunji wane.

title: 165 Nkhutemwa Fumu
markdown:
### 165 Nkhutemwa Fumu   
 I LOVE THEE

  **1.**   
  Nkhutemwa, nkhutemwa, nkhutemwa, Fumu,

 Nkhumtemwani Fumu namwe mkumanya,   
 Milimo yinene nkhumutemwani.

  **2.**   
  Ndakondwa, ndakondwa nkhanira nadi,   
 M'chimwemwe chandanda nkhwima pa phiri,   
 Nkhudoka kuchanya kukakhalako,   
 Na Yesu, wangelo na wak'wombokwa.

  **3.**   
  A Yesu mponoski ndatumbikika,

  **4.**   
  Ndi njani nga ndimwe Fumu ya mtende,

title: 166 Yesu Mwa Mphanji Yane
markdown:
### 166 Yesu Mwa Mphanji Yane   
 ROCK OF AGES

  **1.**

  **2.**   
  Ntchito zane n'zichoko

 Vyose vikuperera

  **3.**   
  Ndilive na kaweme,

 Mndichitire lusungu

  **4.**   
  Para Iwendo lwamara   
 ndamuvivya murwani,   
 Pakukwera kuchanya

title: 167 Lufura Lwa Kukhora
markdown:
### 167 Lufura Lwa Kukhora   
 FIRM FOUNDATION

  **1.**

  **2.**

 Nakumpani mphavu kum'chinthiskani,

  **3.**

 Ndiwenge namwe kuchimbizga suzgo,

  **4.**

title: 168 Fumu Ndiyo Mliska
markdown:
### 168 Fumu Ndiyo Mliska   
 THE LORD IS MY SHEPHERD

  **1.**

  **2.**

 Imwe muli nane ndopenge chara,   
 Nthonga yinu na ndodo vikund'khozga,

  **3.**   
  Pamaso pa m'rwani mwanozga kurya,

  **4.**   
  Nadi uweme na lusungu lwinu,

 Ndende m'nthowa wasekuru wakenda,

title: 169 Mwana Wa Fumu Ukugonerachi

### 169 Mwana Wa Fumu Ukugonerachi

  **1.**

 Wendeskenge nyengo yikumara.

  **2.**   
  Mwana wa Fumu wazerezgerachi?   
 Njombe yako yiri pa muryanggo,   
 Wuka nozgeka mponoski wakwiza,   
 Mtemelere wakwiza m'mabingu.

  **3.**   
  Mitundu m'charu yizam'kutenthema,   
 Na kumbwambwantha m'wofi ukuru,   
 Pulika mdidi pakwiza kwa Fumu,   
 Mwana wa Fumu ungachedwanga.

  **4.**   
  Ungasuwiliranga na vyam'charu,   
 N'vinthu vyambura kukharirira,   
 Udumure vikondo vya murwani,

  **5.**   
  Kwezga maso ulawiske kuchanya,   
 Lindizganga kwizaso kwa Fumu,   
 Hena ungweru mu mapiri mose,   
 wana wa Fumu mukondwe, mwimbe.

title: 170 Fumu Mlengi Wane

### 170 Fumu Mlengi Wane

  **3.**

  **4.**   
  Mwe uchizi winu undipe nkhongono,

 Mazgu na makhumbiro ghane viwe vya imwe.

title: 171 Imwe Walinda M'ziyoni

### 171 Imwe Walinda M'ziyoni

 Pakuwona kasi ungweru wiza?

  **2.**   
  M'tiphalire vimanyisko vya ulendo vyamara,

 Kasi nadi ufum'uli pafupi?

  **3.**   
  Malazi gha kuwoneka t'yeni tichemerezge,

  **4.**   
  Tamanya kendero kithu mlima uli pafupi,

title: 172 Fumu Yithu Yesu Mwizenge Pauli?
markdown:
### 172 Fumu Yithu Yesu Mwizenge Pauli?

  **2.**

  **3.**

### 173 Ndiwenge Na Chigomezgo

  **4.**

### 175 Fumu Nga Mliska Mtirongozge

title: 176 Chigomezgo Chithu Ntchakuzirwa

### 176 Chigomezgo Chithu Ntchakuzirwa

title: 177 M'charu Chambula Chisi

### 177 M'charu Chambula Chisi

  **Chorus:**

: Myaka ntha wakupenda,

  **2.**

  **3.**

 Kuli mronga wa moyo kulije usiku.

  **4.**

title: 178 Khristu Wakwiza
markdown:
### 178 Khristu Wakwiza   
 C.H. 536 CHIRST RETURNETH

  **Chorus:**

 timbe nakukondwa;

  Tamkondwa pakuruta tiri wamoyo Kulje nthenda,

title: 179 Ehena Mwanenthengwa Wakwiza
