 Tose tayakum'temerera m'chanya, wakwiza!   
 Wizenge nadi, wizenge nadi;   
 Tayakumutemerera m'chanya.

title: 180 Nyengo Yakwiza Fumu Ntha Tikumanya
markdown:
### 180 Nyengo Yakwiza Fumu Ntha Tikumanya   
 CH 540 WE KNOW NOT THE HOUR

  **1.**   
  Nyengo yakwiza Fumu ntha tikumanya,   
 Vimanyikwiro vikuphara wakwiza,   
 Kuti wizengeso n'phangano liweme,   
 Nyengo ntha timanye.

  **Chorus:**   
 Wizenge (wizenge) tinozgeke,   
 tiLinde, WIzenge (wizenge)HaLeLuya! HaLeLuya!   
 Izenge m'mabingu m'uchindami wa wiske   
 Nyengo ntha timanye.

  **2.**   
  Kuli chiponosko kwa wakuchipenja,   
 Unenesko uli m'mazgu gha Chiuta,   
 Uchimi wose ukulongola suzgo,   
 Nyengo ntha timanye.

  **3.**   
  Ttirombenge nyali zikugolera,   
 Titiyimbenge kumanya suz mnthazi,   
 inindizgenge yisuke Fumu yize,   
 Nyengo ntha timanye.

title: 181 Nyengo Yakwiza Ntha Timanye
markdown:
### 181 Nyengo Yakwiza Ntha Timanye   
 C.H. 542 WAITING AND WATCHING

  **1.**   
  Nyengo yakwiza Fumu ntha tikumanya,   
 Vimanyikwiro vikuphara wakwiza,   
 Kuti wizengeso n'phangano liweme,   
 Nyengo ntha timanye.

  **Chorus:**   
 Wizenge (wizenge) tinozgeke, tiLinde,   
 Wizenge (wizenge)HaLeLuya! HaLeLuya!   
 Wizenge m'mabingu muchindami wa wiske;   
 Nyengo ntha timanye.

  **2.**   
  Kuli chiponosko kwa wakuchipenja,   
 Unenesko uli m'mazgu gha Chiuta,   
 Uchimi wose ukulongola suzgo,   
 Nyengo ntha timanye.

  **3.**   
  Titirombenge nyali zikugolera,   
 Tirindizgenge yisuke Fumu yize,   
 Titiyimbenge kumanya suzgo mnthazi,   
 Nyengo ntha timanye.

title: 182 Mlenje Utuwa Waneng'enera
markdown:
### 182 Mlenje Utuwa Waneng'enera   
 H 547 GLEAMS OF THE GOLDEN MORNING

  **1.**   
  Mlenje utuwa waneng'enera Yesu wakwiza,   
 Kwizakatola wakum'gomezga kuya kuchanya.

  **Chorus:**   
 Mwe tikuwona maLazi ghamLenje, ghakuwaLa m'usiku,   
 Mwe tikuwona maLazi ghamLenje ghamjuLa dindi.

  **2.**   
  Uthenga upharazgikenge ku mitundu yose,   
 Mwenenthengwa wati wizenge na kulizga mbata.

  **3.**   
  Wangelo wose wizamkuwapo mu uchindami;   
 Mweruzgi wizamukwiza kutola wanthu wake.

  **4.**   
  Dazi'lo wakutemweka wayamkukumanas0,   
 Masozi gha awo wasweka mtima ghamfyurika.

title: 183 Wakupangana Wakumgomezga
markdown:
### 183 Wakupangana Wakumgomezga   
 C.H. 548 HOLD FAST TILLI COME

  **1.**   
  Wakupangana wakumgomezga,   
 Ndizenge  luwiro  kutola  wane,   
 Mwe mukoleske mazgu gha Fumu,   
 M'ngagonanga chara mulindizgenge.

  **Refrain:**   
 MukoLeskenge nd'phangano Lake,   
 Watim paninge ufumu wake,   
 Njirani mose mkukondwa kwake,   
 Mupokere mphumphu koreskaninge.

  **2.**   
  'Mwe tisopenge nyali tibuske,   
 Kuwanji wizenge nga ndi munkhungu,   
 Wali pafupi dazi mpha uli?   
 Kweni tikumanya waneng'enera.

  **3.**   
  Chipulikano mu mazgu ghake,   
 Kwiza m'uchindami kwa Fumu Yesu,   
 Ndilo phangano likuru nadi,   
 Wakwiza luwiro mukoleskenge.

title: 184 Msekere Fumu Yikwiza
markdown:
### 184 Msekere Fumu Yikwiza   
 C.H 189 JOY TO THE WORLD

  **1.**   
  Msekere Fumu yikwiza charu chimpokere,   
 umpokere, Mtima wose Kuchanya na pasi;   
 kuchanya na pasi, Kuchanya na pasi vimbe.

  **2.**   
  Msekere Fumu yiwuse wanthu wose wimbe,   
 M'mapiri na muvinkhwawu, Mumwimbire sumu;   
 mumwimbire sumu, Mumwimbire Fumu sumu.

  **3.**   
  Kwananga ntha kwam'kuwako mingaso kulije,   
 Vitumbiko viri pose, Pall themberero;   
 pali themberero, Pose pali themberero.

  **4.**   
  Fumu yiwuse m'uchizi mitundu yiwone,   
 Mu chitemwa Chake; muchitemwa Chake,   
 Uchindami na urunjl, Mu chitemwa cha Chiuta.

title: 185 Tiyowoye Vya Kuchanya
markdown:
### 185 Tiyowoye Vya Kuchanya   
 C.H. 199 TO BE THERE

  **1.**   
  Tiyowoye vya kuchanya charu chakutowa nadi,   
 Tiyowoye uchindami tikudoka kurutako,   
 Misewu 'mwe nja golide vipupa vyake nvyangale,   
 Viweme nvinandi-nandi tikudoka kurutako.

  **2.**   
  Tinene za kusutuka ku kwananga na viyezgo,   
 Viyezgo m'walo nam'kati kwamkuwa uli kuyako?   
 Tiyowoye za chitemwa na minjirira yituwa,   
 Za 'Kleziya ya kuchanya kwamkuwa uli kuyako?

  **3.**   
  Kulira kose kwamala mazgu ghatipa umoyo;   
 Msumba uphya ukukhira wakutowa nga mpha nthengwa;   
 Msumba uweme, utuwa kulije vitima uko,   
 Kwananga, suzgo kulije, na uheniso kulije.

  **4.**   
  Na pakati pa viyezgo mundinozge mtima wane,   
 Ndipo nane nditimanye umo ndamkhalira kura,   
 Tamkwenda m'miskambo kura m'uchindami wakutowa,   
 Pamo na wangelo wose na Yesu mwene wam'wako.

title: 186 Sono Tanjiramo
markdown:
### 186 Sono Tanjiramo   
 C.H. 26 LORD, WE HAVE MET

  **1.**   
  Sono tanjiramo m'nyumba yinu Fumu,   
 Mwikhe themba, muwe nase, tiri winu Fumu.

  **2.**   
  Mitima yithu 'mwe, yikumlirirani,   
 Na maghanoghano ghithu tikukhumba Imwe

  **3.**   
  Muzimu mutuwa watovwire tose,   
 Kupulika mazgu ghinu, Kuti tiwe winu.

  **4.**   
  Mutitozge Fumu, ku uheni withu,   
 Fakwizakizaso imwe mtitolere kwinu.

title: 187 Fumu Tikwimbira Zina Linu
markdown:
### 187 Fumu Tikwimbira Zina Linu   
 C.H. 34 OUR PARTING HYMN

  **1.**   
  Fumu tikwimbira zina linu,   
 Na mtima wumo pakulekana,   
 Kumchindikani mkusopa kwithu,   
 Nakujikama ku mtende winu.

  **2.**   
  Mutipe mtende pakuya kwithu,   
 Dazi lose muwe nase Fumu,   
 M'woje mitima t'reke kwananga,   
 M'nyumba muno tachema pa Imwe.

  **3.**   
  Mutipe mtende m'umoyo withu,   
 Mtisanguluske m'masuzgo ghose,   
 Mumazgeso ku kwesana kwithu,   
 Mutiguzire ku mtende winu.

  **4.**   
  Mutirongozgenge nyengo zose,   
 Kwenda tekha titi titondeke,   
 Usange muli nase pafupi,   
 Ntha titiopenge kanthu ise.

title: 188 Nanga Ndive Muheni
markdown:
### 188 Nanga Ndive Muheni   
 CHIEF OF SINNERS

  **1.**   
  Nanga ndiwe muheni, Yesu wakandifwira,   
 Wakafwa kundithaska kuti ndiwe wamoyo,   
 Nga munthavi wa mpheska ndine wake 'yo ngwane.

  **2.**   
  Mwe kutemwa kwa Yesu nkhwakuruska nkhanira,   
 Kunjira 'ruska nyanja nkhwakukhalirira swi!   
 Kukandisanga ine ndichali wakwananga.

  **3.**   
  Nanga ndiwe muheni Khristu n'vyose kwa ine,   
 Wakundimanya ine vitima vyane n'vyake,   
 Mwa lyo ndina mtende wakundivikirira.

title: 189 Tirije Msumba Mu Charu
190 Wende Na Zina La Yesu
markdown:
### 190 Wende Na Zina La Yesu   
 PRECIOUS NAME

  **1.**   
  Utemwe zina la Yesu mwana wakusuzgika,   
 Liti likusanguluske wendenge nalo kose.

  **Refrain:**   
 Zina 'mwe (Zina mwe)   
 La Yesu. (La Yesu)   
 Zina La charu chose   
 Zina 'mwe (Zina 'mwe)   
 La Yesu (La Yesu)   
 Zina La charu chose.

  **2.**   
  Utemwe zina la Yesu liwenge nguru yako,   
 Para uli mu viyezgo utamphe mukuromba.

  **3.**   
  Zina iweme nda Yesu ndilo likukhwimiska,   
 Para watipokerera ndipo tikumwimbira.

  **4.**   
  Pakumulambira Yesu kuwa m'malundi ghake,   
 Themba la mathemba ghose para lwendo lwamala.

title: 191 Nadi Nkhumanya
markdown:
### 191 Nadi Nkhumanya   
 C.H. 608 BLESSED ASSURANCE

  **1.**   
  Nadi nkhumanya Yesu ngwane;   
 "Mwe nkhuwona nadi uchindami;   
 Wandiwombola, wandigula;   
 Ndopa zatozga mtima wane.

  **Chorus:**   
 Agha ndi mazgu m'sumu yane,   
 Kumuchindika nyengo zose;   
 Agha ndi mazgu m'sumu yane,   
 Kumuchindika nyengo zose.

  **2.**   
  Ndajipereka mwakukondwa,   
 Nkhudodoliska Mponoski wane,   
 Wangelo wakwikha wayegha,   
 Uchizi na chitemwa Chake.

  **3.**   
  Ndina chimango m'mtima mwane,   
 Nkhucha mwa Fumu natumbikika,   
 Kuwa maso na kulindizga,   
 Uweme wazula mwa ine.

title: 192 Pamphinjika Mtaski Wakafwa
markdown:
### 192 Pamphinjika Mtaski Wakafwa   
 C.S. 300 GLORY TO HIS NAME

  **1.**   
  Pa mphinjika mtaski wakafwa,   
 Apo nkhalira nakwananga,   
 Ndopa zake zikandisuka,   
 Mtamike Zina.

  **Chorus:**   
 Mtamike zina, mtamike zina;   
 Ndopa zake zikandisuka,   
 Mtamike zina.

  **2.**   
  Ndaponoskeka ku uheni,   
 Yesu wakukhala mwa ine,   
 Nkhamusangira pa mphinjika,   
 Mtamike zina.

  **3.**   
  Ndiyo chisimi chakuthaska,   
 Ndakondwa kuti ndasambamo;   
 Yesu mtaski wakundisunga,   
 Mtamike zina.

  **4.**   
  Mwize ku chisimi chiweme   
 Muwe mumalundi gha Fumu;   
 Mjibizge m 'maji mutozgeke   
 Mtamike zina.

title: 193 Kasi Ungakhala Umoyo Nga Ngwa Yesu
markdown:
### 193 Kasi Ungakhala Umoyo Nga Ngwa Yesu   
 C.S. 58 HIS WAY WITH THEE

  **1.**   
  Kasi ungakhala umoyo nga ngwa Yesu?   
 Nakwenda nayo munthowa yifinyi;   
 Ungazomera wayeghe katundu wako?   
 Mzomere wende nawe.

  **Chorus:**   
 Nkhongono zake zinga wa nawe,   
 Ndopa zake zingakusutuLa,   
 Chitemwa chake chizuLe m'mtima,   
 Nkhuweme kuti wendenge nayo.

  **2.**   
  Kasi ungamzomerezga wakusutule?   
 Wakupenge mtende pakumrondezga?   
 Wakuthaske, wakufighirire, ungawa?   
 Mzomere wende nawe.

  **3.**   
  Mu ufumu wake ungakasanga malo?   
 Ungam'manya nadi kuti ndi Fumu?   
 Ungateweta mlimo wake nyengo zose?   
 Mzomere wende nawe.

title: 194 Mukunozga Mu Nyumba Pakutemwana
markdown:
### 194 Mukunozga Mu Nyumba Pakutemwana   
 LOVE AT HOME

  **1.**   
  Mukunozga mu nyumba pakutemwana,   
 Mazgu ghose nkhutemwa pakutemwana.   
 Mutende na chimango viwakhalilirenge,   
 Wawenge wakucha swi!l pakutemwana.

  **Chorus:**   
 Chitemwa mu nyumba,   
 wa ienge akucha swi   
 Pakutemwana.

  **2.**   
  Mnyumba muli chimwemwe pakutemwana,   
 Thinkho, bina mulije pakutemwana.   
 Maluwa ghakuzota charu chose nkhutemwa,   
 Umoyo ngwakusangwa pakutemwana.

  **3.**   
  Wakuchanya wakucha pakutemwana,   
 Wam charu mbakuchaso pakutemwana.   
 Vyakutizingirizga vikuphara chitemwa,   
 Chiuta ngwakuchaso pakutemwana.

  **4.**   
  A Yesu ndiwe winu nditi nditemwe,   
 Mukandifwira ine nditi nditemwe,   
 pumule mu mtende kwambulaso kwenjerwa,   
 Mu lusungu lwa imwe nditi nditemwe.

title: 195 Tikukhumba Mzimu Winu
markdown:
### 195 Tikukhumba Mzimu Winu   
 C.H. 210 O FOR THAT FLAME!

  **1.**   
  Tikukhumba mzimu winu wakawala pa watuwa,   
 Wakachiska myoyo yawo kuthaska ku maurwani.

  **2.**   
  Kasi'mwe Mzimu walinkhu wakam' panga Abram' winu?   
 Wakamsintha Paulosi Nakum'pa phamphu m'uzimu.

  **3.**   
  Mzimu wam'miwiro yose wakapharazga chitemwa   
 Wakam 'waliska Yesaya Nakum'pa Davide sumu.

  **4.**   
  Nkhongono zinu zakale wakazip'lika Eliya,   
 Zikawaso pa Mozesi Yobu wakazizipizga.

  **5.**   
  Fumu mkumbuke vyakale M'wuske mlimo mupe mtende;   
 Tikujipereka kwinu Mzimu winu wawe nase.

title: 196 Muli Nkhongono Mu Ndopa
markdown:
### 196 Muli Nkhongono Mu Ndopa   
 C.S. 27 THERE IS POWER IN THE BLOOD

  **1.**   
  Ka mngasutulika kukwananga?   
 Muli nkhongono m'ndopa zake.   
 Kasi mungawutonda uheni?   
 Muli nkhongono mundopa.

  **Chorus:**   
 MuLi nkhongono za kuruska,   
  Mundopa (mundopa) za Yesu (za Yesu),   
 MuLi nkhongono zakuruska,   
 Mndopa za Mwanamberere.

  **2.**   
  Mngasutulika kukujikuzga?   
 Muli nkhongono m'ndopa zake,   
 Mwize musukike pamphinjika.   
 Muli nkhongono mundopa.

  **3.**   
  Kasi mungawa imwe watuwa?   
 Muli nkhongono m'ndopa zake.   
 Kwananga kukubira mundopa,   
 Muli nkhongono mundopa.

  **4.**   
  Ka mungachita mlimo wa Fumu?   
 Muli nkhongono m'ndopa zake,   
 Ka mungam'tamika nyengo zose   
 Muli nkhongono mundopa.

title: 197 Chisi Ntha Chamwakob
markdown:
### 197 Chisi Ntha Chamwakob   
 C.S. 854 THERELL BE NO DARK VALLEY

  **1.**   
  Chisi ntha chamwako pakwiza 'ye,   
 Chisi ntha chamwako pakwiza ye,   
 Chisi ntha chamwako pakwiza 'ye,   
 Kwizakatora wake.

  **Refrain:**   
 Kwizakatora wake (inya)   
 kwizakatora wake (inya)   
 Chisi ntha cham wako   
 pakwiza ye kwizakatora wake.

  **2.**   
  Chitima kwamwavye pakwiza 'ye,   
 Chitima kwamwavye pakwiza ye,   
 Kwamwa mlenj'utuwa pakwiza 'ye,   
 Kwizakatora wake.

  **3.**   
  Masozi kwamwavye pakwiza ye,   
 Masozi kwamwavye pakwiza 'ye,   
 Wamwunganya wose pakwiza 'ye,   
 Kwizakatora wake.

  **4.**   
  Tamukwimba sumu pakwiza 'ye,   
 Tamukwimba sumu pakwiza 'ye   
 Tamkumwemwetera pakwiza 'ye,   
 Kwizakatora wake.

title: 198 Mwe Mbwezi Muweme Ndi Yesu
markdown:
### 198 Mwe Mbwezi Muweme Ndi Yesu   
 C.H. 528 THE BEST FRIEND IS JESUS

  **1.**   
  Mwe m'bwezi muweme ndi Yesu,   
 Usange muli na masuzgo,   
 Wachizgenge mitima,   
 watipenge nkhongono,   
 Mwe mbwezi muweme ndi Yesu.

  **Refrain:**   
 M'bwezi muweme ndi Ye--su (nadi ndi Yesu)    
 'bwezi muweme ndi Ye--su   
 (kwa nyengo zose)   
 Wamuchinthiskeninge, wamupuLikeninge,   
 "Mwe m'bwezi muweme ndi Yesu.

  **2.**   
  Ndasangamo m'bwezi mwa Yesu,   
 Wakundipa mtende mu mtima,   
 Pakweghamira lyo,   
 ndopenge kanthu chara;   
 Mwe m'bwezi muweme ndi Yesu.

  **3.**   
  Nanga ndende mkati m'vitima,   
 Na mayigha ghakundifyenya,   
 Ntna nditi ndiwopenge,   
 Mponoski wali nane,   
 Mwe m'bwezi muweme ndi Yesu.

  **4.**   
  Pakukawungana kukwithu,   
 Pamoza na watuwa wose,   
 Tamkwimba pa chizumbe,   
 kumtamika kwandanda;   
 Mwe m'bwezi muweme ndi Yesu.

title: 199 Ntchindi Kwa Chiuta
markdown:
### 199 Ntchindi Kwa Chiuta   
 C.H. 647 TO GOD BE THE GLORY

  **1.**   
  Ntchindi kwa Chiuta wakupa vyose,   
 Wakatemwa charu kutipa Yesu,   
 Uyo wakafwa kusuka kwananga,   
 Kujula vipata tose tinjire.

  **Refrain:**   
 Tamikani Fumu charu chipuLike,   
 Tamikani Fumu wanthu wasekere,   
 Zaninge kwa Dada, mwa Mwana wake,   
 Mumupenge ntchindi wakatitemwa.

  **2.**   
  Tiri kuwombokwa na ndopa zake,   
 Kwa wose wakugomezga Chiuta,   
 Nanga wangananga kwakuruska 'mwe,   
 Yesu wakuwagowokera vyose.

  **3.**   
  Watisambizga wachita vikuru,   
 Kukondwa kwithu nkhukuru mwa Yesu,   
 Kweni kuwenge kuzizwa kukuru,   
 Za kendero kithu kuya kuchanya.

title: 200 Mtuwa, Mtuwa, Mtuwa
markdown:
### 200 Mtuwa, Mtuwa, Mtuwa   
 C.H. 73 HOLY, HOLY, HOLY

  **1.**   
  Mtuwa, mtuwa, mtuwa! Fumu mwa mphavu   
 Namacherochero tikumwimbirani!   
 Mtuwa, mtuwa, mtuwa! mwalusungu lose,   
 Fumu yakuwusa myirayira.

  **2.**   
  Mtuwa, mtuwa, mtuwa! kwimba wangelo,   
 Nakuponya pasi mphumphu kumrumbani,   
 Vikwi vikwi m'chanya vikumlambiran,   
 Mkawako, mliko, muwengeko swi!

  **3.**   
  Mtuwa, mtuwa, mtuwa! chisi chabisa,   
 Maso gha tawanthu ntha ghakumwonani,   
 Mtuwa ndimwe pera palijeso m'nyake,   
 wamphavu, m'weme, wakufikapo.

title: 201 Wakandizuwula
markdown:
### 201 Wakandizuwula   
    
 C.S. 192 HE BROUGHT ME OUT

  **1.**   
  Mtima wane ukuwopa Yehova,   
 Nkhafyenyerezgeka na zakwananga,   
 Nkhachemerezga kwa Fumu m'chigongwe   
 Yikandizuwulamo mwa lusungu.

  **Chorus:**   
 YikandizuwuLa m'mathipa,   
 Nakundiika pa jaLawe,   
 Ndipo sono ndimbenge sumu,   
 Kutamika HaLeLuya.

  **2.**   
  Wakandiwika ine pa jalawe,   
 Ntha nditifumepo pafupi nayo,   
 Palije chakofya pano ndakhala,   
 Ndine, mu uchizi, nkhavwale mphumphu.

  **3.**   
  Wakandipa sumu ya lero nkhwimba,   
 Mhanya na usiku ndimuchindike,   
 Mtima wane wazula na chimwemwe,   
 Ndithuwuskenge zina la Mponoski.

  **4.**   
  Ndimbenge lusungu lwake kwa ine,   
 Ndithuwuske mpaka wanthu wam' manye,   
 Yesu Mponoski wane kuli kose,   
 Kuti wanandi wamanye Chiuta.

title: 202 Yesu M'ndirongozgenge
203 Tandazgani Mazgu
markdown:
### 203 Tandazgani Mazgu   
    
 THE COMFORTER HAS COME

  **1.**   
  Tandazgani mazgu uko kuli munthu,   
 Wamtima uheni ndiposo masuzgo,   
 Mkhristu wali yose wapharazge kuti,   
 Msanguruski wiza.

  **Chorus:**   
 Msanguruski wiza, Msanguruski wiza,   
 Mzimu wakuchanya phangano La Fumu,   
 Tandazgani mazgu uko kuLi munthu,   
 Msanguruski wiza.

  **2.**   
  Usiku waruta mulenji wafika,   
 Kuchimbizga wofi na kutengera 'mwe,   
 Ndipo pa mapiri zuwa likukwera,   
 Msanguruski wiza.

  **3.**   
  Themba la nkhongono la mathemba ghose,   
 Likutiwombola m'mauzima ghithu,   
 Ntheura tikwimba sumu zakupinga,   
 Msanguruski wiza.

  **4.**   
  Ndingayowoyachi za chitemwa Chinu,   
 Ku wanthu wa m'charu za uchizi winu,   
 Ine ndamuheni ndime m'malo mwinu,   
 Msanguruski wiza.

  **5.**   
  Timbe tikowere m'chanya muzomere,   
 Watuwa kuchanya wa m'charu wazgore,   
 Kwimba za chitemwa musumu yandanda,   
 Msanguruski wiza.

title: 204 Mcharu Cha Wayeni
markdown:
### 204 Mcharu Cha Wayeni   
    
 WELCOME! WANDERER, WELCOME

  **1.**   
  Mcharu cha wayeni uko waluta,   
 Upulike ntchemo Mwana wanne.

  **Chorus:**   
 Iza wakuzge wa werera kwinu,   
 Wazge viera kutaLi wera kwinu.

  **2.**   
  Mucharu chanjala chakuzindula,   
 Wize kukukondwa Mwana wane.

  **3.**   
  Uleke viwawa soka limare,   
 Wavuka mu mtima Mwana wane.

  **4.**   
  Chijalo ntchamwazi uchali wane,   
 Nkaukutemwa nadi Mwana wane.

  **5.**   
  Wazgewa kutali wanjiririra,   
 Wagowokereka Mwana wane.

  **6.**   
  Gome lanozgeka ntha uluwike,   
 Za, urye, pumula, Mwana wane.

  **7.**   
  Ulije chikaya ndiwe chitchwapi,   
 Ine nkhukutemwa mwana wane.

title: 205 Yesu Pakutokotoska
markdown:
### 205 Yesu Pakutokotoska   
 C.H. 564 WHILE JESUS WHISPERS

  **1.**   
  Yesu pakutokotoska zaninge!   
 Apo tikumromberani zaninge!   
 Sono mumupokerere zaninge!   
 Sono mumumanye lyo zaninge!

  **2.**   
  Kasi mwazotofyeskeka zaninge!   
 Yesu wampumuzgeninge zaninge!   
 Wampusikeninge chara zaninge!   
 Wati wamponoskeninge zaninge!

  **3.**   
  Mpulike kuweyerera zaninge!

title: 214 Kasi YesuWakupwerera?
markdown:
### 214 Kasi YesuWakupwerera?

  **3.**

 ara nkhulira kwambura mtende,

  **4.**

### 215 Kwithu Kwambula kKusintha

### 216 Ndekha Cha

  **Chorus:**

  **2.**

  **3.**

### 217 Fumu Mkunditemwa

  **2.**

  **3.**

  **4.**

  **3.**

  **4.**

 pingo wake wamkuruska kuumaliro.

markdown:
### 231 Munjizge Yesu Mu Mtima   
 LET JESUS COME INTO YOUR HEART

  **1.**   
  Kasi wavuka na zakwananga?   
 Munjzge Yesu mu mtima.   
 Ka ukukhumba kung'anamuka?   
 Munjizge Yesu mu mtima.  **Chorus:**   
 ULeke kukayika uLeke kumukana,   
 UjuLe mtima wako munjizge Yesu mu mtima.  **2.**   
  Para wakhumba kuwa mutuwa munjizge   
 Yesu mu mtime   
 Maji ghakukusavya ghalipo munjizge   
 Yesu mu mtima.  **3.**   
  Usange una suzgo mu mtima munjizge   
 Yesu mu mtima,   
 Para wasuwizgika na charu munjizge   
 Yesu mu mtima   **4.**   
  Para wabwezi wakuwukira munjizge   
 Yesu mu mtima,   
 lyo ndi mbwezi wa nyengo zose munjzge   
 Yesu mu mtima   **5.**   
  Para wamkwimba nawakwombokwa munijzge   
 Yesu mu mtima,   
 Ukanjire ku malo gha mtende munjizge   
 Yesu mu mt ma.  **Chorus: (La umaLiro)**   
  ULeke kukayika uLeke kumukana,   
 NdajuLa mtima wane kuti Yesu wanjiremo.

title: 232 Ine Ntha Tindikuleke
markdown:
### 232 Ine Ntha Tindikuleke   
 I WILL NEVER LEAVE THEE

  **1.**   
  Ine ntha tindikuleke inya ntha ndikukane,   
 Nditikurongozge iwe mulusungu lwa ine,   
 Ungopanga mauheni undigomezge ine.

  **2.**   
  Para mphepo zikukuntha urombenge kwa ine,   
 Nditi ndikuvumbatire kukusunga makora,   
 Muviyezgo vya mu charu mutindirongozgenge.

  **3.**   
  Para m'chanya mkung'anima pali pose pawala,   
 Vyakutikondwereska mbwe! vyose viweme pera,   
 Ine nditi ndiwe nawe ndikurongozge kwenda.

  **4.**   
  Usange wazizikika na kwenjerwa mu mtima,   
 Mnyankhuwinda wa visuzgo nditikuwalirenge,   
 Na ndembera ya chitemwa chane yikwezgekenge

title: 233 Phala Nkhani Yakale
markdown:
### 233 Phala Nkhani Yakale   
 C.H. 524 TELL ME THE OLD; OLD STORY

  **1.**   
  Phala nkhani yakale ya vinthu kuchanya,   
 Vya Yesu m'uchindami na chitemwa chake,   
 Phala nkhani makola nga nkhwamwana m'choko,   
 Ndawakutomboloka ndawakufipirwa.

  **Refrain:**   
 PhaLa nkhani yakaLe, phaLa nkhani yakaLe,   
 PhaLa nkhani yakaLe, ya Yesu nkhutemwa.

  **2.**   
  Utokotoske nkhani mu mazgu ghaweme,   
 Kumbuka ndine mheni Yesu wakafwira,   
 Uphale nkhani yose para uli m'suzgo,   
 Mu nyengo yiri yose ndiyo msanguluski.

  **3.**   
  Phala nkhani yiyira uvwe una wofi,   
 Ntchindi m' charu njawaka njakusuzga nadi,   
 Inya, ntchindi yacharu para yina ine,   
 Phala nkhani yakale, "Khristu ndi Mponoski."

title: 234 Yesu Nyali Ya Charu
markdown:
### 234 Yesu Nyali Ya Charu   
 CS 313 JESUS TH LIGHT THE WORLD

  **1.**   
  Yesu ndi nyali m'charu   
 wangelo wakuphara;   
 Mwe Fumu yababika,   
 Yesu nyali ya charu.

  **Chorus:**   
 Yesu kungweruka kwa charu,   
 nadi tende muungweru uwu;   
 Ungweru muhanya na usiku,   
 Yesu nyaLi ya charu.

  **2.**   
  Wanthu 'wose wakondwe,   
 Yesu nyali ya charu;   
 Kuchanyaso wakondwe,   
 Yesu nyali ya charu.

  **3.**   
  Wachindikike nadi,   
 Yesu nyali ya charu;   
 Yesu Fumu yandanda,   
 Yesu nyali ya charu.

  **4.**   
  Ndi Fumu ya chimango,   
 Yesu nyali ya charu,   
 Ungweru wa 'nenesko,   
 Yesu nyali ya charu.

title: 235 Lizaso Dazi Lakupumula
236 Wuka, Moyo Wane, Kondwa
markdown:
### 236 Wuka, Moyo Wane, Kondwa   
 C.H. 667 HIS LOVING KINDNESS

  **1.**   
  Wuka, moyo wane,   
 kondwa umwimbirenge Mponoski,   
 Ndimwimbirenge zisumu   
 lusungu lwake ndukuru.

  **Chorus:**   
 NgwaLusungu, ngwaLusungu   
 Lusungu Iwake ndukuru!

  **2.**   
  Wakandiwona ndazgewa   
 wakanditemwa ndipera,   
 Wakandiwezgako 'mwe   
 mu lusungu lwake lukuru

  **3.**   
  Warwani mbanandinandi   
 nanga charu chingasuska,   
 Iyo wakun'sungirira   
 lusungu lwake ndukuru.

  **4.**   
  Suzgo nga bingu likuru   
 liungane na kugunda,   
 Wakwima pafupi nane   
 lusungu lwake nduweme.

  **4.**   
  Mweneko charu pakwiza   
 kwizakawatola wake,   
 Ndamkwimba padazi ilo   
 lusungu Iwake kwandandal

title: 237 Muchinthirani Yesu
markdown:
### 237 Muchinthirani Yesu   
 C.H. 354 STAND UP! STAND UP 

FOR JESUS  **1.**   
  Muchinthirani Yesu mwa wankhondo wake,   
 Tumphurani ndembera yingatayikanga.   
 Mkutonda kwithu kose lyo warongozge,   
 Warwani tiwamare Khristu ndiyo Fumu.

  **2.**   
  Muchinthirani Yesu ntchemo muzomere   
 Wukani murwe nawo mu zuwa lalero.   
 Mwimirani mwa wanthu warwani mbanandi,   
 Wukani na chikanga na nkhongono mtonde.

  **3.**   
  Muchinthirani Yesu yimani mwa lyo,   
 Pamwekha m'tondekenge m'ngajigomezganga.   
 Tolani vyakurwera mtandale m'kuromba,   
 Para zawe lawuka mose muwengepo.

  **4.**   
  Muchinthirani Yesu nkhondo yimalenge,   
 Nkhondo yiripo sono kweni titondenge.   
 Kwa iyo wakutonda wamkuvwala mphumphu,   
 Wamkuwusa na Themba kwa muyirayira.

title: 238 Wakunjira Pa Vipata
markdown:
### 238 Wakunjira Pa Vipata   
 C.S. 890 SWEEPING THROUGH THE

 GATES  **1.**   
  Awo mbanjani kusirya kura,   
 Waporota m'masuzgo gha nyifwa,   
 Wakumwimbira Yesu wasamba m'ndopa zake.

  **Chorus:**   
 Wakunjira m'vipata vya YerusaLem,   
 Wasamba m'ndopa (mundopa) zake,   
 Wakunjira m'vipata vya YerusaLem,   
 Wasamba m'ndopa zake.

  **2.**   
  Awa ndiwo muwaniche wawo,   
 Wakamusanga Yesu luwiro,   
 walonda mu uchizi wasamba m'ndopa zake.

  **3.**   
  Awa ndiwo wafuma m'masoka,   
 Mwa Yesu wasanga kupumula,   
 Mtende wawo mwa Yesu wasamba m'ndopa zake.

  **4.**   
  Awa ndiwo mkulimbana kwawo,   
 Wakima nji! pakati pa moto,   
 Yesu wakuti, "zani" Isamba m'ndopa zake.

  **5.**   
  Mbakufwasa pa sirya la nyanja,   
 Uheni, nyifwa vyose vyamala,   
 Mbakukondwa kwandanda wasamba m'ndopa zake

title: 239 Kasi Mwavuka?
markdown:
### 239 Kasi Mwavuka?   
 C.H. 341 ART THOU WEARY?

  **1.**   
  Kasi mwavuka, mwalombotoka m'kwananga?   
 Yesu wakuti, "Zani mupumule."

  **2.**   
  Kasi wana vimanyisko kundirongozga?   
 Mabamba mu malundi na m'mawoko.

  **3.**   
  Kasi wana mphumphu ya ufumu pa mutu?   
 Inya nadi mphumphu kweni nja minga,

  **4.**   
  Para ndamsanga, ndamronda pawenge phindu?   
 Nditoketoke m'chitima, m'masozi.

  **5.**   
  Para ndamkoreska lyo wamundipachi?   
 Chitima na masozi vya mumala.

  **6.**   
  Para ndamfumba wan'pokerere wamkana?   
 Chara nadi; mpaka charu chimale

  **7.**   
  Kupiripita, kumsanga wangan'tumbika?   
 Watuwa, zintchimi wakuti, "Enya."

title: 240 Wona Mponoski Pa Mryango
markdown:
### 240 Wona Mponoski Pa Mryango   
 CH 227 AT THE DOOR

  **1.**   
  Wona Mponoski pa mryango kukhung'uska mwakufwasa   
 Walindizga, wachalipo ungachitanga msinjiro  **2.**   
  Wakukuwuzga ugule golide m'weme kwa lyo,   
 Uphake m'maso uwone nakuwuskako uheni.  **3.**   
  Pulika mazgu gha nthumi usankhe kaumaliro,   
 Ndiwe wak'lupuka waka ipo khoma uwereko.  **4.**   
  Wamalizga mlimo wake ntha waweyererengeso,   
 Mheni wawe ntheura swi murunji wawe mrunji swi.  **5.**   
  Sisi lazumbwa na jumi wachali pa mryango wako,   
 Wuka, jula pa muryango umunjizge m'bwezi wako.  **6.**   
  Inya, mnjizge mlendo wako Mwa lyo upumulenge,   
 Nakurya nayo mumtende iwe na lyo pamoza.

title: 241 Kuli Charu Chakutowa
markdown:
### 241 Kuli Charu Chakutowa   
 C.H. 554 BEULAH LAND

  **1.**   
  Kuli charu chakutowa chimwemwe chake ndam'hala,   
 Dazi liweme likwiza chisi cha m'charu cham'mala.

  **Chorus:**   
 Inya, charu chakutowa nkhudoka kwima pa phiri;   
 Kuwona nyanja gabuka nyumba yandinozgekera;   
 Pa mLima wa myirayira kwithu kukaya yandanda.

  **2.**   
  Muthaski wamwenda nane kunozga pakukumana;   
 Wamundikora pawoko kundirongozga kuchanya.

  **3.**   
  Tumphepo twa kununkhira twa makuni gha kuchanya;   
 Maluwa ntha ghakufota mironga ntha yikomira.

  **4.**   
  Mphepo ku zambwe zamzura na sumu ziweme nadi;   
 Wangelo, watuwa wose wamkwimba za chiponosko.

title: 242 Chinthemwa Ntchiweme
markdown:
### 242 Chinthemwa Ntchiweme   
 BLEST BE THE TE 

  **1.**   
  Chinthemwa ntchiweme chikutigumanya;   
 Mwene-na-wene na wanthu nga ntchitemwa Chake.

  **2.**   
  Kwa Dada kuchanya tikupa marombo Wofi,   
 chakurata nchimo nakwenjerwa kwithu.

  **3.**   
  Mu masuzgo ghithu na maunonono;   
 Tikughanaghanirana kulira pamoza.

  **4.**   
  Para talekana tikukwenyerera;   
 Kweni tikumane m'mtima tizamwonanaso.

title: 243 Wuka Mzimu Wane
markdown:
### 243 Wuka Mzimu Wane   
 C.S. 123 ARISE, MY SOUL, 

ARISE!  **1.**   
  Wuka moyo wane fumya wofi wako,   
 Sembe ya mundopa chifukwa cha ine,   
 Yikwima m'malo mwa ine pa chizumbe cha mwenecho,   
 Zina lane lalembeka.

  **2.**   
  Kuchanya walipo wakund'weyerera,   
 Chitemwa cha lyo chikuthiska ndopa,   
 Wakatifwira tose 'mwe wakatifwira tose 'mwe,   
 Nakumija pa chizumbe.

  **3.**   
  Vilonda vinkhondi vikamupweteka,   
 Ndivyo malurombo ghakundinenera,   
 Nakuti, "Mgowoke Dada" nakuti, "Mgowoke Dada."   
 Wakuzomera ndipone.

  **4.**   
  Dada wakump'lika mwimiliri wake,   
 Wangamkana cha yose wiza kwa lyo,   
 Mzimu wakuzomereZga Mzimu wakuzomerezga,   
 Ndababiwa mwa Chiuta.

title: 244 ZaKwa Yesu
markdown:
### 244 ZaKwa Yesu   
 COME TO JESUS

  **1.**   
  Za kwa Yesu za kwa Yesu, 'za Kwa Yesu sono   
 Sono za kwa Yesu 'za kwa Yesu sono.

  **2.**   
  Ponoskeka, ponoskeka, ponoskeka sono;   
 Sono ponoskeka ponoskeka sono.

  **3.**   
  Ngwa nkhongono ngwa nkhongono ngwa nkhongono sono,   
 Sono ngwa nkhongono ngwa nkhongono sono.

  **4.**   
  Umucheme umucheme umucheme sono;   
 Sono umucheme umucheme sono.

  **5.**   
  Wakulinda wakulinda wakulinda iwe   
 Sono wakulinda wakulinda iwe

  **6.**   
  Umgomezge umgomezge umgomezge sono   
 Sono umgomezge umgomezge sono.

  **7.**   
  Watumbike watumbike watumbuke iwe,   
 Sono watumbike watumbike iwe.

title: 245 Palije Zina Nga Yesu
markdown:
### 245 Palije Zina Nga Yesu   
 C.H. 517 THERES NO OTHER NAME

  **1.**   
  Palije zina nga Yesu ndilo pera ndiweme   
 Ndakukondweska wangelo na tawakhristu wuwo.

  **Chorus:**   
 Zina (zina), zina (zina)   
 paLije zina nga Yesu,   
 Zina (zina), zina (zina)   
 paLje zina nga Yesu.

  **2.**   
  Palije zina nga Yesu para ndina chitima;   
 Palije zina nga Yesu para ndina chimwemwe.

  **3.**   
  Nkhugomezga ndakum'wona pakwiza m'uchindami,   
 Wam'ndipokerera mchanya mtima wane wamkondwa.

  **4.**   
  Mkhumbo lake nditewete m'munda wake wa mpheska,   
 "Mwe nkhuweme lyo pera wanditumbike m'vyose.

  **5.**   
  M'khumbo lake 'sange ndafwa thupi lane lagona,   
 Mwe nkhuweme lyo pera ndiyo ndimugomezge.

title: 246 Muyowoyere Lizgu Yesu
markdown:
### 246 Muyowoyere Lizgu Yesu   
 NOW JUST A WORD FOR JESUS

  **1.**   
  Muyowoyere lizgu Yesu m'bwezi wako;   
 Iza utiphalire wakuchitirachi.

  **Refrain:**   
 Muyowoyere Yesu tovwirike m'nthowa;   
 Lizgu Lichoko waka nena, yimba, romba.

  **2.**   
  Muyowoyere lizgu Yesu wagowoka;   
 Mu uchizi wa Yesu yezga ukafike.

  **3.**   
  Muyowoyere lizgu Yesu kukana cha, Uti,   
 "Nkhumtemwa Mtaski, Wakandiwombola.

  **4.**   
  Muyowoyere lizgu Yesu kuchedwa cha,   
 NUzerezga mulimo kwiziska chitima.

  **5.**   
  Muyowoyere lizgu Yesu mkugongowa,   
 Uka, mkuvuka kwako, vyose mulekere.

title: 247 Mabelu Kucha
markdown:
### 247 Mabelu Kucha   
 C.S. 29 RING THE BELLS

 OF HEAVEN  **1.**   
  Mabelu kuchanya! kuli chimwemwe,   
 Para wakwananga wazgoka,   
 Dada wakumtemerera ku nthowa,   
 Mwana wakuzgewa wawera

  **Chorus:**

 Ntchindi, ntchindi na viding'indi   
 Wakuwombokwa wavwaLikika tu!

  **2.**   
  Mabelu kuchanya! kuli chimwemwe,   
 Wakuzgewa wang'anamuka,   
 Wakwananga wawezgeka k'heni,   
 Wababikaso mhanya uno.

  **3.**   
  Mabelu kuchanya! ch'phikiro sono,   
 wangelo wakwimba nkhanira,   
 Mtandazge chimwemwe ku wakwananga,   
 Munthu yumoza wababiwa.

title: 248 Yesu Mnazarete Wakujumpha
markdown:
### 248 Yesu Mnazarete Wakujumpha   
 JESUS OF NAZARETH PASSETH BY

  **1.**   
  wanthu wanandi ntheura   
 wakwendaso mwakuphinda,   
 Na kongana muunandi,   
 kasi wakupenja vichi?   
 Khala chete nkhuphalire,

" Khala chete nkhuphalire,

  **2.**   
  Yesu ndi njani wakuti   
 wasunkhunye muzi nthena?   
 Myeni waka wa munthowa   
 kusunkhunya wanthu nthena?   
 Mwakuchuruska wakati,   
 "Yesu m'Nazarete wakjumpha,   
" Mwakuchuruska wakati,   
 "Yesu m'Nazarete wakjumpha.

  **3.**   
  Yesu wakiza pa charu   
 na kwendapo nga ndi munthu,   
 Wa masuzgo wakasanga   
 walwali, wakulimala,   
 wambula maso, wakiza,

 Wambula maso, wakiza,   
 "Yesu m'Nazarete wakjumpha.

  **4.**   
  Lero wakwendaso pose,   
 tik'wona malwayo ghake,   
 Wakwenda m' milimo yithu   
 wakwiza kukhala nase,   
 Mkukondwa tichemerez   
 "Yesu mNazarete wakjumpha,   
 Mkukon Uchemerezge,   
 "Yesu mNazarete wakjumpha.

  **5.**   
  Zaninge mwa wakuvuka   
 m'pumule m'sange chikaya,   
 Wakuzgewa wa Wadada   
 zaninge mumuzomere;   
 Mwakuyezgeka mchimbire,

 akuyezgeka mchimbire,

title: 249 Zikawamo Mberere
markdown:
### 249 Zikawamo Mberere   
 C.H. 673 THERE WERE NINETY

 AND NINE

  **1.**   
  Zikawamo mberere zinandi,   
 Mulukutu kukaya,   
 Kweni yimoza yikazgewapo,   
 Yekha kumapopa yil.   
 Kutali na kaya yiweme,   
 Kutali na mliska muweme;   
 Kutali na mliska muweme.

  **2.**   
  Fumu mberere nzinandi,   
 Lukutu lwazura fwa!   
 Tikuzizwa kuti mukupenja,   
 Yimoza maso kwa!   
 Fumu yikazgora,   
 "Yene'yo Yiri kuzgewera m'mayiyi,   
 Ndirute sono nkhayipenje."

  **3.**   
  Nayumo munthu wamanya,   
 Kofya kwa mironga,   
 Na chisi cha usiku uwo,   
 Icho wakendamo.   
 Mu mayiyi wakayisanga,   
 Yikurwara na kuzirika,   
 Yikuberereskera ku nyifwa.   
 Fumu, ndopa za munthowa,

  **4.**   
  Zasururirachi?   
 Zathikira wakupuluka,   
 Kuti wawereko.   
 Mawoko ghaphapuka wuli?   
 Ghakalasika na usiku,   
 Mu minga yinandinandi.   
 Mu mapiri na m'thengere wuwo,

  **5.**   
  Ehe! yapulikikwa   
 Nchemerezgo kuti,   
 "Kondwani! ndayisanga mberere,"   
 wangelo wose wakuchanya Wazgora,   
 "Sekererani 'mwe,   
 Fumu yawera na mberere."

title: 251 Kulira Nkhanthu Cha
markdown:
### 251 Kulira Nkhanthu Cha   
 C.S. 92 WEEPING WILL NOT SAVE ME

  **1.**   
  Kulira nkhanthu cha nanga chisko chingawa,   
 Ntha kungamazga soka na kusuka kwananga,   
 Kulira nkhanthu cha

  **Chorus:**   
 Yesu wakandifwira wakafwa pa mphinjika,   
 WakuLindizga ine kuti wandithaske.

  **2.**   
  Milimo nayoso nanga yitowe uli,   
 K'ghanaghana makora ntha yingatozga ine,   
 Mlimo nkhanthu chara.

  **3.**   
  Kulindizga nako kugona mkusuzgika,   
 Nkhupulika kuchema kulindizga nkhwawaka,   
 Kuti nkhanthu chara.

  **4.**   
  A Yesu Mponoski Imwe mukandifwira,   
 Nkhugomezga mwa Imwe mundithaske mkwananga,   
 Kuti ndiwombokwe.

title: 252 Iza Iwe Wakwananga
markdown:
### 252 Iza Iwe Wakwananga   
 COME, EVERY SOUL BY SIN OPPRESSED

  **1.**   
  Iza iwe wakwananga Fumu njalusungu,   
 Yikupumuzgenge nadi para wagomezga.

  **Refrain:**   
 Umgomezge umgomezge mgomezge sono,   
 Wati wakuthaske iwe wakuthaskenge.

  **2.**   
  Yesu wakathira ndopa kupa vitumbiko,   
 Ujibizge m'ndopa zake zikusukenge tu.

  **3.**   
  Inya, Yesu mbunenesko nthowa ya kuchanya,   
 Omgomezge kuchedwa cha utumbikikenge.

  **4.**   
  Iza uwe mtuwa nawe uye ku'chindami,   
 Ku charu cha myirayira, chimwemwe chandanda

title: 253 Mliska Wa wa Israeli
markdown:
### 253 Mliska Wa wa Israeli   
 C.H. 411 SEE, ISRAEL'S GENTLE SHEPHERD

  **1.**   
  Mliska wa wa Israeli, Muweme nkhanira,   
 Wakuzichema mberere wazifukatire.

  **2.**   
  Muzizomerezge zize wakuzitoza cha,   
 Wazitumbikenge zose Fumu ya wangelo.

  **3.**   
  Tikwiza nazo kwa Imwe Tikumupirani,   
 Nase ise tiri winu na wanaso withu.

title: 254 Mchindike Yehova
markdown:
### 254 Mchindike Yehova   
 PRAISE YE JEHOVA'S 

  **1.**   
  Mchindike Yehova mkwezge zina lake timuwope,   
 Kuchanya kwa lyo chitemwa chikuru,   
 Charu chose chikuthemba lyo.

  **2.**   
  Lipenga lilire lakutonda nkhondo kose kose,   
 Pawe viding'indi na wazeze wuwo,   
 Vimbe pose pose kumtamika.

  **3.**   
  Pakwimba mukwezge kungani zinthambo zikolane,   
 Wakutipa mvuchi, mvuchi wakuzala,   
 Na wanangwa wake tikuwonga

title: 255 Nkhumukhumbani Yesu
markdown:
### 255 Nkhumukhumbani Yesu   
 I NEED THEE, PRECIOUS JESUS   
Arr. by Edward F. Rimbauil

  **1.**   
  Nkhumukhumbani Yesu ndamukavu ine,   
 Muyeni waulendo wamburaso kanthu;   
 "Mwe mundipe chitemwa chakundikondweska,   
 Kundirongozga m'nthowa kundipa nkhongono.

  **2.**   
  Nkhukhumba mtima winu uvwire mkwenjerwa,   
 Undimanye m'viyezgo uvwire m' vitima;   
 Nkhukhumba Mzimu Mtuwa wandisambizgenge,   
 Wandirongore Yesu ndi mwanamberere.

  **3.**   
  Nkhumukhumbani Yesu ndizakam'woneni,   
 Muli mchiwingavula pa chizumbe chinu;   
 Pamoza na watuwa ndamukukondwa swi,   
 Kumtamikani imwe kumdodoliskani.

title: 256 Chiuta Mukatovwira
markdown:
### 256 Chiuta Mukatovwira   
 CH 81 OGOD, OUR HELP

  **1.**   
  Chiuta mukatovwira chigomezgo ndimwe   
 Mvikiriri mumasuzgo na kwithu kwandanda.

  **2.**   
  Pasi pa chizumbe chinu tikubisamapo,   
 Woko linu ndakukwana kutivikirira.

  **3.**   
  Mapiri ghandalengeke charu chindaweko,   
 Pa mtendeko mukawako mwamkuwakoso swi!

  **4.**   
  Myaka yinandi kwa Imwe ndi dazi limoza,   
 Ufupi ngeti mbusiku, zuwa lindafume.

  **5.**   
  Chiuta mukatovwira chigomezgo ndimwe,   
 Muwe murongozgi withu na kwithu kwandanda.

title: 257 Mapiri Ghakusukunyika Cha
markdown:
### 257 Mapiri Ghakusukunyika Cha   
 UNASHAKEN AS THE SACRED HILLS

  **1.**   
  Mapiri ghakusukunyika cha nase nthena,   
 Kukhola gwa! nga jalawe wake wa Yehova.

  **2.**   
  Phiri, chimati kulije vyakuyana nayo,   
 Mawoko ghakutemwa swi! ghakusunga ise.

  **3.**   
  Wachitireni viweme wakupulikira,   
 Wakugona m'unenesko wa marango ghinu.

title: 258 Dango La Chiuta Ili
markdown:
### 258 Dango La Chiuta Ili   
 ONE LIVING FAITH

  **1.**   
  Dango la Chiuta ili 'mwe ndakuzirwa nkhanira,   
 Ndakukhala myirayira ndi mazguso gha umoyo.

  **2.**   
  Dango linu 'mwe nadituwa mutigowokere ise   
 Ndituwa mwa ilo lene wanji ntha wangaliwona.

  **3.**   
  Mugowokerenge winu ku uheni wawo wose   
 Mutovwirenge kusunga marango ghinu ghatuwa

title: 259 Kasi Tamkumana Kura?
markdown:
### 259 Kasi Tamkumana Kura?   
 SHALL WE MEET?

  **1.**   
  Kasi tamkumana kura uko suzgo kulije?   
 Uko ungweru ngwa ndanda kulijeso chitima

  **Chorus:**   
 Tayamkukumana tayamkumana pasirya   
 Kasi tamkumana kura uko suzgo kuLije?

  **2.**   
  Tamkumana padowoko chimphupulu chamara,   
 Tayamkuponya nyangulu pajambuko lituwa.

  **3.**   
  Tamkumana mumusumba uwo wukugadima,   
 Viwumba n'vya yasipisi musili ndi Chiuta.

  **4.**   
  Tamkumana na Mponoski pakuwombola wake,   
 Tam'manya lusungu lwake tamkhala pa chizumbe.

title: 260 Dambo La Byula
markdown:
### 260 Dambo La Byula   
 VALE OF BEULAH

  **1.**   
  Ndapitira kusika kwa dambo la m'mapopa,   
 "Mwe ndi dambo lakutowa zina lake Byula   
 Ndipo ndasangaso mose mwamera maluwa,   
 Muponoski lyo mwene wakwenda na ine.

  **Chorus:**   
 Dambo ByuLa, dambo ByuLa,   
 ndakunditowera,   
 Charu cha phangano   
 nkhuchiwonera pataLi.

  **2.**   
  Palije mfwiri wakujandizga nthowa yane,   
 Ungweru wauchindami ndiwo ukuwala;   
 Kuchanya wakundimbira sumu zakunczga,   
 Wakukowerana makora kund pokerera.

  **3.**   
  NKhurutako na chimwemwe ku msumba utuwa,   
 Chimwemwe chikungweruska nthowa nyengo zose,   
 Ndamujula vipata vya msumba wakuwala,   
 WSKambo uwo wam'ndifiska m'msumba wa chitemwa.

title: 261 Dambo Liweme La Eden
markdown:
### 261 Dambo Liweme La Eden   
 BEAUTIFUL VALLEY OF EDEN

  **1.**   
  Dambo liweme la Eden' muli mtende mula,   
 Ku mitima yakuvuka likupa kuchizga.

  **Refrain:**   
 Dambo Liweme La Eden' kwawo kwa warunji,   
 Usange ndiri mumasuzgo mundipe kupumuLa.

  **3.**   
  Ku mutima wakulira kukwiza ungweru,   
 Kwimba sumu za wangelo mu kazimuzimu.

  **4.**   
  Kuli chikaya cha mtaski na wakuthaskika,   
 Ku mapiri gha 'chindami kukwimbika sumu.

title: 262 Khristu Panji Baraba
markdown:
### 262 Khristu Panji Baraba   
 CHRIST OR BARABBAS

  **1.**   
  Ndichitechi na Yesu wimilira apa?   
 Vyakuvwara viswesi, wamvwarika minga.

  **Chorus:**   
 Sono ndifumbepo m'ngandizgora wuLi?   
 Ndimpayike Fumu Yesu ndim Leke Baraba?

  **2.**   
  Ndisutule m'nkhungu munthu muheni nadi,   
 Panji Mponoski Yesu, mkusankhapo njani?

  **3.**   
  Fumbo ili ndakofya nadi mwawanyane,   
 Wezi ulipo sono, ukulindilira.

  **4.**   
  Ndizgore uli sono nkhutemwa vya charu,   
 Ndimupayike Yesu, Baraba wachire.

  **5.**   
  Panyengo iyi sono tatimbanizgika,   
 Iwe mkhristu wimapo mkati mu visuzgo.

title: 263 Mwize Navyo Vyatchumi
markdown:
### 263 Mwize Navyo Vyatchumi   
 BRING YE ALL THE TITHES

  **1.**   
  Pulikani mazgu gha Fumu yithu   
 mwize navyo vyatchumi munthamba,   
 Mjipereke kwa lyo nyengo   
 zose kulindizga vitumbiko.

  **Chorus:**   
 Mwize navyo vyatchumi munthamba,   
 "Mundiyezge" yanena Fumu,   
 "nditimupani vitumbiko,   
 MaLo ghakusunga ghachepenge"

  **2.**   
  Ka nkhongono ya Mzimu mkuyikhumba?   
 mwize navyo vya tchumi munthamba,   
 Mkhalenge nayo nyengo yiri   
 yose apo wakupa thumbiko.

  **3.**   
  Ka pali kanthu pa imwe na Fumu?   
 mwize navyo vyatchumi munthamba,   
 Mwize navyo nga ndi phangano   
 lake watimipaninge thuimbiko.

  **4.**   
  Wuska mtima wako na kumuchema   
 pakwiza na vyatchumi munthamba,   
 Gomezga phangano lake m'chindike   
 na mtima wakum zomera.

  **5.**   
  Sumu za ntchindi m'chanya ziyimbike   
 tiza navyo vyatchumi munthamba,   
 Timbenge haleluya mukukondwa   
 tapokera vitumbiko.

title: 264 Dazi Lakupumula
markdown:
### 264 Dazi Lakupumula   
 HOLY DAY, JEHOVAH'S REST

  **1.**   
  Dazi lakupumula ntchilengiwa cha Fumu,   
 Ndicho cha umaliro Fumu yikapa munthu.

  **Refrain:**   
 Tiku kondwa Tiku kundwa   
 (Iza, iza, iza nadi, Iza, iza, iza nadi)   
 Tikukondwa pakwiza kwa dazi La Sabata.

  **2.**   
  Pakumala kulenga wakatipa Sabata   
 Ndipo wakatumbika chinkhondi na chiwiri.

  **3.**   
  Kweni wanthu wasintha wakupumula sande,   
 Penjani mumasimbo ntha m'sangemo ntheura.

  **4.**   
  Mu unenesko wose ndi munthu wakasintha,   
 Mumasimbo mulije kusintha m'migonezi

  **5.**   
  Nkhapenjamo nkhawona dango la vya Sabata,   
 po nkhapulikira ndicho chekha ntchiweme.

title: 265 Muna Mtende
markdown:
### 265 Muna Mtende   
 C.H. 311PEACE, PERFECT PEACE   
Arr. by Charles J. Vinc

  **1.**   
  Muna mtende m'charu cha uheni?   
 Ndopa za Yesu zikupa mtende.

  **2.**   
  Muna mtende na munthangwaniko?   
 Kulimira Yesu nkhupumula

  **3.**   
  Muna mtende m'vitima vikuru?   
 Musanguruski ndi Yesu yekha.

  **4.**   
  Muna mtende wabali kutali,   
 Mwa Yesu tiri pamoza tose.

  **5.**   
  Muna mtende ntha mkumanya m'nthazi,   
 Tikumanya Yesu pa chizumbe.

  **6.**   
  Muna mtende nyifwa yazingizga?   
 Yesu wamala mbozga za nyitwa.

  **7.**   
  Mtende nadi pasi na kuchanya?   
 Yesu wakutitolera mtende.

title: 267 Mija Mbuto Za Chitemwa
markdown:
### 267 Mija Mbuto Za Chitemwa   
 SCATTER SEEDS OF KINDNESS

  **1.**   
  Tisange ivyo nviweme mu nthowa yithu yose;   
 Tisunge tirigu pera titaye 'vyo nvyawaka;   
 Tisange vyakukondweska mvitumbiko vya lero;   
 Mu chigomezgo tifumye minga ya kukhuwazga.

  **Chorus:**   
 Umije vyaLusungu umije vyaLusungu;   
 Umije vyaLusungu ivyo tizamuvuna.

  **2.**   
  Ntha tikutemwa maluwa na kwimba kwa tuyuni,   
 Mpaka maluwa natuyuni vyose vifumepo.   
 Zuwa ntha tikulitemwa pa nyengo ya chihanya,   
 Para kwizaso chiule tikulikhumba zuwa.

  **3.**   
  Mwana pakuchita ngozi kuswa nkhombo ya maji,   
 Kasi mum'kalipirenge na kufumya mankhwinya.   
 Pakumanya kuti machero wangamanya kufwa,   
 Kasi pakukwiya nayo muphye mtima mha'uno?

  **4.**   
  Pakukumbuka vya m'nyuma za ivyo tikachita,   
 Mu mazgu ghakukalipa ghakukhuwazga wanji   
 Milimo yithu yiheni ndiyo yikukumbuska,   
 Kumija mbuto ziweme izo tizamuvuna.

title: 268 Fumu Mphepo Yikukuntha
markdown:
### 268 Fumu Mphepo Yikukuntha   
 PEACE BE STILL!

  **1.**   
  Fumu mphepo yikukuntha, mayigha ghakukwera;   
 Mlengalenga mwabinkha nadi,   
 na wovwiri wasowa,   
 Mkuwona chara tikufwa mukugonerachi?   
 Apo nyengo yose 'mwe njakofya,   
 kasi tifwire m'maji?

  **Refrain:**   
 "Mphepo m'nyanja yitindipuLike   
 wa bata ('wa bata),   
 Nanga mayigha ghakaLipe Satana,   
 anthu panji navinyake,   
 Maji ntha ghangawubizga wato,   
 muLi mwene nyanja navyam charu,   
 vyose vindipuiikirenge   
 'wa bata, wa bata,   
 Vyose vindipuLikirenge kuwe bata."

  **2.**   
  Fumu mitima yasweka nkhuwa panthazi pinu,   
 Pasi pa mtima ndasuzgika   
 'mwe zani mundithaske,   
 Masuzgo gha zakwananga   
 ghandizingizga'ne,   
 Nkhufwa ine, nkhufwa ine,   
 Fumu, zani mundirongozge.

  **3.**   
  Fumu ukali wamara vyose sono vyatuna,   
 Mhanya ukuwara panyanja

 indizgani Muponoski mungandisidanga,   
 Mukukondwa ndamfika ku   
 m'lima ndamkupumula kura.

title: 269 Mponoski VWakuzizwiska Ndi Yesu
markdown:
### 269 Mponoski VWakuzizwiska Ndi Yesu   
 A WONDERFUL SAVIOUR IS JESUS

  **1.**   
  Mponoski wakuzizwiska ndi Yesu

  **Refrain:**   
 Wakundibisa wamoyo mjaLawe,

  **2.**   
  Mponoski wakuzizwiska ndi Yesu

  **3.**   
  Wakundipa vitumbiko vinandi

  **4.**   
  Apo ndamkuvwala utuwa wake

title: 270 Mponoski Withu
markdown:
### 270 Mponoski Withu

  **1.**

  **2.**

 Wasange yunji m'neneska wakhalemo.

  **3.**   
  Mazgu ghake ghakuphwepwa kufuma kuchanya,

  **4.**

 Ghanoghano liweme naloso ndake.

  **5.**   
  Mzimu mutuwa mutichitirenge lusungu,   
 Mukhale m'mitima yithu wana winu.

title: 271 Kwananga Kungasweta
markdown:
### 271 Kwananga Kungasweta   
 THO' YOUR SINS BE AS SCARLET

  **1.**

 Kutituwiskikenge kutituwiskikenge

  **2.**   
  Pulika wakuchema "werera kwa Chiuta,

  **3.**   
  Wakugowokerenge ntha wakumbukireso,

title: 272 Ponya Chingwe Cha Moyo
markdown:
### 272 Ponya Chingwe Cha Moyo   
 THROW OUT THE LIFE LINE

  **1.**   
  Ponya chingwe cha moyo mu chisi,   
 Kuli m'bali yunji wathaskike,   
 M'bali wam'nyake n'njani wam'thaske,   
 Ponya chingwe mumasuzgo umvwire

  **Refrain:**   
 Uponye chingwe, chingwe cha moyo,   
 Yunji wakutayika.   
 Uponye chingwe, chingwe cha moyo,   
 Yunji wakubira 'mwe.

  **2.**   
  Ponya chingwe luwiro, na mphavu,   
 Ukuziulikirachi nthena?   
 Wona wakubira wendeskenge,   
 Na wato wa umoyo wendeskenge.

  **3.**   
  Ponya chingwe cha moyo ku wanthu,   
 Awo undayeko wakubira.   
 Mphepo za viyezgo na masuzgo,   
 Viwaponyenge ku ndimba ya maji.

  **4.**   
  Luwiro kuthaska kumalenge,   
 Luwiro wafikenge ku mlima.   
 Endeska m'bali ungachedwanga,   
 Ponya chingwe cha moyo uwathaske.

title: 273 Uyegamirenge Pa Yesu
markdown:
### 273 Uyegamirenge Pa Yesu   
 CS. 502 LEAN ON HIS ARMS

  **1.**   
  Uyegamirenge pa Yesu wakovwirenge kovwirenge,   
 Para wamugomezga iyo wakusanguruska.

  **Chorus:**   
 **(S/T)**   
  Yegamira m'chitemwa chake,   
 **(A/B)**   
  (Yegamira m'mawoko m'chitemwa chake),   
 **(ST)**   
  Yegamira m Lusungu Lwake,   
 **(A/B)**   
  (Yegamira iyo m Lusungu wake),

  Yegamira maso kuchanya,   
 **(A/B)**   
  (Yegamira Mponoski maso kuchanya),

  Yegamira Mponoski.  **2.**

  **3.**

 Nanga katundu wawemzito umupe mkuromba.

  **4.**   
  Uyegamirenge pa Yesum'rekere vyose mupe vyose,   
 Mtima wa Fumu ngwa chitemwa ntha wakugomphora.

title: 274 Ndiri Na Mponoski
markdown:
### 274 Ndiri Na Mponoski   
 C.H. 575 I HAVE A SAVIOUR

  **1.**   
  Ndina Mponoski wakuweyerera

 Sono wakun'sunga mkutemwa kwake,   
 Mponoski wane mphanyi namwe ngwinu.

  **Refrain:**   
 Nkhumuromberani; nkhumuromberani,   
 Nkhumuromberani, nkhumuromberani.

  **2.**   
  Ndina Dada uyo wandipa ine,   
 Chigomezgo cha umoyo wandanda.   
 Sono sono wandichemere kuchanya,   
 Mphanyi wazomera ndirute namwe.

  **3.**   
  Ndina mnjirira wakutowa nadi,   
 Ukundilindizga mu uchindami;   
 Pakuwupokerera ndamkugadima,   
 Wam'nyane nawe ukapoke wako.

  **4.**   
  Para Yesu wamsangani m pharazge,   
 Kuti Mponoski wane namwe ngwinu,   
 Murombe Mponoski wize namwe kura,   
 Lurombo lwinu lutizgorekenge.

title: 275 Kwandanda Ndi Nkhu?
markdown:
### 275 Kwandanda Ndi Nkhu?   
 ETERNITY-WHERE?

  **1.**   
  Kwandanda ndi nkhu? 'mwe ndilo fumbo,   
 Kose uko uli nako liliko.   
 Kasi wamkuwa nkhu kwa myirayira?   
 Kasi wamkuwa nkhu kwa myirayira?

  **2.**   
  Kwandanda ndi nkhu? Kwandanda ndi nkhu?   
 Nawakuwombokwa panji waheni?   
 Wam'wa Iwande ndini kwa myirayira?   
 Wam'wa Iwande ndini kwa myirayira?

  **3.**   
  Kwandanda ndi nkhu? ukuti uli?   
 Na vyakukondweska vya m'charu ichi?   
 Ujighanaghane kwandanda ndi nkhu?   
 Ujighanaghane kwandanda ndi nkhu?

  **4.**   
  Kwandanda ndi nkhu? M'bwezi pwerera,   
 Sono sono Chiuta weruzgenge.   
 Mhanyauno ndiwe, kwandanda ndi nkhu?   
 Mhanyauno ndiwe, kwandanda ndi nkhu?

  **5.**   
  Kwandanda ndi nkhu? Kwandanda ndi nkhu?   
 Mbwezi kugona cha leka vya m'charu,   
 OZgole fumbo, kwandanda ndi nkhu?   
 Ozgole fumbo, kwandanda ndi nkhu?

title: 276 Wakapenja Ine
markdown:
### 276 Wakapenja Ine   
 SEEKING FOR ME

  **1.**   
  Muryero wang'onmbe m'Betelehem'   
 wakababiwa Mponoski wane,   
 Nadi nchakuzizwiska chomene wakapenja ine,   
 Wakapenja ine wakapenja ine,   
 Nadi nchakuzizwiska chomene wakapenja ine.

  **2.**   
  Yesu Mponoski pa Kalivari   
 wakafwa kundiwombola ine,   
 Nadi nchakuzizwiska chomene wakafwira ine,   
 Wakafwira ine wakatwira ine,   
 Nadi nchakuzizwiska chomene wakafwira ine.

  **3.**   
  Yesu Mponoski wakandipenja

 Wakapepeka uzima wane wakachema ine,   
 Wakachema ine wakachema ine,   
 Wakapepeka uzima wane wakachema ine.

  **4.**   
  Yesu wati wikhenge kuchanya   
 ndakukondweska phangano lake,   
 Inya ndizakumwona wakwikha wakwizira ine,   
 Wakwizira ine wakwizira ine,   
 Inya ndizakumwona wakwikha wakwizira ine.

title: 277 Kuvwala Ndirongozge
markdown:
### 277 Kuvwala Ndirongozge   
 LEAD KINDLY LIGHT

  **1.**   
  Kuwala, ndirongozge mu chisi, ndirongozge,   
 Kuli mdima kukaya nkhutali,   
 ndirongozge Nkhupempha kuwona kutali cha,   
 Lundi limoza ndakundikwana.

  **2.**   
  Nkhawa nthena chara   
 kum'pemphani murongozge,   
 Nkhatemwanga kwenda m'nthowa   
 yane m'ndirongozge,   
 Nkhatemwa vinthu viheni pera,   
 Nkhajikuzga m'ngavikumbukanga.

  **3.**   
  Nkhongono zinu zanditumbika mkurongoZga,   
 Mmalo ghose ghaheni m'usiku mwarongozga,   
 Mlenji wangelo wakusekera,   
 Awo nane nkhawatemwa kale.

title: 278 Ndi Nthowa Yane Cha
markdown:
### 278 Ndi Nthowa Yane Cha   
 C.S. 661 NOT MY WAY

  **1.**   
  Ndi nthowa yane cha nanga yingasuzga,   
 Ndirongozgeninge Mndisankhire nthowa,   
 Kusankha ndekha cha m'ngandilekerera,   
 Mndisankhire Fumu ndendemo makora.

  **2.**   
  Ufumu nkhukhumba winu m'ndipe nthowa,   
 Kurata ku'moyo kurazga kwa Imwe,   
 Mndisungire nkhombo yak'zula na 'moyo,   
 Sankhire wabwezi chuma panji soka.

  **3.**   
  Sankhire wabwezi, nthenda panji moyo,   
 Musankhire ine chakundenerera,   
 Ndiule kusankha chikulu - chichoko,   
 Mundirongozgenge, m'ndikwanire Fumu.

title: 279 Zani Kuno Kwa Ine
markdown:
### 279 Zani Kuno Kwa Ine

  **1.**   
  'Mwe! mtima wa chitima na maso gha mdima,   
 Mungamanya kukondwa mwa Yesu Mponoski.

  **Chorus:**

 Mwakuzotofyeka muzakapumuLe.   
 Yegha gori Lane sambira,   
 Ndiri wakufwasa mu mtima   
 MwizampumuLa m'myoyo yinu**(B/T/A):**   
 Zani, 'mwe zani kuno,   
 izani mwakuzotofyeka   
 **ALto:**   
 Mwakuzotofyeka muzakapumuLe,   
**(B/T):**   
 Zani mwakuzotofyeka mzakapumuLe,   
 **(A/TIB):**   
 Lani, yeghani gori, Izani, sambirani,   
**(T/B):** NfiLi wakufwasa mimtima   
 mwizam pumuLa m'myoyo yinu.

  **2.**   
  Chimwemwe cha mu charu ntha chikutikwana,   
 Chitemwa chik'kondweska chitemwa cha Yesu.

  **3.**   
  Mwe uchizi wakuruska wa Yesu Khristu,   
 Uzamkugowokera wakung'anamuka.

  **4.**   
  Mutende nga ndi onga, chitemwa na sumu,   
 Na goriwori lipusu viri mwa Yesu.

title: 280 Fumu Yitnu
markdown:
### 280 Fumu Yitnu   
 OUR KING

  **1.**

 Kuyitamika Fumu nthowa na umoyo.

  **Chorus:**   
 Tikwimba mwe kutamika Fumu (Fumu)   
 Tikwimba 'mwe kum pa 'mwe ntchindi Fumu

  **2.**

 Nanga wali kuchanya wakutemwa mbwenu.

  **3.**   
  Titemwe kumwimbira, kup'lika vya lyo,   
 Apo wakakhalanga m'charu chino kale.

  **4.**   
  Mponoski withu m'weme tikuwa m'malundi,   
 Kuti mutovwirenge kugomezga Imwe.

title: 281 Nyenyezi Yakuwala Mchanya
markdown:
### 281 Nyenyezi Yakuwala Mchanya   
 A BEAUTIFUL STAR

  **1.**   
  Nyenyezi yakuwala m'chanya
