 Kuwala kwake ku'rongozga   
 wazeru kumsanga mwana.

  **Chorus:**   
 YIKuwaLa yikuwaLa nyenyezi   
 yiweme m phin,   
 YIKU WaLa yiku waLa   
 chiponosko chitnu chiza

  **2.**   
  Mazgu ghakayowoya kuti nyengo   
 yakwana ya nyenyezi,   
 wakayirondezga nyenyezi - ndi   
 "Khristu nthanda ya mlenje."

  **3.**   
  Nase tirondezge nga ndiwo,   
 kuwala kwa charu chapasi,   
 Tirombe mpaka tikafike   
 ku chipumulo kuchanya.

title: 282 Mwe Viding'indi Na Mazgu
markdown:
### 282 Mwe Viding'indi Na Mazgu   
 C.S. 342 TEN THOUSAND HARPS

  **1.**   
  Mwe viding'indi na mazgu vikutamika Fumu,   
 Yesu m'chanya ngwakukondwa wakulamula vyose,   
 Wakhala pa chizumbe Mponoski wakUwusa,   
 Aleluya, Aleluya, Aleluyal Amen

  **2.**   
  Mphumphu yinu tamuvwala Fumu ya uchindami,   
 Chitemwa chinu ntchandanda kwa wanthu wiru wose,   
 Wanthu winu mkukondwa wazakumuwonani,   
 Aleluya! Aleluya! Aleluya! Amen

  **3.**   
  Fumu izani luwiro tikumkhumbani nadi,   
 Pakwizakiza dazi'lo mchanya, charu vyam' mala,   
 Tamkulizga mingoli na kupa ntchindi Fumu,   
 Aleluya! Aleluya! Aleluya! Amen

title: 283 Yunji Wam'njira Pa Chipata
markdown:
### 283 Yunji Wam'njira Pa Chipata   
 C.H. 568 SHALL YOU? SHALL?

  **1.**   
  Yunji wamnjira pa chipata kwambula kuchedwa,   
 Kukalawa vya uchindami kasi ndiwe kasi ndine?   
 Kwenda m'miseu ya golide kuwona vyakukondwereska   
 Kukarya chiphikiro m'chanya kasi ndiwe kasi ndine?

  **2.**   
  Yunji wamuthura katundu kwambula kuchedwa,   
 Ndipo wamupokera mphumphu kasi ndiwe kasi ndine?   
 Wamwona Fumu ya 'chindami visuzgo vya charu vyamala,   
 Nakukhala nayo kwandanda kasi ndiwe kasi ndine?

  **3.**   
  Yunji wamkhung'uska chijalo kwambula kuchedwa,   
 Mazgu gharm'ti "ntha nkhukumanya" kasi ndiwe kasi ndine?   
 Wamchema ntha wampulikikwa chijalo cham wa chakujala,   
 Njombe yituwa ntha wampoka kasi ndiwe kasi ndine?

  **4.**   
  Yunii wamkwimba zakutonda kwambula kuchedwa,   
 Wam'kwimba pamo na watuwa kasi ndiwe kasi ndine?   
 Wamutauzgana pasirya, kulekana, suzgo vyamala,   
 Wamjowa m'uchindami kura kasi ndiwe kasi ndine?

title: 284 Mazuwa Ghakuruta
markdown:
### 284 Mazuwa Ghakuruta   
 C.S. 486 WHILE THE DAYS AR

E GOING BY  **1.**   
  Kuli wanthu wavitima mazuwa ghakuruta,   
 Kuli wanthu wakuvuka mazuwa ghakuruta,   
 Nga tawasanguluska palwendo lwa kuchanya,   
 Viweme tichitenge mazuwa ghakuruta.

  **Chorus:**   
 Mazu wa gharuta mazuwa gharuta,   
 Viweme tichitenge mazu wa ghakuruta

  **2.**   
  Tileke kukhala waka mazuwa ghakuruta,   
 Tiwe wakUsanguluka mazuwa ghakuruta,   
 Charu chazula wofi vitima na masozi,   
 Mumovwire munyinu mazuwa ghakuruta.

  **3.**   
  Kutemwa kwatigumanya mazuwa ghakuruta,   
 Wanji wakhala kunyuma mazuwa ghakuruta,   
 Kweni mbuto tasewa zimere posepose,   
 Mitima yisangwenge mazuwa ghakuruta.

title: 285 Kuli Malo Gha Mutende
markdown:
### 285 Kuli Malo Gha Mutende   
 THERE IS A PLACE OF QUITE REST 

  **1.**   
  Kuli malo gha mutende ku mtima wa Fumu,   
 Malo ghambula kwananga ku mtima wa Fumu.

  **Refrain:**   
 Yesu m'womboLi withu kufuma kwa Dada,   
 Mutiguzire kwinu ku mtima wa Fumu.

  **2.**   
  Malo ghakusanguluska ku mtima wa Fumu,   
 lamukumana na mtaski ku mtima wa Fumu.

  **3.**   
  Malo ghakutisutula ku mtima wa Fumu,   
 amkhala m'chimwemwe pera ku mtima wa Fumu.

title: 286 Munditole
markdown:
### 286 Munditole   
 BEAR ME ON

  **1.**   
  Nkhudoka kuwona zuwa Warunji wamnjira   
 Ku Ziyoni na chivwalo chituwa mkukondwa

  **Chorus:**   
 MunditoLe m'nditoLe ku Ziyoni   
 Ku musumba uweme uwo, warunji amkhaLa.

  **2.**   
  Ndampulika Haleluya wa wakuwombokwa,   
 Nane pamoza na iwo tamkwimba lusumu.

  **3.**   
  Mulenje utuwa uwo m'khristu waku'doka,   
 Wakupuputa masozi mkukondwa kwa Fumu.

  **4.**   
  Nkhukhumba Yerusalemu chikaya cha Fumu,   
 Nkhukhumba nkharye vipasi vyakupa umoyo.

title: 287 Mnyengo Ya Viyezgo
markdown:
### 287 Mnyengo Ya Viyezgo   
 CH 73 IN THE HOUR OF TRIAL

  **1.**   
  Mnyengo ya viyezgo Fumu mndisunge,   
 Mzire ndimkaneni na kumlekani.   
 Para nkhuzendama mundichinthiske,   
 Nanga vingasuzga ndireke kuwa.

  **2.**   
  Vyakundikondweska m'charu n'vyawaka,   
 Vyuma vyake navyo n'vyakundinanga.   
 Mndikumbuske suzgo mu Getsemani,   
 Na vyanyifwa yinu pa Kalivare.

  **3.**   
  Mu lusungu Iwinu ndingayezgeka,   
 Panji vyakuwinya vingandiwira.   
 Mzomerezge kuti ndiwone Imwe,   
 Mzomereso myeghe majuvyo gnane.

title: 288 Wakiza Kwa Mponoski
markdown:
### 288 Wakiza Kwa Mponoski   
 C.H. 658 THEY BROUGHT THEIR GIFTS TO JESUS

  **1.**   
  Wakiza kwa Mponoski kupa vyawanangwa,   
 Na mtima wa chitemwa wakavipereka.   
 Ntchito ziweme nadi kovwira wakavu,   
 Vyose wakapereka vikazirwa nadi.

  **Chorus:**   
 Mupani vyawanangwa Yesu wakondwenge,   
 Mumupe mtima winu pa maLundi ghake.

  **2.**   
  Pakati pa wakupa pakimaso mkavu,   
 Wakawona wanyake wakuperekapo,   
 Nayoso wakanweka kupereka kanthu,   
 Kwani wakasowerwa wakiza wa msuma.

  **3.**   
  Wakalira kwa Fumu "Ndivwe wakutemwa,   
 Mutole mntima wane ndamuheni ine."   
 Yesu wakamuzgora, "nawe waperelka,   
 Icho we wandipa charuska wanyako."

title: 289 Mundipokerere
markdown:
### 289 Mundipokerere   
 TAKE ME AS I AM

  **1.**   
  Nkhulira kwa Imwe Fumu kwambula imwe ndifwenge   
 Mundithaske ine, Fumu mundipokerere.

  **Chorus:**   
 M'ndipokerere, m'ndipokerere,   
 Mundithaske ine, Fumu mundipokerere.

  **2.**   
  Ndine muheni chomene kweni mukafwira ine,   
 Mungamanya kundinozga mundipokerere.

  **3.**   
  Nkhutondeka kujinozga ndijipereke ndamwene,   
 Mundithaske imwe mwekha mundipokerer

  **4.**   
  Nkhuwa mu malundi ghinu mundiwone Fumu yane,   
 Muchite mulimo winu mundipokerere.

title: 290 Titewete Mlimo Wa Fumu
markdown:
### 290 Titewete Mlimo Wa Fumu   
 C.S. 574 TOILING FOR JESUS

  **1.**   
  Titewete mlimo mwakukondwa,   
 Titewetere Fumu yithu.   
 Chiri chose 'cho Dada watipa,   
 Tichichite na mtima wose.

  **Refrain:**   
  **(S/A)**   
 Tite vetere nakusekera nakusekera,   
 **(T/B)**   
 (Tiyite wetere Fumu nakusekera Ee! nakusekera),   
 **(S/A)**   
 Tite wetere m'munda wake wampheska,   
 **(T/B)**   
 Tiyite wetere Fumu mmunda wake wampheska. 

  **2.**   
  Mwakukondwa tiphalenge nkhani,   
 Ya chitemwa pa wanthu wake,   
 Khristu, muwuchindami wa wiske,   
 M'wanangwa wakupa thumbiko.

  **3.**   
  Mwakufwasa tilondezge Fumu,   
 Nakwenda mumalwayo ghake,   
 Kulongozgera wanthu kwa lyo,.   
 wakwananga wize kwa Fumu.

title: 291 Wakwenera Ndi Yesu
markdown:
### 291 Wakwenera Ndi Yesu   
 C.H. 168 WORTHY, WORTHY IS THE LAMB

  **1.**   
  Wakwenera ndi Yesu,   
 wakwenera ndi Yesu,   
 Wakwenera ndi Yesu, wakafwa.

  **Refrain:**   
 Ntchindi HaLeLuya!   
 Mwimbe HaLeLuya!   
 Ntchindi Haleluya! kwa Yesu.

  **2.**   
  Ufumu winu wize   
 mumazge zakwananga,   
 Myaka chikwi yifike mwa'tuwa.

  **3.**   
  Ntheura nyengo   
 zose timtemwe,   
 timchindike,   
 Ku lupiri Ziyoni tim'wone.

title: 292 Mavwoko Ghachite Mlimo
markdown:
### 292 Mavwoko Ghachite Mlimo   
 TWO LITTLE HANDS

  **1.**   
  Mawoko ghachite mlimo wake lulimi limuchindike,   
 Makutu ghapulike mazgu mazgu ghamwimbire Sumu.

  **Chorus:**   
 Tikwiza a Fumu tikwiza tichaLi wana,   
 Tikwiza a Fumu kup ika vinu.

  **2.**   
  Malundi ghithu ghende mu nthowa yakukafika kuchanya,   
 Maso nagho ghawazge Baibo likwandula vya chitemwa.

  **3.**   
  Mtima ndiupereke kwa Yesu wathaske umoyo wane,   
 Kuti ndim tewetere mlimo ndiwe nadi wake yose.

title: 293 Wakukhung' uska N'njani?
markdown:
### 293 Wakukhung' uska N'njani?   
 KNOCKING, KNOCKING

  **1.**   
  Wakukhung'uska n'njani?   
 Kulindizga waweme?   
 Ndiyo mlendo wa lusungu,   
 Palijeso munyake.   
 Ine nkhuzizwa nkhanira,   
 Mundijulire mryango.   
 Mundijulire mryango

  **2.**   
  Wachali kukhung'uska,   
 Kulindizga waweme.   
 Chijalo ntchinonono mbu?   
 Viswaswa vyamerap0,   
 Vyakumatika vyati bi!   
 Na vyakudemerera,   
 Na vyakudemerera.

  **3.**   
  Wakukhung'uska n'pera,   
 Kulindizga waweme.   
 Inya 'mwe wakukhung'uska,   
 Na chisoti cha minga.   
 Mponoski wakulindizga,   
 Kasi ungam'njizga cha?   
 Kasi ungam'njizga cha?

title: 294 Lawiska Yesu
markdown:
### 294 Lawiska Yesu   
 COVER WITH HIS LIFE

  **1.**   
  Lawiska Yesu ndi murunji   
 Dada mndipe umoyo wake   
 Umoyo wane ngwakwananga   
 m'ndivwalike utuwa wake

  **Refrain:**   
 M'ndidikiske urunji wake,   
 Ndimanye za umoyo wake,   
 Umoyo wane ngwakwananga,   
 M'ndivwaLike utuwa wake.

  **2.**   
  Kwananga kwane kukamkoma ndopa   
 zake zan'thaska ine,   
 Mundibenekerere Fumu   
 nkhaponoskeke pa cheruzgo.

  **3.**   
  Mndigowokere Imwe Fumu   
 Yèsu wasunga munjirira,   
 Nkhuwuzomera nd'reke wane   
 sono ndivwale'moyo wake.

  **4.**   
  Nyifwa ya Yesu yandithaska   
 ndatuwiskika na mwenecho,   
 Ndine murunji m'mazgu ghake   
 ndlizamzota pa kwiza kwake.

title: 295 Lizgani Mbata Mrwani Wafika
markdown:
### 295 Lizgani Mbata Mrwani Wafika   
 C.H. 499 SOUND THE BATTLE CRY

  **1.**   
  Lizgani mbata mrwani wafika.   
 Kwezgani zina la Fumu   
 M'ware zikhore M'thaze na kwimba.   
 Mwike mtima pa mazgu ghake.

  **Chorus:**   
  Wukani mwe wankhondo wa Khristu.   
 Pizganinge mazgu gha Fumu.   
 Rutaninge na kwimba "Hosana.   
 Khristu ndiyo mrongozgi withu.

  **2.**   
  Tikumanenge na mrwani withu.   
 Tikhwime nadi m'mitima.   
 Titore mahomwa gha Chiuta.   
 Nakurwera wanangwa withu.

  **3.**   
  Chiuta withu mutipulike.   
 M'uchizi winu m'tovwire.   
 Para nkhondo yamara tatonda.   
 Tikavware mphumphu ya moyo.

title: 296 Fumu Mundirongozge
markdown:
### 296 Fumu Mundirongozge   
 LEAD ME, SAVIOUR

  **1.**   
  Fumu mundirongozge m'ndirongozge munthowa,   
 Mwa Imwe ndina mtende ndiwe m'chitemwa chinu.   
 M'ndirongozge kuti ndingapuluka (Fumu),   
 Muwukhaliro wane (wane)   
 mundirongozge Fumu ('mwe Fumu).

  **2.**   
  Imwe ndi mphanji yane m'masuzgo gha umoyo,   
 Para muli pafupi ntha tindopenge kanthu.   
 M'ndirongozge kuti ndingapuluka (Fumu)   
 Muwukhaliro wane (wane)   
 mundirongozge Fumu ('mwe Fumu).

  **3.**   
  Mundirongozge mpaka suzgo lose limale,   
 Nkhafikeko kuchanya mwampuputa masozi.   
 M'ndirongozge kuti ndingapuluka (Fumu),   
 Muwukhaliro wane (wane)   
 mundirongozge Fumu (mwe Fumu).

title: 297 Yumoza Wakazomera Kundifwira
markdown:
### 297 Yumoza Wakazomera Kundifwira   
 NAILED TO THE CROSS

  **1.**   
  Yumoza wakafwa mu malo mwa ine,   
 Kuti ndachitchwapi ndipone.   
 Mnthowa yakuya ku mphinjika wakenda,   
 Kundigowokera kwananga.

  **Chorus:**   
 Kwananga kwakhomereka pa mphinjika,   
 a, Inya, wakazizipizga mwe,   
 Wakasuzgika 'mwe Yesu pa mphinjika,   
 ga. Wakandiyeghera kwananga.

  **2.**   
  Wakundipwereraso na kunditemwa,   
 Wakundisuka mtima wane.   
 Ntha wakundisuska wakundisutula,   
 Wagowoka kwananga kwane.

  **3.**   
  Ndimamatirenge kwa Mponoski wane,   
 Nditi ndendenge mwakukondwa,   
 Sumu pa mulomo na mumtima wane,   
 Kwananga kwagowokereka.

title: 298 Ndirije Vyane, Vyose N'vinu
markdown:
### 298 Ndirije Vyane, Vyose N'vinu   
 NONE OF SELF AND ALL OF THEE

  **1.**   
  'Mwe nadi kungawa nyengo ya suzgo na chitima,   
 Apo nkham'phalira Yesu, Vyose n'vyane, imwe cha.   
 Vyose n'vyane, Imwe cha Vyose n'vyane, Imwe cha.   
 Apo nkham'phalira Yesu, "Vyose n'vyane, Imwe cha."

  **2.**   
  Wakandisanga nkhamwona pamphinjika pakufwa,   
 Mumutima nkhayowoya, Vinji n'vyane na imwe   
 Vinji n'vyane na Imwe, vinji n'vyane na imwe.   
 Mumutima nkhayowoya, "Vinji n'vyane na Imwe.

  **3.**   
  Dazi na dazi lusungu lwake lukandivwira,   
 Kundikhizga apo nkhati, "Ndichepe Imwe mkule."   
 Ndichepe, Imwe mkule, Ndichepe Imwe mkule.   
 Kundikhizga apo nkhati, "Ndichepe, Imwe mkule.

  **4.**   
  Ntchitali kuruska m'chanya kunjira 'ruska nyanja,   
 Chitemwa chinu ntchikuru tirije kithu, n vinu   
. Ndirije vyane, n'vinu, ndirije vyane, n'vinu,   
 Chitemwa chinu chatonda tirije kithu, n'vinu.

title: 299 Tisekere Nyengo Zose
markdown:
### 299 Tisekere Nyengo Zose   
 C.S. 284 ALWAYS CHEERFUL

  **1.**   
  Tisekere nyengo zose tikusuzgikirachi,   
 Apo Dada, Chata withu, wakutipwererera?

  **Chorus:**   
 TIsekere nyengo zose pakuwaLa kwa zu we,   
 Nthowa za miLimon ziweme,   
 Tikondwe nyengo zose.

  **2.**   
  Woko lake lirongozge para kwananga kwiza,   
 Lusungu lwake lovwire ntha watileke tekha.

  **3.**   
  Usange taleka mlimo tichitenge uheni,   
 Ndipo mtambo wa chitima uchimbizge chimwemwe.

  **4.**   
  Awo mbaweme wakondwe na mutende wandanda,   
 Tip'likire mazgu ghake, titemwenge viweme.

title: 300 Chipumulo Cha Wakuvuka
markdown:
### 300 Chipumulo Cha Wakuvuka   
 REST FOR THE WEARY

  **1.**   
  Mu chikaya cha wakhristu malo gha chipumulo,   
 Mtaski wali kudangira nane nkhupukwa uko.

  **Refrain:**   
 WamkupumuLa kura, wamkupumuLa kura,   
 ChipumuLo chiriko cha wakuvuka.   
 Pa sirya La Yorodano muminda ya Edeni,   
 MuLi khuni La moyo, mwamkupumuLa.

  **2.**   
  Wakundinozgera nyumba yamkukhalilira swi!   
 Ndam'khalamo nyengo zose m'charu chira chituwa.

  **3.**   
  KuWinya kulije kura kulijeso chitima,   
 Mkati mwa musumba uwo ndamukuvwala mphumphu.

  **4.**   
  Nyifwa na liwozga lake vyose vyam'malizgika,   
 wak' wombokwa m'chemerezge pa dazi la chizguka.

  **5.**   
  Yimbani wakuwombokwa chemani mukutonda,   
 Pa vipata vya m Ziyoni mwamukunijira kura.

title: 301 Fumu Yiri Pafupi Kwiza
markdown:
### 301 Fumu Yiri Pafupi Kwiza   
   **1.**   
  Fumu yiri pafupi kwiza nkhupulika nthena,   
 Nyenyezi mchanya zikUzimwa sono kuli pafupi kucha.

  **Refrain:**   
 Inta sono ndi matandakucha.   
 Mwe sono ndi matandakucha nadi;   
 Usiku waLuta, muhanya wafika,   
 Inya, sono ndi matandakucha.

  **2.**   
  Vimanyikwiro pa zuwa, mwezi, m nyanja na m'dera   
 ViIkupharazga ku tawanthu Fumu yiri pafupi kwiza.

  **3.**   
  Ndi nyengo ya mpingo kuleka kujikuzga sono   
 Na mahomwa, nyall ugozge, Kulindizga matandakucha.

  **4.**   
  Rutani luwiro muzinthowa mukawacheme,   
 Wamphundukwa, wambula maso, wanozgekere kwiza kwake.

title: 302 Chiuta Wakuchanya
markdown:
### 302 Chiuta Wakuchanya   
 Upon Dedicating A Church

  **1.**   
  Chiuta wakuchaya tiza ise kuno,   
 Na mtima wakukondwa pakunjira muno,   
 Chifukwa cha viweme 'vyo mwatichitira,   
 Tikumuchindikani 'mwe mha'uno.

  **Chorus:**   
 Inya, tikumchindikani wadada mha'uno,   
 Mwatizengera ise tempiLe Linu kuno,   
 Muzuzge uchindami winu mu nyumba iyi,   
 Mutuiske, mutumbikenge muno.

  **2.**   
  'Mwe tikukondwa tose na kumuwongani,   
 Pakwamba kumsopani na kwimbira muno,   
 Mwene mumuno muwe nase nyengo zose,   
 Nga mbangelo winu uko'kuchanya,

  **3.**   
  Yiwenge nga ndi nyali kuwalira m'nyumba,   
 Nakulongozga wose wakhuwala m'chisi,   
 Wakuwalo na wakhristu muwaponoske,   
 Kuwala uko kufumenge muno.

title: 303 Kale Wanthu M'lukutu
markdown:
### 303 Kale Wanthu M'lukutu   
 Who Is He In Yonder Stall?

  **1.**   
  Kale wanthu m'lukutu wakamusopa mwana.

  **Chorus:**   
 Ndiyo Yesu Fumu yane Ndiyo Fumu ya kuchanya,   
 vianthu wamjikamire timutamike Fumu,

  **2.**   
  Wakakavuka lyo nakuchita milimo.

  **3.**   
  Munthu uyo ni njani wakuyezgeka nthena?

  **4.**   
  Wakalira ni njani pakufwa m'bwezi wake?

  **5.**   
  M'munda mula ni njani wakathiska ndopa ntho!?

  **6.**   
  lyo ni njani m'mphinga wakafiwira warwani?

  **7.**   
  Mu madazi ghatatu wakafuma m'malaro?

  **8.**   
  Wakwizaso ni njani muchizumbe chituwa?

title: 304 Wadada Muli Kuchanya
markdown:
### 304 Wadada Muli Kuchanya   
 Father, Son And Spirit

  **1.**   
  wadada muli kuchanya muli kutithaska ise,   
 Mwe chitemwa chinu chira tikumuwongani Imwe.

  **2.**   
  A Yesu Fumu ndimweso mkababiwira tawanthu,   
 Mkatifwira ise tose tikumuwongani Imwe.

  **3.**   
  Mzimu Mutuwa mtisuke ndimweso mitima yithu,   
 Mukutisunga makola tikumuwongani Imwe.

  **4.**   
  Wadada, Mwana na Mzimu ndimwe watatu mwa yumo,   
 Tawaheni tikuromba mutigowokere ise.

title: 305 Zuwa Laluta
markdown:
### 305 Zuwa Laluta   
 The Sun Has Set

  **1.**   
  Zuwa laluta, zuwa laluta,   
 Fumu tigone makora.

  **2.**   
  Mdima wafika, mdima wafika,   
 Mtisunge tose makora.

  **3.**   
  Tizomerezge, tizomerezge,   
 Zakwananga zithu zose.

  **4.**   
  Mtigowokere, mtigowokere,   
 Mauheni ghithu ghose.

  **5.**   
  Mutigoneke, mutigoneke,   
 Mutigoneke mu mtende.

  **6.**   
  Tawana winu, tawana winu,   
 Dada withu mkutitemwa.

title: 306 Panthanzi Pa Chizumbe
markdown:
### 306 Panthanzi Pa Chizumbe   
 Before Jehova's Awftul Throne

  **1.**   
  Panthazi pa chizumbe 'mwe wamitundu wawerame,   
 Wamanye Chiuta n' Fumu wangalenga na kunanga.

  **2.**   
  Mnkhongono zake mwenecho wakatipanga ku dongo,   
 Ndipo tose tikazgewa watinjizgaso m'lukutu.

  **3.**   
  Pa vipata tayamkwimba kuchanya tamkwezga mazgu,   
 Pasi mvinenero vyose takumutamika lyo.

  **4.**   
  Dango lake ntcharo nacho chitemwa ntchamyirayira,   
 Mazgu ghake nga jalawe apo myaka ntha yam' Wako.

title: 307 Munthu Wa Vitima
markdown:
### 307 Munthu Wa Vitima   
 Man Of Sorrow

  **1.**   
  Munthu wa vitima 'mwe Zina lake ndi Yesu,   
 Linyake ndi Mponoski Haleluya ndimwe Fumu.

  **2.**   
  Wakayuyulika 'mwe wakafwa pa mphinjika,   
 Ndiyo wakandithaska Haleluya ndimwe Yesu.

  **3.**   
  Wakapayikika 'mwe nakumalizga mlimo,   
 Wakakwera kuchanya Haleluya ndimwe Yesu.

  **4.**   
  Wamukwizaso ndiyo kwizakatola wake,   
 Tayamkwimba zisumu Haleluya ndimwe Yesu.

title: 308 Pakulenga Charu
markdown:
### 308 Pakulenga Charu   
 Let There Be Light

  **1.**   
  Pakulenga charu kupulika mkuti,   
 "kungweruke", Mpulike lurombo ndipo   
 penepapo muwalenge paljeso mazgu.

  **2.**   
  Imwe mkiza nadi kuwachizga wose   
 wamatenda, Nakupa umoyo, kuwona mumaso,   
 muwalenge na pa wanthu wose.

  **3.**   
  Mzimu muneneska na wachitemwa   
 'mwe zani kuno, Mchanya mulengemo,   
 apo pali chisi muialenge, na pa charu pose.

  **4.**   
  Imwe mwawatatu, mwa Chiuta yumo,   
 mtipulike, Ku vyakulengeka kuli   
 chisi nadi, muwalenge, mutumeko Mazgu.

title: 309 Nkhwenda Nayo Yesu Fumu
markdown:
### 309 Nkhwenda Nayo Yesu Fumu   
 I'm Walking Everyday With Jesus

  **1.**   
  Nkhuyenda nayo Yesu Fumu,   
 nkhukondwa madazi ghose,   
 Nkhusanga chipulikano chake,   
 nkhukwaniskika nayo swi!

  **Chorus:**   
 Nkhuyenda nayo Yesu Fumu,   
 nkhukhurmba wandiongozge,   
 Pakudemerera pa Mponoski   
 ntha nditayikenge chara.

  **2.**   
  Nkhuyenda nayo Yesu Fumu,   
 ndichite khumbiro lake,   
 Wakapangana kundiwovwira,   
 wati wakwaniske vyose.

  **3.**   
  Nkhuyenda nayo Yesu Fumu,   
 ndazomerezga kwananga,   
 Pamoza tendenge nadi kose   
 mu chitemwano Chake swi!

title: 310 Nkhukhumba Kukhala Na Yesu
markdown:
### 310 Nkhukhumba Kukhala Na Yesu   
 Want To Live Closer To Jesus

  **1.**   
  Nkhukhumba kukhala na Yesu   
 kulawiska chene chake,   
 Wazuzge uchizi mu mtima wane   
 nkhukhumba kukhala nayo.

  **Chorus:**   
 KhaLa pafupi-fupi na Yesu   
 pa Lwande Lwa Mponoski,   
 KudodoLiska chene chakutowa   
 nkhukhumba kukhaLa nayo.

  **2.**   
  Nkhukhumba kukhala na Yesu   
 kumurondezga pafupi,   
 Kupulika lyo wakuyowoya   
 phangano lake kwa ine.

  **3.**   
  Nkhukhumba kukhala na Yesu   
 pafupi madazi ghose,   
 Kukora woko la nkhongono zake   
 nkhanjire m'ufumu wake.

title: 311 Imwe Mzimu Wa Chiuta
markdown:
### 311 Imwe Mzimu Wa Chiuta   
 O Spirit Of The Living God

  **1.**   
  Imwe Mzimu wa Chiuta mukhale mwa ine,   
 Vyane vyose nkhupereka kwa Imwe Wadada.

  **Chorus:**   
 M'ndizuzge, mndizuzge mndizuzge   
 na Mzimu Mtuwa, M'ndizuzge,   
 mndizuzge kuti ndi we winu.

  **2.**   
  Khumbiro linu Chiuta nkhukhumba ndifiske,   
 Ntha nkhukhumbaso chinyake m'ndizuzge na Mzimu.

  **3.**   
  Ndirije kanthu kaweme ako ndingam pani,   
 Mutozge mutima wane na ndopa za Yesu.

title: 312 Tachemeka Ise
markdown:
### 312 Tachemeka Ise   
 Called To Be Baptised

  **1.**   
  Tachemeka ise ku muronga Yordano,   
 Ise tapulika nadi mazgu m'mapopa.

  **Chorus:**   
 Ise tiza kuzakabapatizika,   
 Kuti tisukike ku zakwananga zithu.

  **2.**   
  Tapulika ntchemo ya kutemwa kwa Fumu,   
 Ng'anamuka mtima Yesu watizengeso

  **3.**   
  Yesu wakunena, uyo wagomezgenge   
 Nakuba'tizíka wizamukuthaskika.

  **4.**   
  Tikuwonga nadi uchizi wake Yesu,   
 Watifumiskako ku chisi cha uheni.

title: 313 Wadada Muwasungenge (Pa Ubapatizo)
markdown:
### 313 Wadada Muwasungenge (Pa Ubapatizo)   
 Prayer At Baptism

  **1.**   
  Aadada muwasungenge wanyithu wose,   
 wazomerezga zina la Yesu Mponoski.   
 wapangana nayo sono kumurondezga,   
 Muwavwire waule kuwerera nyuma.

  **2.**   
  wose wafwa ku zakwananga zawo sono,   
 Ndiposo wawikika na Khristu m'malalo.   
 wawuke iwo wose na kwenda na Fumu,   
 warombe nyengo zose na kuwazga mazgu.

  **3.**   
  Muwakhwimiske Fumu wende m'nthowa yinu,   
 Na kuthereska murwani madazi ghose.   
 Muwavwirenge iwo kuguza wanyake,   
 Awo wakufwa m zakwananga za mu charu.313

title: 314 Imwe Mwawanyamata
markdown:
### 314 Imwe Mwawanyamata   
 What Can The Youth Do?

  **1.**   
  Imwe mwa wanyamata namweso wasungwana   
 Mkuti, tingachitachi tichali waniche,   
 Pakuvwira ufumu wa Yesu.

  **2.**   
  Wasambizgeni wanthu wapharazgireninge,   
 wakukhala m'uheni mu chisi cham'charu,   
 Wanjire mu ufumu wa Yesu

  **3.**   
  Tawaniche ndise 'mwe vinjeru ntha n'vinandi,   
 Kuti tingasambizga tichitenge uli?   
 Pakovwira ufumu wa Yesu.

  **4.**   
  Imwe mose mwanyane t'ghanaghane makora,   
 Tiyowoye, tizike, tip'likire Fumu,   
 Pakovwira ufumu wa Yesu.

  **5.**   
  Pakovwira 'nyinafwe pakutemwa wanyithu,   
 Pakuleka uheni kukhala makora,   
 Tikovwira ufumu wa Yesu.314

title: 315 Nditikhumbenge Mponoski
markdown:
### 315 Nditikhumbenge Mponoski   
 Will Early Seek The Saviour

  **1.**   
  Nditikhumbenge Mponoski ndisambire za lyo,   
 Ndirondezge mu malwayo na munthowa yifinyi.

  **Refrain:**   
 Inya Yesu wakun'temwa,   
 Ine nkhumanya nadi,   
 Wakafwa kuti wan'thaske,   
 Ndimo nkhumutemwera.

  **2.**   
  Luwiro nditirondezge ndiri mwaniche chara,   
 Munthowa wakulongozga khumbo lake nkhumanya

  **3.**   
  Wamilira pa muryango kusuka zakwananga,   
 Ndikhung'uske wapangana kujula ndinjiremo.315

title: 316 Tiri Wakutumika
markdown:
### 316 Tiri Wakutumika   
 Missionary Volunteers

  **1.**   
  Tiri wakutumika wa Yesu Khristu,   
 Tapangana kuteweta mlimo wa Wadada.

  **Chorus:**   
 

Ndise 'mwe, ndise 'mwe,   
 wakutumika, Ndise 'mwe, ndise 'mwe, wake wa Fumu, Pa dazi Lini Lose chaka na chaka, Titigwire mLimo Wake wakutumika.

  **2.**   
  Wanyamata nawoso na wasungwana,   
 Tingalondezganga charu kweni Yesu pera.

  **3.**   
  Wakutikhumba tose ku mlimo wake,   
 Tirongorenge chitemwa na uchizi wake.

  **4.**   
  Mpaka Yesu wizeso ticnite mlimo,   
 Tizakapulike mazgu, "Mkachita makora."316

title: 317 Wakatolana Nthengwa
markdown:
### 317 Wakatolana Nthengwa   
 The Voice That Breathed O'er Eden

  **1.**   
  Wakatolana nthengwa mula mu Edeni,   
 Thumbiko lira-lira lichaliso lero.

  **2.**   
  Mwanalume na mwanakazi wima apa,   
 Imwe Mzimu Mutuwa mutumbike awa.

  **3.**   
  Muwagumanye awa Dada mhanyauno,   
 Mukawatezga Adamu na Hava kale.

  **4.**   
  Mukhale nawo Yesu nga mphakale para,   
 Nthengwa m'kayitumbika kale m'Kana mula.

  **5.**   
  MWasunge muwendeske m'nthowa yinu Fumu,   
 Muwapeso vitumbiko pa nyumba yawo.317

title: 318 Mwe Dazi La Sabata
markdown:
### 318 Mwe Dazi La Sabata   
 Holy Sabbath Day

  **1.**   
  Mwe dazi la Sabata Fumu yikapatula,   
 Yati yalenga vyose Fumu yikapumula.

  **Refrain:**   
 

Mwe dazi La Sabata Fumu yikatumbika,   
 Kutikumbuska ise nkhongono ya kuLenga.

  **2.**   
  M'ngakhumbanga vya m'charu na vyakusanguluska,   
 Vyakuluska viriko kwa Wadada kuchanya.

  **3.**   
  Pakwamba kwa Sabata mpha chisulo namise,   
 Tiwunganenge tose kumwimbira Chiuta.

  **4.**   
  Tirombere uchizi na kutonda kwenecho,   
 Kuti wativwirenge kulisunga Sabata.318

title: 319 Nditibenge Vya Chiuta
markdown:
### 319 Nditibenge Vya Chiuta   
 I Will Sing The Wondrous Story

  **1.**   
  Nditimbenge vya Chiuta vyakunditemwa kwake   
 Wakatuma mwana wake kwizakandifwira 'ne.

  **Chorus:**   
 Inya, ndizamkwimba sumu 'mwe ya kutemwa kwake,   
 Ndizamkwimba na wangeLo wakukhaLa kuchanya.   
 **(Bass/ALto/Tenor)**   
 Ndamkwimba ndamkwimba sumu,   
 Kutemwa, kutemwa ndamkwimba,   
 WangeLo awo wakukhaLa kuchanya,   
 E, kuchanya.

  **2.**   
  'Mwe nkhachitanga uheni walikuluwa vyose,   
 Nkhakhalanga m'zakwánanga wali kufumya zose.

  **3.**   
  Wandipa umoyo wake umoyo utuwa tu!   
 Iie ndiri mwana wake wakundilera ine.

  **4.**   
  Nkhuyiwonga Fumu yane nditiyitamikenge,   
 Nditandazge mbiri yake ya chitemwa chikuru.

title: 320 Yesu Mponoski Withu
markdown:
### 320 Yesu Mponoski Withu   
Sinners Jesus Will Receive

  **1.**   
  Yesu Mponoski withu wakupokera wose,   
 Na wakwananga wuwo wazgewera kutali

  **Chorus:**   
 Mwimbenge sumu mwe mwimbengeso,   
 A Yesu Fumu ntha vakane,   
 MpuLike mazgu gha uthenga wakwananga 'mwe wize,   
 **Bass/Tenor**   
 Mwimbe mwimbenge mwimbe mwimbenge,   
 A Yesu Fumu inya 'mwe nthawakane, nthawakane,   
 PuLika nadi, Inya uweme, wakwananga 'mwe wize.

   **2.**   
  Imwe mwize kwa Yesu watimpumuzganinge,   
 Nadi mu mtima winu muwenge mtende wake.

  **3.**   
  Pa dazi lira kale wakandipokerera,   
 Wakandisuka ine m mtima mwane mwatowa.

  **4.**   
  Wakandifwira Yesu pa charu chino kale,   
 Ntha nkhopaso mulandu pakwiza Fumu yane.

title: 321 Mwapulika Mazgu Ghake
markdown:
### 321 Mwapulika Mazgu Ghake   
 Come Believing

  **1.**   
  Mwapulika mazgu ghake, kasi mumzomerenge?   
 Kasi mung'anamukenge, kum'pulikira Yesu?

  **Chorus:**   
 Zomerani, zomerani, zomerani Luwiro (enya),   
 MungaziuLikangaso mpokererani Yesu.

  **2.**   
  Mukahoyeranga kale mungachedwangaso cha,   
 Yesu wakumlindizgani ntha watimkaneninge.

  **3.**   
  Muleke kopa mu mtima chifukwa chakwananga,   
 Para mwagomezga Yesu watimsutulaninge.

  **4.**   
  Perekani mtima winu kwa Chiuta kuchanya,   
 Mugomezge kuti Yesu wakatifwira kale.

title: 322 Mazgu Ngakuyuyuka
markdown:
### 322 Mazgu Ngakuyuyuka   
 Words Are Things Of Little Cost

  **1.**   
  Mazgu ngakuyuyuka, Tikukamba luwiro,   
 Ndipo tikughaluwa kweni pakweruzgika,   
 Ghamtiwira kaboni pacheruzgo kuchanya.

  **2.**   
  Ise tikuyowoya mwambula kupwerera,   
 Mazgu ghakujikuzga ghakubisa kwananga,   
 Na mazgu ghakukwiya kusunjizga wanyithu.

  **3.**   
  Fumu mutipe ise nkhongono kulindizga,   
 Mtirongozgenge Fumu tingananganga m'mazgu,   
 Tizakamwimbirani sumu kumtamikani.

title: 323 Fumu Ndapangana
markdown:
### 323 Fumu Ndapangana

  **1.**   
  Fumu ndapangana munthowa yinu,   
 Nditi ndendemo kwambula kuleka,   
 Mundipe mtima wakuzizipizga,   
 Wakukana vyose vya kunditchinga.

  **2.**   
  Muzimu uheni ukundiyezga,   
 Mundovwire ine kuwuchimbizga,   
 Para wandisuzga kuno kukaya,   
 Mundipe nkhongono mu mtima mwane,

  **3.**   
  Pakuthira sembe ku vimizimu,   
 Ndilawiske kwa Imwe kuchanya 'ko,   
 Soka na vyakunyenga vya ufwiti,   
 Yesu mndikhwimiske ndiule kopa

  **4.**   
  Panji kumwa nawo ndingachitanga,   
 Panji kukawonerera kuvina,   
 Panji kuwombeza ndingachitanga,   
 Yesu mundovwire kukana ivi.

  **5.**   
  Ndimwe mliska wane mundovwirenge,   
 Ndiule kufipiska mtima wane,   
 Ndingawopanga cha ndingananganga,   
 Mundendeske Yesu munthowa yinu.

title: 324 Timbe Sumu Yakukondweska
markdown:
### 324 Timbe Sumu Yakukondweska   
 Sing A Lovely Hymn

  **1.**   
  Timbe sumu yakukondweska pa nthowa   
 luwiro tamfika kukaya,   
 Cnisi chzam zgoka ungweru wandanda   
 luwiro tamfika kukaya.

  **Chorus:**   
 Kwa sono sono, kwa sono   
 sono tamujumpha mayigha,   
 Tamukumana chimphupulu chamaa,   
 luiro tamfika kukaya.

  **2.**   
  Tam'teweta mlimo uwo tamusanga   
 luwiro tamfika kukaya,   
 Wezi wa Chiuta ukutichinthiska   
 luwiro tamfika kukaya.

  **3.**   
  Tamunozga nthowa ya awo wavuka   
 luwiro tamfika kukaya,   
 Chitemwa chitandazge fuzi yiwemi   
 luwiro tamfika kukaya.

  **4.**   
  Tampumula nadi kukwenjerwa kose   
 luwiro tamfika kukaya,   
 Masozi kulije ku musumba uwo   
 luwiro tamfika kukaya.

title: 325 Pakuromba Ise Pano
markdown:
### 325 Pakuromba Ise Pano   
 While We Pray

  **1.**   
  Pakuromba ise pano pakuchema pa Fumu,   
 Pakujisanda mu mtima iza kwa Fumu yako.

  **Chorus:**   
 Za sono, za sono kwa Yesu Fumu yako,   
 Za sono, 'za sono Iza kwa Yesu sono.

  **2.**   
  Ndiwe wakwananga nadi wazgewera kutali,   
 Ukuchedwerachi kwiza pakulindizga Yesu.

  **3.**   
  M'charu ichi pasi pano ntha tiusange kanthu,   
 Kakukukwaniska m'mtima iza kwa Fumu yako.

  **4.**   
  Jivumbule vyose vyako vyabisika mu mtima,   
 Wati wakutozge iwe m'ndopa zake Mponoski.

title: 326 Mpingo Wa Tawakhristu
markdown:
### 326 Mpingo Wa Tawakhristu   
 We're A Little Christian Band

  **1.**   
  Mpingo wa tawakhristu   
 'mwe tikukondwa mwa Fumu,   
 Tikuruta kuchanya   
 'mwe tikukondwa mwa Fumu.

  **Chorus:**   
 Muponoski mtirongozgenge makora,   
 Pakuruta uko kuchanya.

  **2.**   
  Tikuyenda makora   
 'mwe tikukondwa mwa Fumu,   
 Tikuthereska mwani   
 'mwe tikukondwa mwa Fumu.

  **3.**   
  Sono sono tam'njira   
 'mwe tikukondwa mwa Fumu,   
 Tamukuwala mphumphu   
 'mwe tikukondwa mwa Fumu.

title: 327 Wakuchema Ise Kusirya Lira
markdown:
### 327 Wakuchema Ise Kusirya Lira

  **1.**   
  Wakuchema ise kusirya lira   
 tumizgani mazgu,   
 Wakukhumba kuti waponoskeke tumizgani mazgu.

  **Chorus:**   
 **(Bass)**   
 Tithuwuske mazgu gha   
 Fumu na mtima withu wOse,   
 Pakumuchindika Chiuta   
 na kusunga marango, Tumizga mazgu gha   
 uthenga kose wapuLikiske,   
 Tumizga mazgu gha   
 udhenga ungaLekanga chara   
 **(S/A/T)**   
 Tithuwuske mazgu gha   
 Fumu na mitima yakuzonmera   
 Pakumuchindika Chiuta   
 na kusungaso mazgu ghake, Tumizga mazgu gha   
 uthenga kose wapuLikiske,   
 Tumizga mazgu gha   
 uthenga ungaLekanga chara.

  **2.**   
  Tapulika ntchemerezgo kusirya    
 umizgani mazgu   
 Tiwezgere lusungu lwithu lose   
 tumizgani mazgu.

  **3.**   
  Tirombe uchizi wa Fumu yithu   
 tumizgani mazgu,   
 Mzimu wa Fumu waye posepose   
 tumizgani mazgu.

  **4.**   
  Tingavukanga kuchita uweme   
 tumizgani mazgu,   
 Pakuguza wanthu awo wazgewa   
 tumizgani mazgu.

title: 328 Para Tafika Kuchanya
markdown:
### 328 Para Tafika Kuchanya   
 When We All Get to Heaven

  **1.**   
  Yimbani vya kuzizwiska,   
 Vya chitemwa cha yesu   
 Malo ghakutowa,   
 wakutinozgera kuchanya

  **Chorus:**   
 Para tafika kuLa,   
 Lizamkuwa dazi Lakukondwa!   
 Pakumwona yesu,   
 Tizamwimba mwakundwa!

  **2.**   
  Pakwenda munthowa iyi,   
 Masuzgo ghawengepo   
 para ulendo wamara,   
 Suzgo lizamkumara

  **3.**   
  Tiyeni tigomezgeke,   
 Titewete mulimo   
 Pakwizakamiwona iye,   
 Wizamkutipa njombe

  **4.**   
  Tilawiske njombe yira,   
 Tizamkuwona iye   
 Pakujulika vipata,   
 Tizamnyira mumsumba

title: 329 Nkhukondwa Kuti Chiuta Dada
markdown:
### 329 Nkhukondwa Kuti Chiuta Dada   
 lam So Gled That Our Father

  **1.**   
  Nkhukondwa kuti Chiuta Dada,   
 Mazgu ghakuti wakunditemwa,   
 Viweme nkhuwazga m'mazgu ghake,   
 Chakuruska, Yesu wakun'temwa.

  **Refrain:**   
 Nkhukondwa nadi kuti Yesu,   
 Wakun'temwa wakun temwa,   
 Nkhukondwa nadi kuti Yesu,   
 Wakun temwa nadi.

  **2.**   
  Nanga ndim'luwe na kum'chimbira,   
 Wakunditemwa kose ndingaya,   
 Ndichimbirire m'mawoko ghake,   
 Pakukumbuka wakunditemwa.

  **3.**   
  Uvwe sumu yimoza ndingimba,   
 Pakum'wona Fumu m'uchindami,   
 Ndamkwimba sumu kwa myirayira,   
 Ntchakuzizwiska wakunditemwa.

title: 330 Chindika Chiuta Dada
markdown:
### 330 Chindika Chiuta Dada   
 Glory Be To God The Father

  **1.**   
  Chindika Chiuta, Dada chindikaso na Mwana,   
 Chindika Chiuta, Mzimu wose pamo njumoza,   
 Chindikani, chindikani Chiuta withu ndiyo.

  **2.**   
  M'chindike wakatitemwa nakutisuka m'mtima,   
 Wakatiwombola tose tikakhale na lyo,   
 Chindikani, chindikani Yesu Mwana-mberere.

  **3.**   
  Chindikani Fumu yithu Fumu, mulengi withu,   
 Wakuruska wanthu wose pasi na kuchanyaso,   
 Chindikani, chindikani 'mwe Themba la Mathemba.

title: 331 Tumikani Fumu M'mtima
markdown:
### 331 Tumikani Fumu M'mtima   
 Praise The Lord Oh My Soul

  **1.**   
  Tamikani Fumu m'mtima wakandifwira pa charu,   
 Wakasisita kwananga nakuvwala soni zane.

  **Chorus:**   
 WakandiwomboLa ine pakuthiska ndopa zake,   
 Timuchindikenge Lyo watiLipirira mLandu.

  **2.**   
  Nkhazgewa nadi kutali nakumkana lyo Yesu,   
 Kweni sono nkhumwimbira wakandiwombola ine.

  **3.**   
  Sono nkhusekera nadi pakudodoliska Yesu,   
 Wakuzirika na nyifwa kuwombola moyo wane.

  **4.**   
  Milimo yane njawaka na uweme mtima wane,   
 Wali kundizgola ine mrunji nam'weme ndi Yesu.

  **5.**   
  Sono namwe zani kuno mwomboli winu ndi Yesu,   
 Wakuthaska iwo wose wakumugomezga lyo.

title: 332 Para Tiri Pa Monesko
markdown:
### 332 Para Tiri Pa Monesko   
 While In Sweet Communion

  **1.**   
  Para tiri pa monesko wa Fumu yithu Yesu,   
 Tiwonenge ndopa zinu umo zikathikira.   
 Nanga ntha tikumwonani muli nase pafupi,   
 Mutitokotoske Fumu msezge nkhayiko zithu.

  **2.**   
  Mtiphialire ise nkhani ya masuzgo mkawona,   
 Pakulindirira imwe tize pafupi namwe.   
 Mutiguzire kwa Imwe na ku mphinjika yinu,   
 Mpaka tijiwone tekha umo mukatifwira.

  **3.**   
  Pakufuma pa monesko wa Fumu yithu Yesu,   
 Tipamphuskike m'mitima tilingane na lyo.   
 Tilondezge nthowa yake tikozganenge nayo,   
 Tim thye lyo Fumu yithu tipulikire dango

title: 333 Para Tiri Na Chitima
markdown:
### 333 Para Tiri Na Chitima   
 We Are Sorrowful

  **1.**   
  Para tiri na chitima masozi m'maso ghakwikha,   
 Kuwalilira wabali Yesu mutipulike

  **2.**   
  Mukavwala thupi lithu mukamanyaso masuzgo,   
 Mkalilira m'bwezi winu Yesu mutipulike.

  **3.**   
  Apo nase tizamkufwa mvuchi taleka kuthuta,   
 Nyifwa yatizingirizga Yesu mutipulike.

  **4.**   
  Namwe mkafwa pa mphinjika mukathiska ndopa zinu,   
 Ndipo mkagona m'malaro Yesu mutipulike.

title: 334 Apo Ine Nkhusuzgika
markdown:
### 334 Apo Ine Nkhusuzgika   
 When The Storms Of Life

  **1.**   
  Apo ine nkhusuzgika na zakwananga zane,   
 Nditirute kwa Chiuta wati wandovwirenge.

  **Chorus:**   
 Watindipokererenge Lyó ndiyo Dada wa ine,   
 Wakatuma Mwana Wake kwizakafwira ine

  **2.**   
  Usange wazengezgani ntha wakutemwa ine,   
 Ndigomezge mwa Chiuta lyo ntha wandikane.

  **3.**   
  Ndine myeni m'charu ichi ine kwithu nkhuchanya,   
 Apo Yesu wizirenge ndizamuruta nayo.

title: 335 Kupenjapenja M'masimbo Ghake
markdown:
### 335 Kupenjapenja M'masimbo Ghake   
 Searching The Scriptures

  **1.**   
  Kupenjapenja m'masimbo ghake   
 kupenja vya Muponosk,   
 Tikupulikamo vya Fumu Baibo   
 likuti wuli 'mwe?

  **Chorus:**

  **2.**

  **3.**

 ciharo ca ndanda.

  **2.**   
  Mafuko ghose pano pasi   
 ghamko-ngana pantazi pake kupokera   
 vyakuwenera ivyo vikuwa lindirira.

  **3.**   
  Awo wakuzomera Fumu wamkuca   
 pamoza na kopa Kweni mazgu gha   
 Fumu yawo ghamkucimbizga kopa kwawo.

  **4.**   
  Okwe mwe! Kunozga comene   
 kupu-lika mazgu gha Fumu   
 Pa kuwacema wantu wake;   
 zaninge, zaninge njrani.

title: 371 Israyel Welera
markdown:
### 371 Israyel Welera   

  **1.**   
 Israel welera.

  **Chorus:**   
 Welera kwa Yehova   
Mkuru Mlengi wako   
Werera kwa Yehova.

  **2.**   
 Ungagongowanga.

  **3.**   
 Na uheni wako.

  **4.**   
 Pakuti ngunandi.

  **5.**   
 lyo wamkuzika.

  **6.**   
 Wakucemerezga.

  **7.**   
 Lekani uheni.

  **8.**   
 Imwe wantu wake.

  **9.**   
 Mumutenmwe iyo.

  **10.**   
 Pakuti ndi movwiri.

  **11.**   
 Movwiri winu mose

  **12.**   
 Werera, werera.

  **13.**   
 Mwa wakutayika.

  **14.**   
 Mumurombe lyo.

  **15.**   
 Wati wapulikenge.

  **16.**   
 Zaninge, zaninge.

title: 372 Ndawakwananga Ndapona
markdown:
### 372 Ndawakwananga Ndapona

  **1.**   
  Nda wakwananga ndapona,   
 goliwoli lasutuka,   
 Landiyenyanga m'singo'mo,   
 Yesu Wakandiwombola.

  **Chorus:**   
  Ndasutuka, ndawombokwa,   
 Yesu wakhara mkati'mo   
 wakuya nane mziyoni,   
 Watuwa wakuhenera.

  **2.**   
  Vikondo vya murwani 'mwe   
 pafupi kundimarizga    
Ndamwene na nyumba yane,   
 Yesu, wakandiwombola

  **3.**   
  Pakusutulika kwane   
 Wangelo walulutira,   
 wahemba wandiwurira vya pa   
 mtima vya ku Yesu.

  **4.**   
  M'Yerusalemu kucanya   
 mphomo Yikapulikikwa,   
 Wangelo, watuwa wose   
 wakundihenera nadi.
